Lyrics: Watchman, blow the gospel trumpet,<BON:nextLine/>Evry soul a warning give;<BON:nextLine/>Whosoever hears the message <BON:nextLine/>May repent, and turn, and live. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Blow the trumpet, trusty watchman,<BON:nextLine/>Blow it loud o'er land and sea…<BON:nextLine/>(loud o'er land and sea)<BON:nextLine/>God commissions, sound the message!<BON:nextLine/>Ev'ry captive may be free. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sound it loud o'er ev'ry hilltop,<BON:nextLine/>Gloomy shade, and sunny plain;<BON:nextLine/>Ocean depths repeat the message,<BON:nextLine/>full salvation's glad refrain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sound it in the hedge and highway,<BON:nextLine/>Earth's dark sports where exiles roam;<BON:nextLine/>Let it tell all things are ready, <BON:nextLine/>Father waits to welcome home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sound it for the heavy laden,<BON:nextLine/>Weary, longing to be free.<BON:nextLine/>Sound a Saviour's invitation,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetly saying, "Come to me". <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-1, AH-350, SDAH-368)
Title: Watchman Blow The Gospel Trumpet

Lyrics: The coming King is at the door,<BON:nextLine/>Who once the cross for sinners bore<BON:nextLine/>But now the righteous ones alone<BON:nextLine/>He comes to gather home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>At the door…. At the door…<BON:nextLine/>At the door, yes, even at the door.<BON:nextLine/>He is coming, He is coming <BON:nextLine/>He is even at the door. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The signs that show his coming near,<BON:nextLine/>Are fast fulfilling year by year,<BON:nextLine/>And soon we'll hail the glorious dawn<BON:nextLine/>Of heaven's eternal morn. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Look not on earth for strife to cease,<BON:nextLine/>Look not below for joy and peace,<BON:nextLine/>Until the Saviour comes again,<BON:nextLine/>To banish death and sin. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then in that glorious earth made new,<BON:nextLine/>We'll dwell the countless ages thro';<BON:nextLine/>This mortal shall immortal be,<BON:nextLine/>And time eternity. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-2, AH-411, SDAH-//)
Title: The Coming King

Lyrics: Face to face with Christ my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Face to face what will it be?<BON:nextLine/>When with rapture I behold Him,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus Christ who died for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Face to face shall I behold Him,<BON:nextLine/>Far beyond the starry sky;<BON:nextLine/>Face to face in all His glory.<BON:nextLine/>I shall see Him by and by! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Only faintly now, I see Him,<BON:nextLine/>With the dark'ning veil between,<BON:nextLine/>But the blessed day is coming; <BON:nextLine/>When His glory shall be seen. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>What rejoicing in His in His presence, <BON:nextLine/>When Are banished grief and pain,<BON:nextLine/>When the crooked ways are straightened,<BON:nextLine/>And the dark things shall be plain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Face to face! O! blissful moment!<BON:nextLine/>Face to face to see and know;<BON:nextLine/>Face to face with my redeemer,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus Christ who loves so. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-3, AH-319, SDAH-206)
Title: Face To Face

Lyrics: How sweet are the tidings that greet the pilgrim's ear,<BON:nextLine/>as he wander in ex-ile from home!<BON:nextLine/>Soon, soon will the Saviour in glory appear,<BON:nextLine/>And soon will the kingdom come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>He's coming, coming, coming soon, I know,<BON:nextLine/>coming back to this earth again;<BON:nextLine/>And the weary pilgrims will to glory go,<BON:nextLine/>When the Saviour comes to reign. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The mossy old graves where the pil-grims sleep<BON:nextLine/>shall be o-pen'd as wide as before,<BON:nextLine/>and the millions that sleep in the mighty deep<BON:nextLine/>shall live on this earth once more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There we'll meet ne'er to part in our happy Eden home,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet songs or redemption we'll sing;<BON:nextLine/>From the north, from the South, all the ransom'd shall come,<BON:nextLine/>And worship our heavenly King. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hal-lelu-jah, A-men! Ha-le-lu-jah a-gain!<BON:nextLine/>Soon, if faithful, we all shall be there; <BON:nextLine/>O, be watchful, be hopeful- be joyful till then,<BON:nextLine/>And a crown of bright glory we'll wear. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-4, AH-407, SDAH-442)
Title: He Is Coming

Lyrics: How far from home? I asked as on<BON:nextLine/>I bent my steps the watchman spake:-<BON:nextLine/>"The long, dark night is al-most over,<BON:nextLine/>The morning soon will break.<BON:nextLine/>Then weep no more, but speed thy flight,<BON:nextLine/>With hope's bright star thy guiding ray,<BON:nextLine/>Till thou shall reach the realms of light,<BON:nextLine/>In ev-erlast-ing day." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I asked the war-rior on the field:<BON:nextLine/>This was his soul-inspring song:<BON:nextLine/>With courage, bold, the sword I'll wield,<BON:nextLine/>The bat-tle is not long.<BON:nextLine/>Then weep no more, but well en-dure <BON:nextLine/>The con-flict, till thy work is done;<BON:nextLine/>For this we know, the prize is sure,<BON:nextLine/>When vic-to-ry is won. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I asked a-gain; earth, sea and sun<BON:nextLine/>Seemed, with one voice, to make reply:<BON:nextLine/>"Time's wasting sands are near-ly run,<BON:nextLine/>E-ter-ni-ty is nigh.<BON:nextLine/>Then weep no more-with warning tones<BON:nextLine/>Portentious signs are thick'ning round,<BON:nextLine/>The whole cre-a-tion, wait-ing, groans, <BON:nextLine/>To hear the trumpet sound." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not far from home! O blessed thought!<BON:nextLine/>The trav'ler's lonely heart to cheer;<BON:nextLine/>With oft a heal-ing balm has brought,<BON:nextLine/>And dried the mourner's tear.<BON:nextLine/>Then weep no more, since we shall meet <BON:nextLine/>Where weary footsteps never roam-<BON:nextLine/>Our tri-als past our joys complete,<BON:nextLine/>Safe in our Father's home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-5, AH-414, SDAH-439)
Title: How Far From Home

Lyrics: Watch, ye saints, with eyelids waking;<BON:nextLine/>Lo! The powers of heeav'n are shaking;<BON:nextLine/>Keep your lamps all trimm'd and burning,<BON:nextLine/>Ready for your Lord's returning. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Lo! He comes, lo! Jesus comes;<BON:nextLine/>Lo! He comes, He comes all glorious!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus comes to reign victorious,<BON:nextLine/>Lo! He comes, yes, Jesus comes! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Kingdoms at their base are crumbling,<BON:nextLine/>Hark! His chariot wheels are rumbling;<BON:nextLine/>Tell, O tell of grace abounding,<BON:nextLine/>Whilst the seventh trump is sounding. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nations wane, tho' proud and stately;<BON:nextLine/>Christ his kingdom hasteneth greatly,<BON:nextLine/>Earth her latest pangs is summing; <BON:nextLine/>Shout, ye saints, your Lord is coming. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sinners, come, while Christ is pleading;<BON:nextLine/>Now for you he's interceding;<BON:nextLine/>Haste,ere grace and time diminished,<BON:nextLine/>Shall proclaim the mystery finished. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-6, AH-415, SDAH-598)
Title: Watch Ye Saints

Lyrics: When he cometh, when he cometh,<BON:nextLine/>To make up his jewels,<BON:nextLine/>All his jewels, precious jewels,<BON:nextLine/>His loved and his own. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Like the stars of the morning,<BON:nextLine/>His bright crown adorning, <BON:nextLine/>They shall shine in their beauty,<BON:nextLine/>Bright gems for his own. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He will gather, he will gather,<BON:nextLine/>The gems for his kingdom,<BON:nextLine/>All the pure ones, all the bright ones,<BON:nextLine/>His loved and his own. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Little children, little children,<BON:nextLine/>Who love their redeemer,<BON:nextLine/>Are the jewels, precious jewels,<BON:nextLine/>His loved and his own. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-7, AH-449, SDAH-218)
Title: When He Cometh

Lyrics: When the trumpent of the Lord shall sound,<BON:nextLine/>and time shall be nomore,<BON:nextLine/>And the morning breaks, eternal, bright and fair;<BON:nextLine/>When the saved of the earth shall gather,<BON:nextLine/>over on the other show,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder, I'll be there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder <BON:nextLine/>I'll be there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>On that bright and cloudless morning,<BON:nextLine/>when the dead in Christ shall rise,<BON:nextLine/>And the glory of His resurrection share;<BON:nextLine/>When His chosen ones shall gather,<BON:nextLine/>to their home beyond the skies,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder I'll be there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let us labour for the Master,<BON:nextLine/>from the down till setting sun,<BON:nextLine/>Let us talk of all His wondrous love and care,<BON:nextLine/>Then, when all of life is over,<BON:nextLine/>and our work on earth is done,<BON:nextLine/>When the roll is called up yonder I'll be there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-8, AH-//, SDAH-216)
Title: When The Roll Is Called Up Yonder

Lyrics: Lift up the trumpet, and loud let it ring;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again!<BON:nextLine/>Cheer up ye pilgrims, be joyful and sing;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Coming again, coming again, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Echo it, hilltops, proclaim it, ye plains; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again!<BON:nextLine/>Coming in glory, the Lamb that was slain;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sound it, old ocean, in each mighty wave;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again!<BON:nextLine/>Break on the sands of the shores that ye lave;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hearings of earth, tell the vast, wond'ring throng; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again!<BON:nextLine/>Tempests and whirlwinds, the anthem prolong;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nations are angry, by this we do know;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again!<BON:nextLine/>Knowledge increases, men run to and fro; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus is coming again! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-9, AH-406, SDAH-213)
Title: Jesus Is Coming Again

Lyrics: Shall we gather at the river,<BON:nextLine/>Where bright angel feet have trod;<BON:nextLine/>With its crystal tide forever,<BON:nextLine/>Flowing by the throne of God? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Yes, we'll gather at the river,<BON:nextLine/>The beautiful, The beautiful river; <BON:nextLine/>Gather with the saints at the river;<BON:nextLine/>That flows by the throne of God. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>On the margin of the river, <BON:nextLine/>Washing up its silver spray;<BON:nextLine/>We will walk and worship ever,<BON:nextLine/>All the happy golden day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ere we reach the shining river;<BON:nextLine/>Lay we ev'ry burden down;<BON:nextLine/>Grace our spirits will deliver,<BON:nextLine/>And provide a robe and crown. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>  Soon we'll reach the shining river,<BON:nextLine/>Soon our pilgrimage will cease;<BON:nextLine/>Soon our happy hearts will quiver,<BON:nextLine/>With the melody of peace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-10, AH-430, SDAH-432)
Title: Shall We Gather At The River

Lyrics: I will follow thee, my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Wheresoe'er my lot may be;<BON:nextLine/>Where thou goest I will fallow;<BON:nextLine/>Yes, my Lord, I'll follow thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I will follow thee, my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Thou didst shed thy blood for me;<BON:nextLine/>And tho' all men should forsake thee,<BON:nextLine/>By thy grace I'll follow thee; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho' the road be rough and thorny,<BON:nextLine/>Trackless as the foaming sea;<BON:nextLine/>Thou hast trod this way before me,<BON:nextLine/>And I'll gladly follow thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho' I meet with tribulations,<BON:nextLine/>Sorely tempted tho' I be;<BON:nextLine/>I remember thou wast tempted,<BON:nextLine/>And rejoice to follow thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though thou lead'st me thro' affliction,<BON:nextLine/>Poor, forsaken, though I be;<BON:nextLine/>Thou wast destitute afflicted,<BON:nextLine/>And I only follow thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though to Jordan's rolling billows;<BON:nextLine/>Cold and deep, thou leadest me;<BON:nextLine/>Thou hast crossed the waves before me,<BON:nextLine/>And I still will follow thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-11, AH-282, SDAH-623)
Title: I Will Follow Thee

Lyrics: There is a fountain filled with blood, drawn from Immanuel's veins<BON:nextLine/>And sinners plunged beneath that flood; lose all their guilty stains<BON:nextLine/>Lose all their guilty stains; lose all their guilty stains<BON:nextLine/>And sinners plunged beneath that flood; lose all their guilty stains. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The dying thief rejoiced to see, that fountain in his day;<BON:nextLine/>And their may I, though vile as he, wash all my sins away,<BON:nextLine/>Wash all my sins away; wash all my sins away;<BON:nextLine/>And there may I, though vile as he, wash all my sins away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou dying Lamb! Thy precious blood, Shall never lose its power<BON:nextLine/>Till all the ransomed church of God, Are saved to sin no more <BON:nextLine/>Are saved to sin no more, Are saved to sin no more <BON:nextLine/>Till all the ransomed church of God, Are saved to sin no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>E`er since by faith I saw the stream, Thy flowing wounds supply,<BON:nextLine/>Redeeming love has been my theme, And shall be till I die;<BON:nextLine/>And shall be till I die, And shall be till I die;<BON:nextLine/>Redeeming love shall be my theme, And shall be till I die. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord, I believe Thou hast prepared, Unworthy though I be,<BON:nextLine/>For me a blood-bought, free reward, A golden harp for me!<BON:nextLine/>A golden harp for me! A golden harp for me!<BON:nextLine/>For me a blood-bought, free reward, A golden harp for me!<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There in a nobler, sweeter song, I'll sing Thy power to save,<BON:nextLine/>When this poor lisping, stammering tongue, Is ransomed from the grave,<BON:nextLine/>Is ransomed from the grave, Is ransomed from the grave;<BON:nextLine/>When this poor lisping, stammering tongue, Is ransomed from the grave.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-12, AH-135, SDAH-336)
Title: There Is A Fountain

Lyrics: Lord Jesus I long to to be perfectly whole;<BON:nextLine/>I want Thee forever to live in my soul;<BON:nextLine/>Break down every idol,cast out every foe;<BON:nextLine/>Now wash me and I shall be whiter than snow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Whiter than snow,yes,whiter than snow<BON:nextLine/>Now wash me,and I shall be whiter than snow <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord Jesus, look down from Thy throne in the skies,<BON:nextLine/>And help me to make a complete sacrifice;<BON:nextLine/>I give up myself, and whatever I know;<BON:nextLine/>Now wash me and I shall be whiter than snow <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord Jesus for this I most humbly entreat;<BON:nextLine/>I wait,blessed Lord,at Thy crucified feet<BON:nextLine/>By faith,for my cleansing;<BON:nextLine/>I see Thy blood flow;<BON:nextLine/>Now wash me and I shall be whiter than snow <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord Jesus, Thou seest I patiently wait;<BON:nextLine/>Come now, and within me a new heart create;<BON:nextLine/>To those who have sought Thee, Thou never said`st No;<BON:nextLine/>Now wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-13, AH-200, SDAH-318)
Title: Whiter Than Snow

Lyrics: Hear the pennies dropping! Listen while they fall.<BON:nextLine/>Every one to Jesus, -He will get them all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Dropping, dropping dropping, dropping; Hear the pennies fall!<BON:nextLine/>Every on for Jesus,-He will get them all <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Dropping, dropping ever, From each little hand;<BON:nextLine/>`Tis our gift to Jesus, From his little band. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now, while we are little, Pennies are our store;<BON:nextLine/>But, when we are older, Lord, we'll give thee more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho` we've little money, We can give him love;<BON:nextLine/>He will own our off`ring, Smilling from above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-14, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Hear The Pennies Dropping

Lyrics: Jesus loves me! This I know, For the Bible tells me so;<BON:nextLine/>Little one to Him belong, They are weak but He is strong <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Yes Jesus loves me, Yes Jesus loves me<BON:nextLine/>Yes Jesus loves me; …The Bible tells me so. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus loves me! He who died, Haven's gates will open wide;<BON:nextLine/>He will wash away my sins. Let His little child come in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus loves me! Loves me still, when I'm sad or weak and ill;<BON:nextLine/>From His shinning Throne on high,<BON:nextLine/>Comes to watch me where I lie. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus loves me! He will stay, Close beside me all the way,<BON:nextLine/>If I love Him, by and by He will take me home on high. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-15, AH-455, SDAH-190)
Title: Jesus Loves Me

Lyrics: I washed my hands this morning, O very clean and white,<BON:nextLine/>And lent them both to Jesus, To work for him till night. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Little feet be careful, Where you take me to,<BON:nextLine/>Anything for Jesus Only let me do. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I told my ears to listen Quite closely all day thro`,<BON:nextLine/>For any act of kindness, Such little hands can do. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My eyes are set to watch them,About their work or play,<BON:nextLine/>To keep them out of mischief, For Jesus` sake all day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-16, AH-459, SDAH-//)
Title: I Washed My Hands

Lyrics: `Tis love that makes us happy, `Tis love that smoothes the way;<BON:nextLine/>It helps us "mind ",it makes us kind to others everyday <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>God is love; we're his little children.<BON:nextLine/>God is love, we would be like him.<BON:nextLine/>`Tis love that makes us happy,<BON:nextLine/>`Tis love that smoothes our way<BON:nextLine/>It helps "mind "it makes us kind<BON:nextLine/>To others everyday. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>This world is full of sorrow, Of sickness, death and sin;<BON:nextLine/>With loving hearts we'll do our part, And try some soul to win. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And when this life is over, And we are called above,<BON:nextLine/>Our song shall be eternally, Of Jesus and his love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-17, AH-454, SDAH-579)
Title: Tis Love That Makes Us Happy

Lyrics: Onward, Christian soldiers! Marching as to war <BON:nextLine/>With the cross Jesus Going on before.<BON:nextLine/>Christ the royal master Leads against the foe <BON:nextLine/>Forward into battle See his banners go! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Onward Christian soldiers! <BON:nextLine/>Marching as to war <BON:nextLine/>With the cross of Jesus<BON:nextLine/>Going on before. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>At the sign of triumph Satan's host doth flee,<BON:nextLine/>On then Christian soldiers, On to victory!<BON:nextLine/>Hell's foundations quiver, At the shout of praise,<BON:nextLine/>Brothers lift your voices, Loud your anthems raise <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Like a mighty army, Moves the church of God;<BON:nextLine/>Brothers we are trading where the have trod;<BON:nextLine/>We are not divided, all one body we,<BON:nextLine/>One in hope and doctrine, One in charity. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Crowns and thorns have perished, Kingdoms ruled and waned,<BON:nextLine/>But the church of Jesus constant has remained<BON:nextLine/>Gates of hell can never `Gainst this church prevail;<BON:nextLine/>We have Christ's own promise that can never fail. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Onward then, ye people! Join our happy throng <BON:nextLine/>Blend with our voices In the triumph song;<BON:nextLine/>Glory, praise and honor Unto Christ the King;<BON:nextLine/>This thro` countless ages, Men and angels sings. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-18, AH-370, SDAH-612)
Title: Onward Christian Soldiers

Lyrics: My soul, be on thy guard! Ten thousand foes arise;<BON:nextLine/>The hosts of sin are pressing hard, To draw thee from the skies. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, watch and fight and pray! The battle ne`er give o`er;<BON:nextLine/>Renew it boldly ev`ry day, And help divine implore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ne`er think the victory won, Nor lay thine armor down;<BON:nextLine/>Thy arduous task will not be done Till thou obtain the crown <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-19, AH-//, SDAH-605)
Title: My Soul Be On Thy Guard

Lyrics: Awake my soul! Stretch every nerve, and press with vigor on;<BON:nextLine/>A heavenly race demands thy zeal, and an immortal crown. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tis God's all animating voice, That calls thee from on high;<BON:nextLine/>`Tis he whose hand presents the prize, to thine aspiring eye. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A cloud of witnesses around, hold thee in full survey;<BON:nextLine/>Forget the steps already trod, and onward urge thy way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Blest saviour, introduced by the, our race have we begun;<BON:nextLine/>And, crown with victory, at thy feet, we'll lay our trophies down <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-20, AH-323, SDAH-611)
Title: Awake, My Soul

Lyrics: I am coming to the cross, I am poor, and weak, and blind;<BON:nextLine/>I am counting all but dross, I shall full salvation find. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I am trusting, Lord, in thee <BON:nextLine/>Blessed Lamb of Calvary!<BON:nextLine/>Humbly at thy cross I bow<BON:nextLine/>Save me Jesus, save me now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Long my heart has sighed for thee, long has evil reigned within?<BON:nextLine/>Jesus sweetly speak to me, "I will cleanse you from all sin" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Here I give all to thee, friends and time and earthly store;<BON:nextLine/>Soul and body thine to be, wholly thine for ever more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>In thy promises I trust, Now I feel the blood applied;<BON:nextLine/>I am ev`ry whit made whole; Glory, glory to the Lamb <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-21, AH-183, SDAH-307)
Title: I am coming to the cross

Lyrics: Lord, I hear of show`rs of blessing,<BON:nextLine/>thou art scattering full and free;<BON:nextLine/>Show`rs the thirsty soul refreshing;<BON:nextLine/>Let some drop now fall on me; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Even me, even me, let some drops fall on me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Pass me not, O gracious Father!<BON:nextLine/>Sinful though my heart may be;<BON:nextLine/>Though mightest leave me,<BON:nextLine/>but the rather let thy mercy rest on me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Have I long in sin been sleeping? <BON:nextLine/>Long been sighting, grieving thee? <BON:nextLine/>Has the world my heart been keeping? <BON:nextLine/>O forgive and rescue me!. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Pass me not, O Holy Spirit!<BON:nextLine/>Thou canst make the blind to see;<BON:nextLine/>Testify of Jesus` merit;<BON:nextLine/>speak the word of peace to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-22, AH-151, SDAH-//)
Title: Lord I Hear

Lyrics: Hover o`er me, Holy spirit,<BON:nextLine/>Bathe my trembling heart and brow;<BON:nextLine/>Fill me with thy hallow`d presence,<BON:nextLine/>Come, O come and fill me now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now.<BON:nextLine/>Fill me with thy hallow`d presence, Come, O come and fill me now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou canst fill me gracious Spirit,<BON:nextLine/>Tho` I can not tell thee how;<BON:nextLine/>But I need thee, greatly need thee,<BON:nextLine/>Come, O come and fill me now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I am weaknes, full of weakness;<BON:nextLine/>At thy sacred feet I bow;<BON:nextLine/>Blest, divine, eternal Spirit,<BON:nextLine/>Fill with love and fill me now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Cleanse and comfort, bless and save;<BON:nextLine/>Bathe, O, bathe my heart and brow;<BON:nextLine/>Thou art comforting and saving,<BON:nextLine/>Thou art sweetly filling now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-23, AH-152, SDAH-263)
Title: Hover O`er Me, Holy Spirit

Lyrics: I need thee every hour, Most gracious Lord;<BON:nextLine/>No tender voice like Thine can peace afford? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I need Thee, O I need Thee!<BON:nextLine/>Every hour I need Thee;<BON:nextLine/>O bless me now, my Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>I come to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need Thee every hour; Stay Thou near by;<BON:nextLine/>Temptations lose their pow`r, when Thou art nigh. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need Thee every hour, in joy or pain;<BON:nextLine/>Come quickly and abide, Or life is vain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need Thee every hour, Most Holy One;<BON:nextLine/>O make me Thine indeed, Thou blessed Son <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-24, AH-222, SDAH-483)
Title: I Need Thee Every Hour

Lyrics: All to Jesus I surrender, All to him I freely give;<BON:nextLine/>I will ever love and trust Him, in his presence daily live; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>I surrender all; I surrender all;<BON:nextLine/>All to Thee my blessed Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>I surrender all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All to Jesus I surrender, humbly at his feet I bow;<BON:nextLine/>Worldly pleasures all forsaken take me Jesus, take me now; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All to Jesus I surrender, make me Saviour, wholly Thine;<BON:nextLine/>Let me feel the Holy Spirit, truly know that Thou art mine; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All to Jesus I surrender, now I feel the sacred flame.<BON:nextLine/>O the joy of full salvation! Glory, glory to his name! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-25, AH-190, SDAH-309)
Title: All To Jesus I Surrender

Lyrics: Just as I am, without one plea,<BON:nextLine/>but that thy blood was shed for me, <BON:nextLine/>And that thou bid`st me come to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>O Lamb of God, I come, I come <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Just as I am, and waiting not,<BON:nextLine/>to rid my soul of one dark blot,<BON:nextLine/>To thee whose blood can cleanse each spot,<BON:nextLine/>O Lamb of God, I come, I come <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Just as I am, though tossed about,<BON:nextLine/>with many` a conflict, many` a doubt- <BON:nextLine/>"Fightings within, and fears without, <BON:nextLine/>O Lamb of God, I come, I come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind- <BON:nextLine/>sight, riches, healing of the mind,<BON:nextLine/>Yes, all I need, in thee to find,<BON:nextLine/>O Lamb of God, I come, I come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Just as I am, thou wilt receive,<BON:nextLine/>wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve;<BON:nextLine/>Because thy promise I believe, <BON:nextLine/>O lamb of God, I come, I come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Just as I am, thy love I own, <BON:nextLine/>has broken ev`ry barrier down; <BON:nextLine/>Now to be thine, and thine alone,<BON:nextLine/>O Lamb of God, I come, I come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-26, AH-411, SDAH-//)
Title: Just As I Am

Lyrics: We praise thee, O God, for the Son of thy love,-<BON:nextLine/>For Jesus who and is now gone above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Hallelujah! Thine the glory, <BON:nextLine/>Hallelujah! Amen;<BON:nextLine/>Hallelujah! Thine the glory, <BON:nextLine/>Revive us again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We praise thee, O God, for thy Spirit of light,<BON:nextLine/>Who has shown us our Saviour, and scatter`d our night. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All glory to the Lamb that was slain, <BON:nextLine/>Who has borne all our sins, and has cleansed ev`ey stain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All glory and praise to then God of all grace, <BON:nextLine/>Who has brought us and sought us, and guided our ways. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Revive us again; fill each heart with thy love;<BON:nextLine/>May each soul be re kindled with fire from above? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-27, AH-157, SDAH-//)
Title: We Praise Thee, O God

Lyrics: Take time to be holy, speak soft with the Lord;<BON:nextLine/>Abide in him always, and feed on his word;<BON:nextLine/>Make friends of God's children; help those who are weak, <BON:nextLine/>Forgetting in nothing, his blessing to seek.             <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take time to be holy, the world rushes on; <BON:nextLine/>Spend much time in secret with Jesus alone;<BON:nextLine/>By looking to Jesus, like Him thou shalt be; <BON:nextLine/>Thy friends in thy conduct, His likeness shall see. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take time to be holy, let Him be thy guide,<BON:nextLine/>And run not before him, whatever betide; <BON:nextLine/>In joy or in sorrow, still follow thy Lord,<BON:nextLine/>And looking to Jesus, still trust in his word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take time to be holy, be calm in thy soul,<BON:nextLine/>Each tho`t and each motive beneath his control; <BON:nextLine/>Thus led by the Spirit to fountains of love,<BON:nextLine/>Thou soon shall be fitted for service above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-28, AH-276, SDAH-500)
Title: Take Time To Be Holy

Lyrics: Abide with me! Fast falls the even-tide;<BON:nextLine/>The darkness deepens; Lord with me abide!<BON:nextLine/>When other helpers fail and comforts flee,<BON:nextLine/>Help of the helpless, O, abide with me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Swift to its close ebbs out life's little day;<BON:nextLine/>Earth's joys grow dim; its glories pass away;<BON:nextLine/>Change and decay in all around I see;<BON:nextLine/>O thou who changest not, abide with me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not a brief glance I ask nor passing word,<BON:nextLine/>But as thou dwell`st with thy disciples, Lord,<BON:nextLine/>Familiar, condensing, patient, at no cost,<BON:nextLine/>Come, not to so-journ, but abide with me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need thy presence ev`ry passing hour;<BON:nextLine/>What but thy grace can foil the tempter's pow`r:<BON:nextLine/>Who, like thyself, my guide and stay can be?<BON:nextLine/>Thro` cloud and sunshine, Lord, abide with me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-29, AH-40, SDAH-50)
Title: Abide With Me

Lyrics: Day is dying in the west;<BON:nextLine/>Heav`n is touching earth with rest:<BON:nextLine/>Wait and worship while the night<BON:nextLine/>Sets her evening lamps alight<BON:nextLine/>Thro` all the sky <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Holy, holy, holy, Lord of Hosts!<BON:nextLine/>Heaven and earth are full of Thee!<BON:nextLine/>Heaven and earth are passing<BON:nextLine/>Thee, O, Lord most high. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord of life, beneath the dome<BON:nextLine/>Of the universe, thy home,<BON:nextLine/>Gather us, who seek Thy face,<BON:nextLine/>To the fold of Thy embrace,<BON:nextLine/>For Thou art nigh <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>While the deep`ning shadows fall,<BON:nextLine/>Heart of love, enfold us all;<BON:nextLine/>Thro` the glory and the grace<BON:nextLine/>Of the stars that veil thy face,<BON:nextLine/>Our hearts ascend. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When forever from our sight,<BON:nextLine/>Pass the stars, the day, the night,<BON:nextLine/>Lord of angles our eyes<BON:nextLine/>Let eternal morning rise,<BON:nextLine/>And shadows end. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-30, AH-41, SDAH-51)
Title: Day Is Dying In The West

Lyrics: Sun of my soul, O Saviour dear!<BON:nextLine/>It is not night if thou be near:<BON:nextLine/>O may no earth-born arise <BON:nextLine/>To hide thee from thy servants eyes <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When soft the dews of kindly sleep<BON:nextLine/>My weary eyelids gently steep,<BON:nextLine/>Be my last thought-how sweet to rest<BON:nextLine/>Forever on my Savior's breast! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Abide with me from morn till eve,<BON:nextLine/>For without thee I cannot live;<BON:nextLine/>Abide with me when night is nigh,<BON:nextLine/>For without thee I dare not die. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Be near and bless me when I wake,<BON:nextLine/>Ere thro` the world my way I take;<BON:nextLine/>Till in the ocean of thy love<BON:nextLine/>I lose myself in heaven above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-31, AH-35, SDAH-502)
Title: Sun Of My Soul

Lyrics: The Lord's our rock, in him we hide,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm<BON:nextLine/>Secure whatever may betide,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Mighty rock in a weary land,<BON:nextLine/>Cooling Shade on then burning sand,<BON:nextLine/>Faithful guide for the pilgrim band,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A shade by day defence by night,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm;<BON:nextLine/>No fears alarm, no foes affright,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The raging floods may round us beat,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm;<BON:nextLine/>We find in God a safe retreat,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O Rock divine, O refuges dear,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm;<BON:nextLine/>Be thou our helper, ever near,<BON:nextLine/>A shelter in the time of storm. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-32, AH-211, SDAH-528)
Title: The Lord`s Our Rock

Lyrics: He leadeth me !O blessed tho`t!<BON:nextLine/>O words with heav`nly comfort fraught!<BON:nextLine/>Whate`er I do, wherever I be,<BON:nextLine/>still `tis God's hand that leadeth me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>He leadeth me, he leadeth me,<BON:nextLine/>By his own hand he leadeth me:<BON:nextLine/>His faithful fol`wer i would be,<BON:nextLine/>For by his hand he leadeth me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sometimes `mid scenes of deepest gloom,<BON:nextLine/>sometimes where Eden`s bowers bloom<BON:nextLine/>By waters still, o`er troubled sea,-<BON:nextLine/>still `tis his hand that leadeth me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord I would clasp thy hand in mine,<BON:nextLine/>nor ever murmur or repine,<BON:nextLine/>Content whatever lot I see,<BON:nextLine/>since `tis my God that leadeth me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And when my task on earth is done,<BON:nextLine/>when by thy grace the victory`s won,<BON:nextLine/>E`en death`s cold wave I will not flee,<BON:nextLine/>since God thro` Jordan leadeth me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-33, AH-292, SDAH-537)
Title: He Leadeth Me

Lyrics: When peace like a river attendeth my way,<BON:nextLine/>When sorrows like sea billows roll;<BON:nextLine/>Whatever my lot, Thou hast taught me to say,<BON:nextLine/>"It is well, it is well with my soul." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>It is well... with my soul<BON:nextLine/>It is well; it is well <BON:nextLine/>with my soul. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho` Satan should buffet, tho` trials should come,<BON:nextLine/>Let this blest assurance control,<BON:nextLine/>That Christ hath regarded my helpless estate,<BON:nextLine/>And hath shed his own blood for my soul. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My sin- O the bliss of the glorious tho`t! -<BON:nextLine/>My sin, not in part, but the whole,<BON:nextLine/>Is nailed to his cross and I bear it no more;<BON:nextLine/>Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, O my soul! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And, Lord, haste the day when the faith shall be sight<BON:nextLine/>The clouds be rolled back as a scroll,<BON:nextLine/>The trump shall resound, and the Lord shall descend;<BON:nextLine/>"Even so"- it is well with my soul <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-34, AH-250, SDAH-530)
Title: When Peace Like A River

Lyrics: What a fellowship, what a joy divine,<BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms;<BON:nextLine/>What a blessedness, what a peace is mine,<BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Lea----------ning, Lea-----------ning,<BON:nextLine/>(Leaning on Jesus Leaning on Jesus)<BON:nextLine/>Safe and secure from all alarms;<BON:nextLine/>Lea----------ning, Lea-----------ning,<BON:nextLine/>(Leaning on Jesus, Leaning on Jesus) <BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way,<BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms;<BON:nextLine/>O how bright the path grows from day to day,<BON:nextLine/>leaning on the everlasting arms. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>What have I to dread, what have I to dread,<BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms;<BON:nextLine/>I have blessedness with my Lord so near,<BON:nextLine/>Leaning on the everlasting arms. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-35, AH-261, SDAH-469)
Title: What A Fellowship

Lyrics: My faith looks up to thee,<BON:nextLine/>Thou Lamb of Calvary, Saviour divine!<BON:nextLine/>Now hear me while I pray,<BON:nextLine/>Take all my guilt away,<BON:nextLine/>O let me from this day Be wholly thine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>May thy rich grace impart,<BON:nextLine/>Strength to my fainting heart,<BON:nextLine/>My zeal inspire;<BON:nextLine/>As thou hast died for me, O, may my love<BON:nextLine/>To thee, Pure, warm, and changeless be,<BON:nextLine/>A living fire. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>While life's dark maze I tread,<BON:nextLine/>And griefs around me spread.<BON:nextLine/>Be thou my guide; Bid darkness turn to day<BON:nextLine/>Wipe sorrow's Tears away,<BON:nextLine/>Nor let me ever stray <BON:nextLine/>From thee aside. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-36, AH-204, SDAH-517)
Title: My Faith Looks Up To Thee

Lyrics: Nearer,my God,to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to thee!<BON:nextLine/>E'en tho' it be a cross<BON:nextLine/>That raiseth me! <BON:nextLine/>Still all my song shall be,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho' like a wonderer, Day-light all gone,<BON:nextLine/>Darkness be over me,<BON:nextLine/>My rest a stone; <BON:nextLine/>Yet in my dreams I'd be <BON:nextLine/>Nearer my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There let the way appear, Steps up to heav'n,<BON:nextLine/>All that thou sendest me<BON:nextLine/>In mercy giv'n; Angels to beckon me,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then, with my watching tho'ts Bright with thy praise,<BON:nextLine/>Out of my stormy griefs, Bethel I'll raise;<BON:nextLine/>So by my woes to be,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my God to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Or, if on joyful wing Cleaving the sky,<BON:nextLine/>Sun, moon, and stars forgot<BON:nextLine/>Upward I fly, Still all my song shall be,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my God, to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my God, to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-37, AH-312, SDAH-473)
Title: Nearer, My God To Thee

Lyrics: Firmly stand for God, in the world's mad strife<BON:nextLine/>Tho' the bleak winds roar, and the waves beat high;<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the Rock alone giveth strength and life,<BON:nextLine/>When the hosts of sin are high. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Let us stand on the Rock,<BON:nextLine/>Firmly stand on the Rock,<BON:nextLine/>On the Rock of Christ alone;<BON:nextLine/>If the strife we endure,<BON:nextLine/>We shall stand secure,<BON:nextLine/>‘Mid the throng who surrounds the Throne. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Firmly stand for Right, with a motive pure,<BON:nextLine/>With a true heart bold, and a faith e'er strong;<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the Rock alone giveth triumph sure,<BON:nextLine/>O'er the world's array of wrong. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Firmly stand for Truth, it will serve you best,<BON:nextLine/>Tho' it waiteth long, it is sure at last;<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the Rock alone giveth peace and rest,<BON:nextLine/>When the storms of life are past. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-38, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Stand On The Rock

Lyrics: My hope is built on nothing less,<BON:nextLine/>Than Jesus' blood and righteousness<BON:nextLine/>I dare not trust the sweetest frame,<BON:nextLine/>But wholly lean on Jesus' name. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand;<BON:nextLine/>All other ground is sinking sand,<BON:nextLine/>All other ground is sinking sand. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When darkness seems to veil his face,<BON:nextLine/>I rest on his unchanging grace;<BON:nextLine/>In ev'ry high and stormy gale,<BON:nextLine/>My anchor holds within the vail. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>His oath, his covenant, and blood,<BON:nextLine/>Support me in the whelming flood;<BON:nextLine/>When all around my soul gives way,<BON:nextLine/>He then is all my hope and stay. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When he shall come with trumpet sound,<BON:nextLine/>O may I then in him be found<BON:nextLine/>Clad in his righteousness alone,<BON:nextLine/>Faultless to stand before the throne.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-39, AH-212, SDAH-522)
Title: My Hope Is Built

Lyrics: When we walk with the Lord,<BON:nextLine/>In the light of his word,<BON:nextLine/>What a glory he sheds on our way!<BON:nextLine/>While we do his good will,<BON:nextLine/>He abides with us still,<BON:nextLine/>And with all who will trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Trust and obey,<BON:nextLine/>for there's no other way,<BON:nextLine/>To be happy in Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>but to trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not a shadow can rise, <BON:nextLine/>Not a cloud in the skies,<BON:nextLine/>But his smile quickly drives it away;<BON:nextLine/>Not a doubt nor a fear,<BON:nextLine/>Not a sigh or a tear,<BON:nextLine/>Can abide while we trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not a burden we bear,<BON:nextLine/>Not a sorrow we share,<BON:nextLine/>But our toil he doth richly repay;<BON:nextLine/>Not a grief nor a loss,<BON:nextLine/>Not a frown nor cross,<BON:nextLine/>But is blest if we trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>But we never can prove, <BON:nextLine/>The delights of his love,<BON:nextLine/>Until all on the alter we lay;<BON:nextLine/>For the favor he shows,<BON:nextLine/>And the joy he bestows,<BON:nextLine/>Are for them who will trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then in fellowship sweet, <BON:nextLine/>We will sit at his feet,<BON:nextLine/>Or we'll walk by his side in the way; <BON:nextLine/>What he says we will do,<BON:nextLine/>Where he sends we will go,<BON:nextLine/>Never fear, only trust and obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-40, AH-223, SDAH-590)
Title: Trust And Obey

Lyrics: God be with you till we meet again;<BON:nextLine/>By his counsels guide uphold you<BON:nextLine/>With his sheep securely fold you;<BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Till we meet------------------ Till we meet,<BON:nextLine/>(Till we meet, Till we meet again) <BON:nextLine/>Till we meet at Jesus' feet. (till we meet)<BON:nextLine/>Till we meet------------------ Till we meet<BON:nextLine/>(Till we meet, Till we meet again) <BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again; <BON:nextLine/>‘Neath his wings protecting hide <BON:nextLine/>you, Daily manna still provide you,<BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again;<BON:nextLine/>When life's perils thick confound <BON:nextLine/>you, Put his arms unfailing round you;<BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again;<BON:nextLine/>Keep love's banner floating o'er you,<BON:nextLine/>Smite death's threat'ning wave before you;<BON:nextLine/>God be with you till we meet again <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-41, AH-479, SDAH-65)
Title: God Be With You

Lyrics: With friends on earth we meet in gladness,<BON:nextLine/>While swift the moments fly<BON:nextLine/>Yet ever comes the thot' of sadness,<BON:nextLine/>That we must say "Good-by" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>We'll never say good-by in heav'n,<BON:nextLine/>We'll never say good-by, <BON:nextLine/>In that fair land of joy and song,<BON:nextLine/>We'll never say good-by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>How joyful is the hope that lingers,<BON:nextLine/>When loved ones say "Farewell"<BON:nextLine/>That we, when all earth's toils are ended,<BON:nextLine/>With them shall ever dwell. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>No parting words shall e'er be spoken,<BON:nextLine/>In yonder home so fair,<BON:nextLine/>But songs of joy, and peace, and gladness,<BON:nextLine/>We'll sing forever there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-42, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: We'll Never Say Good-By

Lyrics: Asleep in Jesus! Blessed sleep,<BON:nextLine/>From which none ever wake to weep;<BON:nextLine/>A calm and undisturbed repose,<BON:nextLine/>Unbroken by the last of foes. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Asleep in Jesus! O how sweet,<BON:nextLine/>To be for such a slumber meet;<BON:nextLine/>With holy confidence to rest,<BON:nextLine/>In hope of being ever blest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Asleep in Jesus! Peaceful rest,<BON:nextLine/>Whose waking is supremely blest;<BON:nextLine/>No fear, no woe, shall dim that hour <BON:nextLine/>That manifests the Saviour's pow'r <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Asleep in Jesus! Soon to rise,<BON:nextLine/>When the last trump shall rend the skies<BON:nextLine/>Then burst the fetters of the tomb,<BON:nextLine/>And wake in full, immortal bloom <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-43, AH-477, SDAH-//)
Title: Asleep In Jesus

Lyrics: When my life-work is ended, and I cross the swelling tide,<BON:nextLine/>When "this mortal puts on immortality;" <BON:nextLine/>I shall know my Redeemer When I reach the other side,<BON:nextLine/>And his smile will be the first to welcome me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I shall know ……. Him, I shall know him,<BON:nextLine/>As redeemed by his side I shall stand,<BON:nextLine/>I shall know …….. Him, I shall know him<BON:nextLine/>By the print of the nails in his hands. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, the soul-thrilling rapture when I view his blessed face,<BON:nextLine/>And the luster of his kindly beaming eye;<BON:nextLine/>How my full heart will praise him for the mercy, love, and grace<BON:nextLine/>That prepares for me a mansion in the sky. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, the dear ones departed! How the tender mem'ries come,<BON:nextLine/>As the farewell at the river I recall;<BON:nextLine/>In the sweet vales of Eden we shall meet no more to roam;<BON:nextLine/>But I long to see my Saviour first of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thro' the gates to the city, in a robe of spotless white,<BON:nextLine/>He will lead me where no tears shall never fall; <BON:nextLine/>In the glad song of ages I shall mingle with delight;<BON:nextLine/>But I long to meet my Saviour first of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-44, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: When My Life-Work Is Ended

Lyrics: Give me the Bible, star of gladness gleaming,<BON:nextLine/>To cheer the wand'rer lone and tempest tossed;<BON:nextLine/>No storm can hide that peaceful radiance beaming,<BON:nextLine/>Since Jesus came to seek and save the lost. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Give me the Bible, Holy message shining,<BON:nextLine/>Thy light shall guide me in the narrow way.<BON:nextLine/>Precept and promise, law and love combining,<BON:nextLine/>Till night shall vanish in eternal day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give me the Bible when my heart is broken,<BON:nextLine/>When sin and grief have filled my soul with fear;<BON:nextLine/>Give me the precious words by Jesus spoken,<BON:nextLine/>Hold up faith's lamp to show my Saviour near. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give me the Bible, all my steps enlighten,<BON:nextLine/>Teach me the danger of these realms below;<BON:nextLine/>That lamp of safety, o'er the gloom shall brighten,<BON:nextLine/>That light alone the path of peace can show. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give me the Bible, lamp of life immortal,<BON:nextLine/>Hold up that splendor by the open grave;<BON:nextLine/>Show me the light from heaven's shining portal,<BON:nextLine/>Show me the glory gilding Jordan's wave. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-45, AH-164, SDAH-272)
Title: Give Me The Bible

Lyrics: Sing then over again to me, Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>Let me more of their beauty see, Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>Words of life and beauty, Teach me faith and duty. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Beautiful words, wonderful words,<BON:nextLine/>Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>Beautiful words, wonderful words,<BON:nextLine/>Wonderful words of life. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Christ the blessed One, gives to all, Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>Sinner, list to the loving call, Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>All so freely give, Wooing us to heaven, <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sweetly echo the gospel call, Wonderful of words life;<BON:nextLine/>Offer pardon and peace to all, Wonderful words of life;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, only Saviour, Sanctify forever, <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-46, AH-162, SDAH-286)
Title: Sing Them Over Again To Me

Lyrics: On Jordan's stormy banks I stand,<BON:nextLine/>And cast a wish-ful eye.<BON:nextLine/>To Canaan's fair and happy land,<BON:nextLine/>Where my possessions lie <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>We will rest in that fair and happy land …(by and by).<BON:nextLine/>Just across on the evergreen shore….(ever green shore).<BON:nextLine/>Sing the song of Moses and the Lamb by and by,<BON:nextLine/>And dwell with Jesus evermore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O'er all those wide extended plains<BON:nextLine/>Shines one eternal day,<BON:nextLine/>There Christ, the Sun, forever reigns, <BON:nextLine/>And scatters night away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When shall I reach that happy place,<BON:nextLine/>And be forever blest?<BON:nextLine/>When shall I see my Father's face,<BON:nextLine/>And in his kingdom rest? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Fill'd with delight, my ruptured soul<BON:nextLine/>Would here no longer stay.<BON:nextLine/>Tho' Jordan's waves around me roll,<BON:nextLine/>Fearless I'd launch away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-47, AH-419, SDAH-620)
Title: On Jordan's Stormy Banks

Lyrics: O there'll be joy when the work is done,<BON:nextLine/>Joy when the reapers gather home,<BON:nextLine/>Bringing the sheaves at set of sun<BON:nextLine/>To the New Jerusalem. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Joy ---------- joy, there'll be joy by and by,<BON:nextLine/>(Joy joy joy)<BON:nextLine/>Joy------ joy, where the joys never die;<BON:nextLine/>(Joy, joy, joy)<BON:nextLine/>Joy------- joy; for the day draweth nigh<BON:nextLine/>(Joy, joy, joy)<BON:nextLine/>When the workers gather home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sweet are the songs that we hope to sing,<BON:nextLine/>Grateful the thanks our hearts shall bring,<BON:nextLine/>Praising the forever Christ our King,<BON:nextLine/>In the New Jerusalem. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Pure are the joys that await us there,<BON:nextLine/>Many the golden mansions fair,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus himself doth them prepare,<BON:nextLine/>In the New Jerusalem. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-48, AH-//, SDAH-430)
Title: Joy By And By

Lyrics: One sweetly solemn tho't, Comes to me o'er and o'er!<BON:nextLine/>I'm nearer to my home today, Than e'er I've been before. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Nearer my home, Nearer my home,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer my home today, today,<BON:nextLine/>Than e'er been before <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nearer my Father's home, Where many mansions be!<BON:nextLine/>Nearer the throne where Jesus reigns,<BON:nextLine/>Nearer the crystal sea <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nearer my going home, Laying my burdens down,<BON:nextLine/>Leaving my cross of heavy grief,<BON:nextLine/>Wearing my starry crown. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-49, AH-324, SDAH-//)
Title: One Sweetly Solemn Thought

Lyrics: There's a land that is fairer than day, <BON:nextLine/>And by faith we can see it afar;<BON:nextLine/>For our Father waits over the way<BON:nextLine/>To prepare us a dwelling place there <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>In the sweet --------by and by---<BON:nextLine/>We shall meet on that beautiful shore<BON:nextLine/>In the sweet ---by and by--- <BON:nextLine/>We shall meet on that beautiful shore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We shall sing on that beautiful shore,<BON:nextLine/>The melodious songs of the blest<BON:nextLine/>And our spirits shall sorrow no more,<BON:nextLine/>Not a sigh for the blessing of rest <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To our bountiful Father above,<BON:nextLine/>We will offer a tribute of praise,<BON:nextLine/>For the glorious gift of His love, <BON:nextLine/>And the blessings that hallow our days <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-50, AH-//, SDAH-428)
Title: Sweet By And By

Lyrics: Baptize us anew, With power from on high,<BON:nextLine/>With love, oh refresh us! Dear Savior, draw nigh<BON:nextLine/>We humbly beseech thee, Lord Jesus we pray<BON:nextLine/>With love and the spirit baptize us today <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Unworthy we cry, Unholy unclean,<BON:nextLine/>O wash us and cleanse us, from sin's guilty stain<BON:nextLine/>We humbly beseech thee, Lord Jesus we pray<BON:nextLine/>With love and the spirit baptize us today <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O heavenly dove, Descend from on high<BON:nextLine/>We plead thy rich blessings, In mercy draw nigh<BON:nextLine/>We humbly beseech thee, Lord Jesus we pray<BON:nextLine/>With love and the spirit baptize us today <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O list the glad voice, From heaven it came<BON:nextLine/>Thou art my beloved, Well pleased I am<BON:nextLine/>We praise thee; we bless thee, dear Lamb that was slain<BON:nextLine/>We laud and adore thee, Amen and Amen <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-51, AH-155, SDAH-258)
Title: Baptize Us Anew

Lyrics: Come, thou fount of every blessing,Tune my heart to sing thy grace;<BON:nextLine/>Streams of mercy, never ceasing, call for songs of loudest praise.<BON:nextLine/>Teach me ever to adore thee, may I still thy goodness prove,<BON:nextLine/>While the hope of endless glory, Fills my heart with joy and love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Here I raise my Ebenezer, hither by thy help I've come;<BON:nextLine/>And I hope by thy good pleasure, Safely to arrive at home.<BON:nextLine/>Jesus sought me when a stranger, Wand'ring from the fold of God;<BON:nextLine/>He to rescue me from all danger, Interposed his precious blood <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, to grace how great a debtor, daily I'm constrained to be!<BON:nextLine/>Let thy goodness like a fetter; Bind me closer still to thee;<BON:nextLine/>Prone to wander, Lord I feel it, Prone to leave the God I love,<BON:nextLine/>Here's my heart, O, take and seal it; Seal it for thy courts above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-52, AH-197, SDAH-334)
Title: Come, Thou Fount Of Every Blessing

Lyrics: Holy Spirit, faithful Guide, Ever near the Christian's side,<BON:nextLine/>Gently lead us by the hand, Pilgrims in a desert land,<BON:nextLine/>Weary souls for e'er rejoice, When they hear that sweetest voice,<BON:nextLine/>Whisper softly, "Wand'rer, come! Follow me I'll guide thee home <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ever present, truest friend, Ever near thine aid to land,<BON:nextLine/>Leave us not to doubt and fear, Groping on in darkness drear,<BON:nextLine/>When the storms are raging sore, Hearts grow faint, and hopes give o'er,<BON:nextLine/>Whispering softly, "Wand'rer come! Follow me I'll guide thee home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When our days of toil shall cease, Waiting still for sweet release,<BON:nextLine/>Nothing left but heaven and prayer, Wond'ring if our names are there<BON:nextLine/>Wading deep the dismal flood, Pleading naught but Jesus' blood.<BON:nextLine/>Whisper softly, "Wand'rer come, follow me I'll guide thee home" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-53, AH-148, SDAH-//)
Title: Holy Spirit, Faithful Guide

Lyrics: One thing I of the Lord desire, For all my paths have miry been,<BON:nextLine/>Be it by water or by fire, O make me clean, O make me clean <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>So wash me Thou-------- without, within,<BON:nextLine/>(Wash me, Thou, without, within)<BON:nextLine/>Or purge with fire, --------- If that must be,<BON:nextLine/>(Or purge with fire, If that must be)<BON:nextLine/>No matter how, ---------- if only sin.<BON:nextLine/>(Any how if only sin)<BON:nextLine/>Die out in me, die out in me. (die out in me) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If clearer visions Thou impart, Grateful and glad my soul shall be,<BON:nextLine/>But yet to have a purer heart, Is more to me, Is more to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yes, only as this heart is clean, May larger vision yet be mine,<BON:nextLine/>For mirrored in Thy life are seen, The things divine, The things divine <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I watch to shun the miry way, And snatch the springs of guilty thot', But watch and struggle as I may, Pure I am not, Pure I am not. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-54, AH-243, SDAH-//)
Title: One Thing I Know Of The Lord

Lyrics: Have been to Jesus for the cleansing pow'r?<BON:nextLine/>Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?<BON:nextLine/>Are you fully trusting in His grace this hour? Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd ----------------- in the blood?<BON:nextLine/>(Are you wash'd) (in the blood)<BON:nextLine/>In the soul-cleansing blood of the Lamb?<BON:nextLine/>Are your garments spotless, are they white as snow!<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Are you walking daily by the Saviour's side?<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb?<BON:nextLine/>Do you rest each moment in the Crucified?<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When the bridegroom cometh will your robes be white?<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb?<BON:nextLine/>Will your soul be ready for the mansions bright?<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lay aside the garments that are stained with sin,<BON:nextLine/>Are you wash'd in the blood of the Lamb?<BON:nextLine/>There's a fountain flowing for the soul unclean,<BON:nextLine/>O be wash'd in the blood of the Lamb! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-55, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Are You Washed In The Blood?

Lyrics: I've wandered far away from God, now I'm coming home;<BON:nextLine/>The paths of sin too long I've trod, Lord, I'm coming home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Coming home, coming home, Never more to roam;<BON:nextLine/>Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord I'm coming home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I've wasted many precious years, Now I'm coming home;<BON:nextLine/>I now repent with bitter tears; Lord, I'm coming home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I'm tired of sin and straying, Lord, Now I'm coming home;<BON:nextLine/>I'll trust Thy love, believe Thy word; Lord, I'm coming home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My only hope, my only plea, Now I'm coming home;<BON:nextLine/>That Jesus died, and died for me; Lord, I'm coming home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-56, AH-186, SDAH-296)
Title: Lord, I'm Coming Home

Lyrics: "Whosoever heareth", shout, shout the sound!<BON:nextLine/>Send the blessed tidings all the world around;<BON:nextLine/>Spread the joyful news wherever man is found;<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will may come." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will, whosever will,"<BON:nextLine/>Send the proclamation over vale and hill;<BON:nextLine/>"Tis a loving Father calls the wand'rer home;"<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will may come." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever cometh need not delay,<BON:nextLine/>Now the door is open, enter while you may;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is the true, the only Living Way;<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will may come." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will," the promise secure,<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will," for ever must endure;<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will," Tis life for ever more;<BON:nextLine/>"Whosoever will may come." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-57, AH-411, SDAH-//)
Title: "Whosoever Heareth"

Lyrics: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name! Let angels prostrate fall;<BON:nextLine/>Bring forth the royal diadem, And crown Him Lord of all;<BON:nextLine/>Bring forth the royal diadem, And crown Him Lord of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ye chosen seed of Israel's race, A remnant weak and small;<BON:nextLine/>Hail Him who saves you by His grace, And crown Him Lord of all.<BON:nextLine/>Hail Him who saves you by His grace, And crown Him Lord of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let ev'ry kindred, ev'ry tribe, On this terrestrial ball;<BON:nextLine/>To Him all majesty ascribe, And crown Him Lord of all;<BON:nextLine/>To Him all majesty ascribe, And crown Him Lord of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O that with yonder sacred throng, We at His feet may fall;<BON:nextLine/>We'll join the everlasting song, And crown Him Lord of all;<BON:nextLine/>We'll join the everlasting song, And crown Him Lord of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-58, AH-179, SDAH-//)
Title: All Hail The Power Of Jesus' Name

Lyrics: Jesus, lover of my soul, Let me to Thy bosom fly;<BON:nextLine/>While the billows near me roll, While the tempest still is high!<BON:nextLine/>Hide me, O my Saviour hide, Till the storm of life be past;<BON:nextLine/>Safe into the haven guide, Oh, receive my soul at last! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Other refuge have I none. Hangs my helpless soul on Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Leave, O leave me not alone, Still support and comfort me;<BON:nextLine/>All my trust on Thee is stayed, All my help from Thee I bring;<BON:nextLine/>Cover my defenceless head, With the shadow of Thy wing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou, O Christ, art all I want, More than all in Thee I find;<BON:nextLine/>Raise the fallen, cheer the faint, Heal the sick and lead the blind;<BON:nextLine/>Just and holy is Thy name; I am all unrighteousness;<BON:nextLine/>Vile and full of sin I am,nThou art full of truth and grace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Plenteous grace with Thee is found, Grace to cover all my sin; Let the healing streams abound, Make and keep me pure within; Thou of life the fountain art, Freely let me take of Thee; Spring Thou up within my heart, Rise to all eternity! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-59, AH-126, SDAH-229)
Title: Jesus, Lover Of My Soul

Lyrics: Jesus, thou joy of loving hearts! Thou fount of life! Thou light of men<BON:nextLine/>From the best bliss that earth imparts, We turn unfill'd to thee again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We taste thee, O thou Living Bread, And long to feast upon thee still;<BON:nextLine/>We drink of thee, the Fountain-head, And thirst our souls from thee to fill. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Our restless spirits yearn for thee, Where'er our changeful lot is cast,<BON:nextLine/>Glad, when thy gracious smile we see, Blest, when our faith can hold thee fast. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O Jesus, ever with us stay; Make all our moments calm and bright;<BON:nextLine/>Chase the dark night of sin away, Shed o'er the world thy holy light. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-60, AH-128, SDAH-242)
Title: Jesus, Thou Joy Of Loving Hearts

Lyrics: More about Jesus I would know,<BON:nextLine/>More of His grace to others show;<BON:nextLine/>More of His saving fullness see, <BON:nextLine/>More of His love who died for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>More, more about Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>More, more about Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>More of His saving fullness see,<BON:nextLine/>More of His love who died for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>More about Jesus let me learn,<BON:nextLine/>More of His holy will discern;<BON:nextLine/>Spirit of God my teacher be,<BON:nextLine/>Showing the things of Christ to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>More about Jesus; in His word,<BON:nextLine/>Holding communion with my Lord;<BON:nextLine/>Hearing His voice in ev'ry line,<BON:nextLine/>Making each faithful saying mine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>More about Jesus; on His throne,<BON:nextLine/>Riches in glory all His own;<BON:nextLine/>More of His kingdom's sure increase,<BON:nextLine/>More of His coming, Prince of peace <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-61, AH-109, SDAH-245)
Title: More About Jesus

Lyrics: My Jesus, I love thee, I know thou art mine;<BON:nextLine/>For thee all the follies of sin I resign;<BON:nextLine/>My gracious Redeemer, my Saviour art thou,<BON:nextLine/>If ever I loved thee, my Jesus ‘tis now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I love thee because thou hast first loved me;<BON:nextLine/>And purchased my pardon on Calvary's tree;<BON:nextLine/>I Love thee for wearing the thorns on thy brow;<BON:nextLine/>If ever I loved thee, my Jesus, ‘tis now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I'll love thee in life, and I'll love thee in death;<BON:nextLine/>I'll praise thee as long as thou lendest me breath;<BON:nextLine/>And say when the death-dew lies cold on my bro<BON:nextLine/>If ever I loved thee, my Jesus ‘tis now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>In mansions of glory and endless delight;<BON:nextLine/>I'll ever adore thee in heaven so bright;<BON:nextLine/>And sing with the glittering crown on my brow;<BON:nextLine/>If ever I loved thee, my Jesus ‘tis now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-62, AH-234, SDAH-321)
Title: My Jesus I Love Thee

Lyrics: What can wash away my sin?<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>What can make me pure within?<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Oh, precious is the flow,<BON:nextLine/>That makes me white as snow;<BON:nextLine/>No other fount I know, <BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>For my cleansing this I see;<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>For my pardon this my plea;<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hot-ing can for sin atone; <BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>Naught of good that I have done;<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>This is all my hope and peace; <BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>This is all my righteousness; <BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Glory! Glory! thus I sing;<BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>All my praise for this I bring; <BON:nextLine/>Nothing but the blood of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-63, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: What Can Wash Away My Sin?

Lyrics: Are you weary, are you heavy hearted?<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>Are you grieving over joys departed?<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus alone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>He is a friend that's well known<BON:nextLine/>You've no other such a friend or brother,<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus alone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Do the tears flow down your cheeks unbidden?<BON:nextLine/>(Tell it to Jesus) (Tell it to Jesus)<BON:nextLine/>Have you sins that to the world are hidden? <BON:nextLine/>Tell it Jesus alone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Do you fear the gath'ring clouds of sorrow?<BON:nextLine/>(Tell it Jesus) (Tell it Jesus)<BON:nextLine/>Are you anxious what shall be tomorrow?<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus alone <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Are you troubled at the tho't of dying?<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>For Christ's coming kingdom are you sighing?<BON:nextLine/>Tell it to Jesus alone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-64, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Tell It To Jesus

Lyrics: ‘Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Just to take Him at His word;<BON:nextLine/>Just to rest upon His promise; <BON:nextLine/>Just to know, "Thus saith the Lord." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him; <BON:nextLine/>How I've prov'd Him o'er and o'er! <BON:nextLine/>Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to trust in Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Just to trust His cleansing blood;<BON:nextLine/>Just in simple faith to plunge me,<BON:nextLine/>‘Neat the healing, cleansing flood. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yes, ‘tis sweet to trust in Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Just from sin and self to cease;<BON:nextLine/>Just from Jesus simply taking,<BON:nextLine/>Life, and rest, and joy, and peace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I'm so glad I learned to trust Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Precious Jesus, Saviour, Friend;<BON:nextLine/>And I know that Thou art with me, <BON:nextLine/>Wilt be with me till the end. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-65, AH-201, SDAH-524)
Title: ‘Tis So Sweet To Trust In Jesus

Lyrics: O, happy day! That fixed choice, <BON:nextLine/>On thee, my Saviour and my God;<BON:nextLine/>Well may this glowing heart rejoice,<BON:nextLine/>And tell its raptures all abroad <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Happy day, happy day,<BON:nextLine/>When Jesus washed my sins away!<BON:nextLine/>He taught me how to and pray,<BON:nextLine/>And live Rejoicing ev'ry day,<BON:nextLine/>Happy day! Happy day!<BON:nextLine/>When Jesus washed my sins away! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis done, the great transaction's done;<BON:nextLine/>I am my Lord's and he is mine<BON:nextLine/>He drew me and I followed on, <BON:nextLine/>Rejoiced to own the call divine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now rest, my long divided heart,<BON:nextLine/>Fixed on this blissful center rest;<BON:nextLine/>Nor ever from thy Lord depart, <BON:nextLine/>With him ev'ry good possessed <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-66, AH-262, SDAH-//)
Title: Happy Day

Lyrics: Come, we that love the Lord,<BON:nextLine/>And let our joys be known,<BON:nextLine/>Join in a song with sweet accord,<BON:nextLine/>Join in a song with sweet accord;<BON:nextLine/>And thus surround the throne, <BON:nextLine/>And thus surround the throne. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>We're marching to Zion,<BON:nextLine/>Beautiful, beautiful Zion;<BON:nextLine/>We're marching upward to Zion,<BON:nextLine/>(heavenly Zion)<BON:nextLine/>The beautiful city of God. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let those refuse to sing, <BON:nextLine/>Who never knew our God,<BON:nextLine/>But children of the heav'nly King,<BON:nextLine/>But children of the Heav'nly King<BON:nextLine/>May speak their joys abroad,<BON:nextLine/>May speak their joys abroad. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The hill of Zion yields,<BON:nextLine/>A thousand sacred sweets,<BON:nextLine/>Before we reach the heav'nly fields,<BON:nextLine/>Before we reach the heav'nly fields.<BON:nextLine/>Or walk the golden streets,<BON:nextLine/>Or walk the golden streets. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then let our songs abound, <BON:nextLine/>And ev'ry tear be dry;<BON:nextLine/>We're marching thro' Immanuel's ground,<BON:nextLine/>We're marching thro' Immanuel's ground,<BON:nextLine/>To fairer worlds on high,<BON:nextLine/>To fairer worlds on high. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-67, AH-435, SDAH-422)
Title: Come We That Love The Lord

Lyrics: Redeemed! How I love to proclaim it!<BON:nextLine/>Redeemed by the blood of the lamb;<BON:nextLine/>Redeemed thro' his infinite mercy<BON:nextLine/>His child and forever I am. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Redeemed!, redeemed,<BON:nextLine/>Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;<BON:nextLine/>Redeemed, redeemed,<BON:nextLine/>His child and forever I am. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Redeemed! And so happy in Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>No language my rapture can tell;<BON:nextLine/>I know that the light of his presence,<BON:nextLine/>With me doth continually dwell. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I think of my blessed Redeemer, <BON:nextLine/>I think of him all the day long;<BON:nextLine/>I sing; for I cannot be silent;<BON:nextLine/>His love is the theme of my song. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I know I shall see in his beauty,<BON:nextLine/>The King in whose law I delight;<BON:nextLine/>Who lovingly guardeth my footsteps,<BON:nextLine/>And giveth songs in the night. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I know there's a crown that is waiting,<BON:nextLine/>In yonder bright mansion for me;<BON:nextLine/>And soon, with the spirits made perfect,<BON:nextLine/>At home with the Lord I shall be. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-68, AH-195, SDAH-338)
Title: Redeemed! How I Love To Proclaim It!

Lyrics: We'll tarry by the living waters,<BON:nextLine/>The fountain pure and free;<BON:nextLine/>There Jesus waits to us welcome,<BON:nextLine/>A welcome sweet ‘twill be. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>We'll tarry by the living waters,<BON:nextLine/>Tarry by the living waters.<BON:nextLine/>Tarry by the living waters<BON:nextLine/>Tarry by the fount of life. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When weary with the toilsome journey,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis sweet to rest a while;<BON:nextLine/>Where crystal waters gently murmur,<BON:nextLine/>And sunny fountains smile. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then come to Christ, the living water,<BON:nextLine/>Thy strength will he restore; <BON:nextLine/>Come, taste the joy of his salvation,<BON:nextLine/>And drink to thirst no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-69, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: We'll Tarry By The Living Waters

Lyrics: When Jesus shall gather the nations,<BON:nextLine/>Before him at last to appear,<BON:nextLine/>Then how shall we stand in the Judgment,<BON:nextLine/>When summon'd our sentence to hear! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>He will gather the wheat in his garner,<BON:nextLine/>But the chaff will he scatter away;<BON:nextLine/>Then how shall we stand in the Judgment,<BON:nextLine/>Of the great resurrection day! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we hear, from the lips of the Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>The words faithful servant, well done; <BON:nextLine/>Or trembling with fear and with anguish,<BON:nextLine/>Be banished away from his throne! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He will smile when he looks on his children,<BON:nextLine/>And sees on the ransom'd his seal;<BON:nextLine/>He will clothe them in heavenly beauty,<BON:nextLine/>As low at his footstool they kneel. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Then let us be watching and waiting,<BON:nextLine/>With lamps burning steady and bright;<BON:nextLine/>When the Bridegroom shall call to the wedding, <BON:nextLine/>O may we be ready for flight! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thus living with hearts fixed on heaven,<BON:nextLine/>In patience we wait for the time,<BON:nextLine/>When the days of our pilgrimage ended,<BON:nextLine/>We'll bask in the presence divine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-70, AH-396, SDAH-//)
Title: When Jesus Shall Gather

Lyrics: Lord, I care not for riches, Neither silver nor gold;<BON:nextLine/>I would make sure of heaven,<BON:nextLine/>I would enter the fold; In the book of thy kingdom,<BON:nextLine/>With its pages so fair,<BON:nextLine/>Tell me, Jesus, my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Is my name written there? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Is my name written there,<BON:nextLine/>On the pages white and fair?<BON:nextLine/>In the book of thy kingdom, <BON:nextLine/>Is my name written there? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord, my sins they are many,<BON:nextLine/>Like the sands of the sea;<BON:nextLine/>But thy blood, O my Saviour is sufficient for me;<BON:nextLine/>For thy promise is written , In bright<BON:nextLine/>letters that glow, "Though your sins be as scarlet,<BON:nextLine/>I will make them like snow." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O that beautiful city, With its mansions of light,<BON:nextLine/>With its glorified beings In pure garments of white;<BON:nextLine/>Where no evil thing cometh, To despoil what is fair,<BON:nextLine/>Where the angels are watching,<BON:nextLine/>Is my name written there? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-71, AH-281, SDAH-368)
Title: Is My Name Written There?
