Lyrics: The judgment has set, the books have been opened;<BON:nextLine/>How shall we stand in that great day?<BON:nextLine/>When every thought, and word, and action,<BON:nextLine/>God, the righteous Judge, shall weigh? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>How shall we stand in that great day?<BON:nextLine/>How shall we stand in that great day?<BON:nextLine/>Shall we found before Him wanting?<BON:nextLine/>Or with our sins all washed away? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The work is begun with those who are sleeping,<BON:nextLine/>Soon will the living here be tried,<BON:nextLine/>Out of the book of God's remembrance,<BON:nextLine/>His decision to abide, <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, how shall we stand, that moment of searching,<BON:nextLine/>When all our sins those books reveal?<BON:nextLine/>When from that court, each case decided,<BON:nextLine/>Shall be granted no appeal? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-72, AH-378, SDAH-416)
Title: The Judgement Has Set

Lyrics: Called to the feast by the King are we,<BON:nextLine/>Sitting perhaps where his people be;<BON:nextLine/>How will it fare, friend, with thee and me,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in, brother,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in!<BON:nextLine/>How will it fare with thee and me,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Crowns on the head where the thorns have been,<BON:nextLine/>Glorified he who once died for men;<BON:nextLine/>Splendid the vision before us then,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Like lightning's flash will that instant show,<BON:nextLine/>Things hidden long from both friend and foe;<BON:nextLine/>Just what we are will each neighbor know,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Joyful his eye shall on each one rest,<BON:nextLine/>Who is in white wedding, garments dressed;<BON:nextLine/>Ah! Well for us if we stand the test,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Endless the sad separation then,<BON:nextLine/>Bitter the cry of deluded men;<BON:nextLine/>Awful that moment of anguish, <BON:nextLine/>When Christ the King comes in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord, grant us all, we implore thee, grace,<BON:nextLine/>So to await thee, each in his place;<BON:nextLine/>That we may fear not to see thy face,<BON:nextLine/>When the King comes in. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-73, AH-395, SDAH-//)
Title: Called To The Feast

Lyrics: Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness,<BON:nextLine/>Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve;<BON:nextLine/>Waiting for the harvest, and the time of reaping,<BON:nextLine/>We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Bringing in the sheaves, Bringing in the sheaves,<BON:nextLine/>We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves,<BON:nextLine/>Bringing in the sheaves, bringing in the sheaves,<BON:nextLine/>We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sowing in the sunshine, Sowing in the shadows,<BON:nextLine/>Fearing neither clouds nor winter's chilling breeze;<BON:nextLine/>By and by the harvest, and the labor ended,<BON:nextLine/>We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Going forth with weeping, sowing for the Master,<BON:nextLine/>Though the loss sustained our spirit often grieves;<BON:nextLine/>When our weeping's over, He will bid us welcome,<BON:nextLine/>We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-74, AH-363, SDAH-369)
Title: Sowing In The Morning

Lyrics: Hark! ‘tis the Shepherd's voice I hear,<BON:nextLine/>Out in the desert dark and drear,<BON:nextLine/>Calling the sheep who've gone astray,<BON:nextLine/>Far from the Shepherd's fold away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Bring them in, Bring them in,<BON:nextLine/>Bring them in from the fields of sin,<BON:nextLine/>Bring them in; Bring them in, <BON:nextLine/>Bring the wanderers to Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Who'll go and help the Shepherd kind, <BON:nextLine/>Help Him the wand'ring ones to find?<BON:nextLine/>Who'll bring them back into the fold,<BON:nextLine/>Where they'll be sheltered from the cold? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Out in the desert hear their cry,<BON:nextLine/>Out on the mountain wild and high,<BON:nextLine/>Hark! ‘tis the Master speaks to thee,<BON:nextLine/>"Go, find my sheep where'er they be. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-75, AH-347, SDAH-361)
Title: Hark! ‘Tis The Shepherds Voice

Lyrics: Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying<BON:nextLine/>Snatch them in pity from sin and the grave<BON:nextLine/>Weep o'er the erring one, Lift up the fallen,<BON:nextLine/>Tell them of Jesus, the mighty to save. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus is merciful, Jesus will save. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tho' they are slighting him, Still he is waiting,<BON:nextLine/>Waiting the penitent child to receive<BON:nextLine/>Plead with them earnestly, Plead with them gently;<BON:nextLine/>He will forgive if they only Believe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Down in the human heart, Crush'd by the tempter,<BON:nextLine/>Feelings lie buried that grace can restore;<BON:nextLine/>Touched by a loving heart, Wakened by kindness,<BON:nextLine/>Chords that were broken will Vibrate once more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Rescue the perishing; Duty demands it,<BON:nextLine/>Strength for thy labor the Lord will provide;<BON:nextLine/>Back to the narrow way, Patiently win them;<BON:nextLine/>Tell the poor wand'rer a Saviour has Died <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-76, AH-348, SDAH-367)
Title: Rescue The Perishing

Lyrics: I love to tell the story; Of unseen things above;<BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and his glory, <BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and his love; I love to tell the story, <BON:nextLine/>Because I know ‘tis true,<BON:nextLine/>It satisfies my longing, As nothing else can do. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I love to tell the story; <BON:nextLine/>‘Twill be my theme in glory,<BON:nextLine/>To tell the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and his love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I love to tell the story; More wonderful it seems,<BON:nextLine/>Than all the golden fancies,<BON:nextLine/>Of all our golden dreams; I love to tell the story,<BON:nextLine/>It did so much for me,<BON:nextLine/>And that is just the reason, I tell it now to thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I love to tell the story; ‘Tis pleasant to repeat,<BON:nextLine/>What seems each time I tell it,<BON:nextLine/>More wonderfully sweet; I love to tell the story,<BON:nextLine/>For some have never heard,The message of salvation,<BON:nextLine/>From God's own holy word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I love to tell the story; For those who know it best,<BON:nextLine/>Seem hungering and thirsting,<BON:nextLine/>To hear it like the rest; And when in scenes of glory, <BON:nextLine/>I sing the new, new song,‘Twill be the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>That I have loved so long. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-77, AH-95, SDAH-457)
Title: I Love To Tell The Story

Lyrics: Seeking the lost yes, kindly entreating,<BON:nextLine/>Wonderers on the mountains astray;<BON:nextLine/>"Come unto me," the message repeating, <BON:nextLine/>Words of the Master speaking today. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Going afar……upon the mountain……….<BON:nextLine/>(Going afar) (upon the mountain)<BON:nextLine/>Bringing the wan……d'rers back again…..<BON:nextLine/>(Bringing the wand'rers, the wand'rers back again.)<BON:nextLine/>Into the fold… of my Redeemer,…<BON:nextLine/>(Into the fold of my Redeemer)<BON:nextLine/>Jesus the Lamb……… For sinners slain.<BON:nextLine/>(Jesus the Lamb, the Lamb for sinners slain.) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Seeking the lost, and pointing to Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Soul that are weak and hearts that are sore<BON:nextLine/>Leading them forth in ways of salvation,<BON:nextLine/>Showing the path to life evermore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thus would I go, for Jesus hath called me,<BON:nextLine/>Him would I follow day unto day;<BON:nextLine/>Care for the dying, raise up the fallen,<BON:nextLine/>Pointing the lost to Jesus the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-78, AH-//, SDAH-373)
Title: Seeking The Lost

Lyrics: Far and near the fields are teeming,<BON:nextLine/>With the sheaves of ripened grain;<BON:nextLine/>Far and near their gold is gleaming,<BON:nextLine/>O'er the sunny slope and plain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Lord of harvest, send forth reapers!<BON:nextLine/>Hear us, Lord, to thee we cry,<BON:nextLine/>Send them now the sheaves to gather,<BON:nextLine/>Ere the harvest time pass by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Send them forth with morn's first beaming,<BON:nextLine/>Send them in the moon tide's glare;<BON:nextLine/>When the sun's last rays are streaming,<BON:nextLine/>Bid them gather ev'ry where. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O thou whom thy Lord is sending, <BON:nextLine/>Gather now the sheaves of gold;<BON:nextLine/>Heav'nward then at evening wending,<BON:nextLine/>Thou shalt come with joy untold. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-79, AH-338, SDAH-359)
Title: Far And Near

Lyrics: To the work! To the work! We are servants of God,<BON:nextLine/>Let us follow the path that our Master has trod;<BON:nextLine/>With the word of his counsel our strength to renew,<BON:nextLine/>Let us do with our might what our hands find to do <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Toiling on…… toiling on…….. toiling on<BON:nextLine/>(Toiling on) (Toiling on) (Toiling on)<BON:nextLine/>Toiling on……. Let us hope…….. Let us watch<BON:nextLine/>(Toiling on) (And trust) (And pray)<BON:nextLine/>And labor till the Master comes. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To the work! To the work! Let the hungry be fed,<BON:nextLine/>To the Fountain of Life let the weary be led;<BON:nextLine/>In the cross and its banner, our glory shall be,<BON:nextLine/>While we herald the tidings, "Salvation is free." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To the work! To the work! There is labor for all,<BON:nextLine/>For the kingdom of darkness and error shall fall;<BON:nextLine/>And the name of Jehovah exalted shall be,<BON:nextLine/>In the loud swelling <tt>CHORUS</tt>, "Salvation is free." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To the work! To the work! Preaching on to the end,<BON:nextLine/>For the harvest will come, And the reapers descend;<BON:nextLine/>And the home of the ransomed dwelling will be,<BON:nextLine/>And our <tt>CHORUS</tt> forever, "Salvation is free." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-80, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: To The Work!

Lyrics: Work, for the night is coming,<BON:nextLine/>Work thro' the morning hours;<BON:nextLine/>Work while the dew is sparkling,<BON:nextLine/>Work ‘mid springing flowers,<BON:nextLine/>Work while the day grows brighter, <BON:nextLine/>Under the glowing sun; <BON:nextLine/>Work for the night is coming,<BON:nextLine/>When man's work is done. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Work for the night is coming,<BON:nextLine/>Work through the sunny noon; <BON:nextLine/>Fill brightest hours with labor,<BON:nextLine/>Rest comes sure and soon;<BON:nextLine/>Give every flying minute, <BON:nextLine/>Something to keep in store;<BON:nextLine/>Work, for the night is coming,<BON:nextLine/>When man works no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Work, for the night is coming, <BON:nextLine/>Under the sunset skies; <BON:nextLine/>While their bright tints are glowing,<BON:nextLine/>Work, for the daylight flies;<BON:nextLine/>Work till the last beam fadeth, <BON:nextLine/>Fadeth to shine no more; <BON:nextLine/>Work while the night is darkening, <BON:nextLine/>When man's work is o'er. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-81, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Work, For The Night Is Coming

Lyrics: Lord, in the morning Thou shalt hear<BON:nextLine/>my voice ascending high;<BON:nextLine/>To Thee will I direct my prayer,<BON:nextLine/>To Thee lift up mine eye? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Up to hills where Christ is gone,<BON:nextLine/>To plead for all His saints;<BON:nextLine/>Presenting at His Father's throne,<BON:nextLine/>Our songs and our complaints. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O may Thy Spirit guide my feet, <BON:nextLine/>In ways of righteousness; <BON:nextLine/>Make every path of duty straight,<BON:nextLine/>And plain before my face. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The man that love and fear Thy name, <BON:nextLine/>Shall see their hopes fulfilled; <BON:nextLine/>The mighty God will compass them,<BON:nextLine/>With favour as a shield. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-82, AH-31, SDAH-39)
Title: Lord, In The Morning

Lyrics: O for a thousand tongues to sing;<BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord!<BON:nextLine/>The glories of my God and King,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name,- <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name, <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord; <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name, <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the name that charms our fears; <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord! <BON:nextLine/>‘Tis music in the sinner's ears, <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He breaks the power of cancelled sin,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord!<BON:nextLine/>His blood can make the foulest clean, <BON:nextLine/>Blessed be the name of the Lord! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-83, AH-139, SDAH-250)
Title: O For A Thousand Tongues To Sing

Lyrics: Praise God! From whom all blessings flow; <BON:nextLine/>Praise Him, all creatures here below;<BON:nextLine/>Praise Him above, ye heavenly host; <BON:nextLine/>Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost…… <BON:nextLine/>Amen. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>84a Singing As We Journey.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We are children of a King,<BON:nextLine/>Heav'nly King, Heav'nly King; <BON:nextLine/>We are children of a King,<BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus Christ, our guard and guide, <BON:nextLine/>Bids us, nothing terrified,<BON:nextLine/>Follow closely at His side,<BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We are traveling to our home,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed home, Blessed home; <BON:nextLine/>We are traveling to our home,<BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey.<BON:nextLine/>Tow'd a city out of sight, <BON:nextLine/>Where will fall no shed of light, <BON:nextLine/>For our Saviour is its light,<BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Full of joy we onward go,<BON:nextLine/>Heav'nward go, Heav'nward go,<BON:nextLine/>Full of joy we onward go, <BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey; <BON:nextLine/>Singing all the journey through, <BON:nextLine/>Singing hearts are brave and true,<BON:nextLine/>Singing till our home we view, <BON:nextLine/>Singing as we journey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-84, AH-13, SDAH-694)
Title: Praise God!

Lyrics: I sing the mighty power of God,<BON:nextLine/>That made the mountains rise, <BON:nextLine/>That spread the flowing seas abroad,<BON:nextLine/>And built the lofty skies;<BON:nextLine/>I sing the wisdom that ordained,<BON:nextLine/>The sun to rule the day; <BON:nextLine/>The moon shines full at his command,<BON:nextLine/>And all the stars obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I sing the goodness of the Lord,<BON:nextLine/>That filled the earth with food;<BON:nextLine/>He formed the creatures with his word,<BON:nextLine/>And then pronounced them good.<BON:nextLine/>Lord how thy wonders are displayed, <BON:nextLine/>Where'er I turn my eye.<BON:nextLine/>If I survey the ground I tread, <BON:nextLine/>O gaze upon the sky. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There's not a plant or flow'rs below,<BON:nextLine/>But makes thy glories known;<BON:nextLine/>And clouds arise, and tempests blow,<BON:nextLine/>By order from thy throne.<BON:nextLine/>Creatures that borrow life from thee,<BON:nextLine/>Are subject to thy care,<BON:nextLine/>There's not a place where we can flee,<BON:nextLine/>But God is present there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-85, AH-67, SDAH-88)
Title: I Sing The Mighty Power

Lyrics: O worship the King, all glorious above,<BON:nextLine/>And grate-fully sing his wonderful love;<BON:nextLine/>Our Shield and Defender the Ancient of Days,<BON:nextLine/>Pavillion'd in splendor, and girded with praise. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O tell of his might and sing of his grace,<BON:nextLine/>Whose robe is the light, whose canopy space;<BON:nextLine/>His chariots of wrath the deep thunder clouds form,<BON:nextLine/>And dark is the path on the wings of the storm.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thy bountiful care, what tongue can recite,<BON:nextLine/>It breathes in the air, it shines in the light; <BON:nextLine/>It streams from the hills, it descends to the plain,<BON:nextLine/>And sweetly distills in the dew and the rain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Frail children of dust, and feeble as frail,<BON:nextLine/>In thee do we trust, nor find thee to fail;<BON:nextLine/>Thy mercies, how tender! How firm to the end! <BON:nextLine/>Our Master, Defender, Redeemer, and Friend. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-86, AH-51, SDAH-83)
Title: O Worship The King!

Lyrics: Father, we come to thee,<BON:nextLine/>No other help have we, <BON:nextLine/>Thou wilt our refuge be, On thee we call;<BON:nextLine/>Earth is but dark and drear,<BON:nextLine/>Without thy presence near;<BON:nextLine/>Be thou our comfort here, Father of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Father, we come to thee, <BON:nextLine/>Turn not away; <BON:nextLine/>Helpless we come to thee,<BON:nextLine/>Hear while we pray. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Save from our many foes,<BON:nextLine/>Save from our earthly woes,<BON:nextLine/>Be thou our soul's repose, In time of need; <BON:nextLine/>Fearful are we and weak,<BON:nextLine/>To us sweet courage speak; <BON:nextLine/>Thy mighty arm we seek, For strength indeed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give us thy grace divine, Seal us forever thine, <BON:nextLine/>Our wayward feet incline, From sin to flee;<BON:nextLine/>O guide us we implore, ‘Till weary life is o'er,<BON:nextLine/>And on a brighter shore, We dwell with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-87, AH-244, SDAH-//)
Title: Father, We Come To Thee

Lyrics: Pass me not, O gentle Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Hear my humble cry;<BON:nextLine/>While on others Thou art calling,<BON:nextLine/>Do not pass me by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Saviour, Saviour, hear my humble cry, <BON:nextLine/>While on others Thou art calling, <BON:nextLine/>Do not pass me by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let me at the throne of mercy, <BON:nextLine/>Find a sweet relief;<BON:nextLine/>Kneeling there in deep contrition,<BON:nextLine/>Help my unbelief. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Trusting only in Thy merit,<BON:nextLine/>Would I seek Thy face; <BON:nextLine/>Heal my wounded, broken spirit,<BON:nextLine/>Save me by Thy grace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou the Spring of all my comfort,<BON:nextLine/>More than life to me;<BON:nextLine/>Whom have on earth beside thee! <BON:nextLine/>Whom in heaven but Thee? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-88, AH-187, SDAH-569)
Title: Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour

Lyrics: Sweet hour of prayer, sweet hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>That calls me from a world of care,<BON:nextLine/>And bids me at my Father's throne,<BON:nextLine/>Make all my wants and wishes known!<BON:nextLine/>In seasons of distress and grief,<BON:nextLine/>My soul has often found relief,<BON:nextLine/>And oft escaped the tempter's snare, <BON:nextLine/>By thy return, sweet hour of prayer. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sweet hour of prayer! Sweet hour of prayer! <BON:nextLine/>Thy wings shall my petition bear; <BON:nextLine/>To Him whose truth and faithfulness,<BON:nextLine/>Engage the waiting soul to bless,<BON:nextLine/>And since he bids me seek his face,<BON:nextLine/>Believe his word, and trust his grace,<BON:nextLine/>I'll cast on him my ev'ry care, <BON:nextLine/>And wait for thee sweet hour of prayer. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sweet hour of prayer! Sweet hour of prayer!<BON:nextLine/>May I thy consolation share; <BON:nextLine/>Till from Mount Pisgah's lofty height,<BON:nextLine/>I view my home, and take my flight, <BON:nextLine/>In my immortal flesh I'll rise, <BON:nextLine/>To seize the everlasting prize,<BON:nextLine/>And shout while passing through the air, <BON:nextLine/>"Farewell, farewell, sweet hour of prayer <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-89, AH-267, SDAH-478)
Title: Sweet Hour Of Prayer

Lyrics: Another six days' work is done,<BON:nextLine/>Another Sabbath is begun;<BON:nextLine/>Return, my soul, enjoy thy rest <BON:nextLine/>Improve the day that God has blessed <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Come, bless the Lord, whose love assigns,<BON:nextLine/>So sweet a rest to weary minds; <BON:nextLine/>A blessed antepast is giv'n, <BON:nextLine/>On this day more than all the sev'n. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O that our thoughts and thanks may rise,<BON:nextLine/>As greatful incense to the skies,<BON:nextLine/>And draw from Christ that sweet repose, <BON:nextLine/>Which none but he who feels it knows. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>This heav,nly calm within the breast,<BON:nextLine/>Is the best pledge of glorious rest; <BON:nextLine/>Which for the church of God remain,<BON:nextLine/>The end of cares, the end of pains. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-90, AH-384, SDAH-//)
Title: Another Six Days' Work

Lyrics: Watch, for the time is short;<BON:nextLine/>Watch while ‘tis called today;<BON:nextLine/>Watch lest the world prevail; <BON:nextLine/>Watch, Christian, watch and pray; <BON:nextLine/>Watch, for the flesh is weak; <BON:nextLine/>Watch, for the foe is strong;<BON:nextLine/>Watch lest the Bridegroom come; <BON:nextLine/>Watch, though he tarry long <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>O watch and pray, O watch and pray;<BON:nextLine/>O watch in the darkness,<BON:nextLine/>and watch is the day;<BON:nextLine/>Christian, watch and pray. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Chase slumber from thine eyes,<BON:nextLine/>Chase doubting from thy breast;<BON:nextLine/>Thine is the promised prize,<BON:nextLine/>Of heaven's eternal rest; <BON:nextLine/>Watch, Christian, watch and pray; <BON:nextLine/>Thy Saviour watched for thee,<BON:nextLine/>Till from his brow there poured,<BON:nextLine/>Great drops of agony. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take Jesus for thy trust;<BON:nextLine/>Watch while the foe is near;<BON:nextLine/>Gird well the armor on;<BON:nextLine/>Watch till thy Lord appear,<BON:nextLine/>Now when thy sun is up, <BON:nextLine/>Make thou no more delay,<BON:nextLine/>In this accepted time, Watch, <BON:nextLine/>Christian, watch and pray. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-91, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Watch, For The Time Is Short

Lyrics: Don't forget the Sabbath,<BON:nextLine/>The Lord our God hath blest; <BON:nextLine/>Of all the weak the brightest,<BON:nextLine/>Of all the week the best; <BON:nextLine/>It brings response from labor,<BON:nextLine/>It tells of joy divine,<BON:nextLine/>Its beams of light descending,<BON:nextLine/>With heav'nly beauty shine <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Welcome, welcome, ever welcome,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed Sabbath day, <BON:nextLine/>Welcome, welcome, ever welcome,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed Sabbath day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Keep the Sabbath holy,<BON:nextLine/>And worship him today; <BON:nextLine/>Who said to his disciples,<BON:nextLine/>"I am the Living Way."<BON:nextLine/>And if we meekly follow, <BON:nextLine/>Our Saviour here below; <BON:nextLine/>He'll give us of the Fountain,<BON:nextLine/>With streams eternal flow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Day of sacred pleasure!<BON:nextLine/>Its golden hours we'll spend,<BON:nextLine/>In thankful hymns to Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>The children's dearest friend;<BON:nextLine/>O gentle, loving Saviour, <BON:nextLine/>How good and kind thou art, <BON:nextLine/>How precious is thy promise, <BON:nextLine/>To dwell in every heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-92, AH-380, SDAH-388)
Title: Don't Forget The Sabbath

Lyrics: O day of rest and gladness,<BON:nextLine/>O day of joy and light;<BON:nextLine/>O balm of care and sadness,<BON:nextLine/>Most beautiful, most bright;<BON:nextLine/>On thee, the high and lowly,<BON:nextLine/>Who bend before the throne? <BON:nextLine/>Sing, Holy, holy, holy,<BON:nextLine/>To the Eternal One. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou art a port protected,<BON:nextLine/>From storms that round us rise,<BON:nextLine/>A garden intersected, <BON:nextLine/>With streams of paradise; <BON:nextLine/>Thou art a cooling fountain,<BON:nextLine/>In life's dry, dreary sand;<BON:nextLine/>From thee, like Pisgah's mountain, <BON:nextLine/>We view our promised land. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A day of sweet reflection,<BON:nextLine/>Thou art, a day of love,<BON:nextLine/>A day to raise affection, <BON:nextLine/>From earth to things above; <BON:nextLine/>New grace ever gaining, <BON:nextLine/>From this our day of rest, <BON:nextLine/>We seek the rest remaining, <BON:nextLine/>In mansions of the blest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-93, AH-389, SDAH-382)
Title: Day Of Rest And Gladness

Lyrics: Sweet Sabbath School! More dear to me,<BON:nextLine/>Than fairest palace dome, <BON:nextLine/>My heart e'er turns with joy to thee,<BON:nextLine/>My own dear Sabbath home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Sabbath home (sweet home)!<BON:nextLine/>Blessed home, (sweet home)<BON:nextLine/>Sabbath home, (sweet home) <BON:nextLine/>Blessed home! <BON:nextLine/>My heart e'er turns with joy to thee, <BON:nextLine/>My own dear Sabbath Home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Here first my willful, wand'ring heart, <BON:nextLine/>The way of life was shown, <BON:nextLine/>Here first I sought the better part, <BON:nextLine/>And gained a Sabbath home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Here Jesus stood with loving voice,<BON:nextLine/>Entreating me to come, <BON:nextLine/>And make him my only choice,<BON:nextLine/>In this dear Sabbath home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-94, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Sweet Sabbath School!

Lyrics: Safely through another week,<BON:nextLine/>God has brought us on our way;<BON:nextLine/>Let us now blessing seek,<BON:nextLine/>Waiting in his courts today,<BON:nextLine/>Day of all the week the best,<BON:nextLine/>Emblem of eternal rest; <BON:nextLine/>Day of all the week the best, <BON:nextLine/>Emblem of eternal rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>While we seek supplies of grace,<BON:nextLine/>Through the dear Redeemer's name,<BON:nextLine/>Show thy reconciling face,<BON:nextLine/>Take away our sin and shame, <BON:nextLine/>From our worldly cares set free, <BON:nextLine/>May we rest this day in thee;<BON:nextLine/>From our worldly cares set free,<BON:nextLine/>May we rest this day in thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Here we come thy name to praise,<BON:nextLine/>May we feel thy presence near,<BON:nextLine/>May thy glory meet our eyes,<BON:nextLine/>While we in thy courts appear. <BON:nextLine/>Here, afford us, Lord, a taste, <BON:nextLine/>Of our everlasting feast.<BON:nextLine/>Here, afford us, Lord, a taste,<BON:nextLine/>Of our everlasting feast. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>May the gospel's joyful sound,<BON:nextLine/>Conquer sinners, comfort saints;<BON:nextLine/>Make the fruit of grace abound,<BON:nextLine/>Bring relief to all complaints; <BON:nextLine/>Thus may all our Sabbaths be,<BON:nextLine/>Till we rise to reign with thee, <BON:nextLine/>Thus may all our Sabbaths be,<BON:nextLine/>Till we rise to reign with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-95, AH-386, SDAH-384)
Title: Safely Through Another Week

Lyrics: Welcome, welcome, day of rest,<BON:nextLine/>To the world in kindness given;<BON:nextLine/>Welcome to this humble breast,<BON:nextLine/>As the beaming light from heaven. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Day of calm and sweet repose,<BON:nextLine/>Gently now thy moments run;<BON:nextLine/>Balm to sooth our cares and woes,<BON:nextLine/>Till our labor here is done. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Holy day that most we prize,<BON:nextLine/>Day of solemn praise and prayer;<BON:nextLine/>Day to make the simple wise,<BON:nextLine/>O, how great thy blessings are! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-96, AH-383, SDAH-391)
Title: Welcome, Welcome, Day Of Rest

Lyrics: We have heard a joyful sound,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves;<BON:nextLine/>Spread the gladness all around,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves;<BON:nextLine/>Bear the news to ev'ry land,<BON:nextLine/>Climb the steeps and cross the waves,<BON:nextLine/>Onward ‘tis our Lord's command, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Waft it on the rolling tide,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves;<BON:nextLine/>Tell to sinners, far and wide, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves; <BON:nextLine/>Sing, ye islands of the sea, <BON:nextLine/>Echo back, ye ocean caves; <BON:nextLine/>Earth shall keep her jubilee, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Sing above the battle's strife,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves;<BON:nextLine/>By his death and endless life,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves;<BON:nextLine/>Sing it softly through the gloom,<BON:nextLine/>When the heart for mercy craves;<BON:nextLine/>Sing in triumph o'er the tomb,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give the winds a mighty voice, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves; <BON:nextLine/>Let the nations now rejoice, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves; <BON:nextLine/>Shout salvation full and free,<BON:nextLine/>Highest hills and deepest caves; <BON:nextLine/>This our song of victory, <BON:nextLine/>Jesus saves, Jesus saves. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-97, AH-196, SDAH-340)
Title: Jesus Saves!

Lyrics: I must have the Saviour with me,<BON:nextLine/>For I dare not walk alone.<BON:nextLine/>I must feel His presence near me,<BON:nextLine/>And His arm around me thrown <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Then my soul ………… shall fear no ill, <BON:nextLine/>(Then my soul shall fear no ill, fear no ill.)<BON:nextLine/>Let him lead ……..me where He will<BON:nextLine/>(Let Him lead me, where He will, where He will} <BON:nextLine/>I will go without a murmur, <BON:nextLine/>(I will go) <BON:nextLine/>And His footsteps follow still. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I must have the Saviour with me,<BON:nextLine/>For my faith, at best, is weak; <BON:nextLine/>He can whisper words of comfort,<BON:nextLine/>That no other voice can speak. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I must have the Saviour with me,<BON:nextLine/>In the onward march of life; <BON:nextLine/>Through the tempest and the sunshine,<BON:nextLine/>Through the battle and the strife <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I must have the Saviour with me,<BON:nextLine/>And His eye the way must guide; <BON:nextLine/>Till I reach the vale of Jordan,<BON:nextLine/>Till I gain the other side. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-98, AH-124, SDAH-//)
Title: I Must Have The Saviour With Me

Lyrics: When I survey the wondrous cross,<BON:nextLine/>On which the prince of glory died,<BON:nextLine/>My richest gain I count but loss,<BON:nextLine/>And pour contempt on all my pride. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>See, from his head, his hands, his feet,<BON:nextLine/>Sorrow and love flow mingled down,<BON:nextLine/>Did e'er such love and sorrow meet? <BON:nextLine/>Or thorns compose so rich a crown? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Since I, who was undone and lost,<BON:nextLine/>Have pardon through his name and word;<BON:nextLine/>Forbid it, then, that I should boast,<BON:nextLine/>Save in the cross of Christ, my Lord. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Were the whole realm of nature mine,<BON:nextLine/>That were a tribute far too small;<BON:nextLine/>Love so amazing, so divine,<BON:nextLine/>Demands my life, my soul, my all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-99, AH-89, SDAH-154)
Title: When I Survey The Wondrous Cross

Lyrics: What a friend we have in Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>All our sins and griefs to bear!<BON:nextLine/>What a privilege to carry to carry,<BON:nextLine/>Ev'rything to God in prayer.<BON:nextLine/>O what peace we often forfeit,<BON:nextLine/>O what needless pain we bear, <BON:nextLine/>All because we do not carry,<BON:nextLine/>Ev'rything to God in prayer. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Have we trials and temptations?<BON:nextLine/>Is there trouble anywhere?<BON:nextLine/>We should never be discouraged,<BON:nextLine/>Take it to the Lord in prayer.<BON:nextLine/>Can we find a friend so faithful,<BON:nextLine/>Who will all our sorrows share? <BON:nextLine/>Jesus knows our ev'ry weakness,<BON:nextLine/>Take it to the Lord in prayer. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Are we weak and heavy laden,<BON:nextLine/>Cumbered with a load of care?<BON:nextLine/>Precious Saviour, still our refuge,<BON:nextLine/>Take it to the Lord in prayer;<BON:nextLine/>Do thy friends despise, forsake thee? <BON:nextLine/>Take it to the Lord in prayer;<BON:nextLine/>In his arms he'll take and shield thee, <BON:nextLine/>Thou wilt find a solace there <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-100, AH-271, SDAH-499)
Title: What A Friend We Have In Jesus

Lyrics: Jesus is tenderly calling thee home,<BON:nextLine/>Calling today, calling today;<BON:nextLine/>Why from the sunshine of love wilt thou roam,<BON:nextLine/>Farther and farther away? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Call…ing today….call…ing today,<BON:nextLine/>(Calling today, calling today;<BON:nextLine/>Calling today, calling today,)<BON:nextLine/>Jes…….us is call…ing, is tenderly calling today.<BON:nextLine/>(Jesus is tenderly calling today) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus is calling the weary to rest,<BON:nextLine/>Calling today, calling today;<BON:nextLine/>Bring him thy burden, and thou shalt be blest;<BON:nextLine/>He will not turn thee away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus is waiting, oh, come to Him now,<BON:nextLine/>Waiting today, waiting today;<BON:nextLine/>Come with thy sins, at His feet lowly bow; <BON:nextLine/>Come, and no longer delay. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus is pleading, oh, list to His voice,<BON:nextLine/>Hear Him today, Hear Him today; <BON:nextLine/>They who believe on His name shall rejoice;<BON:nextLine/>Quickly arise and away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-101, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Jesus Is Calling

Lyrics: There's a stranger at the door,<BON:nextLine/>Let...him in <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in,) <BON:nextLine/>He has been there before, Let... <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in;) <BON:nextLine/>Let him in, ere he is gone; <BON:nextLine/>Let him in, the Holy One; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus Christ, the Father's Son, <BON:nextLine/>Let.....him in. <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in.) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Open now to him your heart,<BON:nextLine/>Let...….him in; <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Savior in, Let the Saviour in;) <BON:nextLine/>If you wait he will depart,<BON:nextLine/>Let...him in;<BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in.) <BON:nextLine/>Let him in, he is your friend,<BON:nextLine/>And your soul he will defend; <BON:nextLine/>He will keep you to the end, <BON:nextLine/>Let...him in. <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in.) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hear you now his pleading voice, <BON:nextLine/>Let.....him in <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in) <BON:nextLine/>Now, O now make him your choice,<BON:nextLine/>Let...him in. <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in , Let the Saviour in) <BON:nextLine/>He is standing at your door, Joy to you he will restore,<BON:nextLine/>And his name you will adore, <BON:nextLine/>Let...him in. <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in.) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now admit the heavenly guest,<BON:nextLine/>Let...him in; <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in) <BON:nextLine/>He will make for you a feast, <BON:nextLine/>Let...him in. <BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the Saviour in.) <BON:nextLine/>He will speak your sins forgiv'n,<BON:nextLine/>And when earth-ties all are riv'n; <BON:nextLine/>He will take you home to heav'n,<BON:nextLine/>Let...him in.<BON:nextLine/>(Let the Saviour in, Let the saviour in)<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-102, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Let Him In

Lyrics: A ruler once came to Jesus by night,<BON:nextLine/>To ask Him the way of Salvation and light;<BON:nextLine/>The Master made answer in words true and plain,<BON:nextLine/>"Ye must be born again." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>"Ye must be born again,<BON:nextLine/>Ye must be born again,<BON:nextLine/>I verily, verily, say unto thee,<BON:nextLine/>Ye must be born again." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ye children of men, attend to the world,<BON:nextLine/>So solemnly uttered by Jesus the Lord;<BON:nextLine/>And let not this message to you be in vain,<BON:nextLine/>"Ye must be born again." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O ye who would enter that glorious rest,<BON:nextLine/>And sing with the ransomed the song of <BON:nextLine/>The blest; The life everlasting if you would obtain, <BON:nextLine/>"Ye must be born again." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-103, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Ye Must Be Born Again

Lyrics: O hear my cry, be gracious unto me,<BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer come;<BON:nextLine/>My soul bowed down is longing now for thee, <BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I've wandered far away o'er mountains cold, <BON:nextLine/>I've wandered far away from home;<BON:nextLine/>O take me now, <BON:nextLine/>And bring me to Thy fold, Come, <BON:nextLine/>Great Deliverer, come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I have no place, no shelter from the night,<BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come; <BON:nextLine/>One look from Thee would give life and light,<BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My path is lone, and weary are my feet, <BON:nextLine/>Come Great Deliverer, come;<BON:nextLine/>Mine eyes look up Thy loving smile to meet, <BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou wilt not spurn contrition's broken sigh,<BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come.<BON:nextLine/>Regard my prayer, and hear my humble cry,<BON:nextLine/>Come, Great Deliverer, come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-104, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Come, Great Deliverer, Come

Lyrics: Able to deliver! Sound it far and near;<BON:nextLine/>Able to deliver whosoe'er will hear; <BON:nextLine/>From the fiery furnace, from the sinner's doom,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus will deliver whosoe'er will Come. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Able to deliver, Able to save,<BON:nextLine/>When you are, my brother <BON:nextLine/>Able to believe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Able to deliver! Can it really be?<BON:nextLine/>Is there any power can deliver me? <BON:nextLine/>Tell me, tell me truly, is the Christ once slain,<BON:nextLine/>Able to deliver me from Satan's Chain? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Able to deliver! Courage, trembling one!<BON:nextLine/>Are you serving Jesus? He will save his own;<BON:nextLine/>Fear not Satan's power, cling to Jesus' hand, <BON:nextLine/>Cease your fear and doubting,<BON:nextLine/>boldly for him stand. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-105, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Able To Deliver

Lyrics: We'll build on the Rock, the ling Rock,<BON:nextLine/>On Jesus, the Rock of Ages;<BON:nextLine/>So shall we abide the fearful shock, <BON:nextLine/>When loud the tempest rages. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>We'll build... on the Rock,<BON:nextLine/>We'll build………on the Rock;<BON:nextLine/>(We'll build on the Rock, on the solid Rock) (We'll build on the Rock, on the solid Rock )<BON:nextLine/>We'll build on the Rock, on the solid Rock,<BON:nextLine/>On Christ, the mighty Rock. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Some build on the sinking sands of life,<BON:nextLine/>On visions of earthly treasure;<BON:nextLine/>Some build on the waves of sin and strife,<BON:nextLine/>Of fame, and worldly pleasure. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O build on the Rock, for ever sure,<BON:nextLine/>The firm and the true foundation;<BON:nextLine/>Its hope is the hope which shall endure,<BON:nextLine/>The hope of salvation. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-106, AH-//, SDAH-342)
Title: Build On The Rock

Lyrics: Tell me the story of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Write on my heart every word, <BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story most precious,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetest that ever was heard; <BON:nextLine/>Tell how the angels, in <tt>CHORUS</tt>, <BON:nextLine/>Sang as they welcomed His birth,<BON:nextLine/>Glory to God in the highest, <BON:nextLine/>Peace and good tidings to earth. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Write on my heart every word,<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story most precious, <BON:nextLine/>Sweetest that ever was told. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Fasting alone in the desert,<BON:nextLine/>Tell of the days that He passed,<BON:nextLine/>How for our sins He was tempted, <BON:nextLine/>Yet was triumphant at last; <BON:nextLine/>Tell of the years of his labor,<BON:nextLine/>Tell of the sorrow He bore,<BON:nextLine/>He was despised and afflicted,<BON:nextLine/>Homeless, rejected, rejected and poor. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tell of the cross where they nailed Him,<BON:nextLine/>Writhing in anguish and pain;<BON:nextLine/>Tell of the grave where they laid Him,<BON:nextLine/>Tell how He liveth again,<BON:nextLine/>Love in that story so tender,<BON:nextLine/>Clearer than ever I see;<BON:nextLine/>Stay, let me weep while you whisper, <BON:nextLine/>Love paid the ransom for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-107, AH-82, SDAH-152)
Title: Tell Me The Story Of Jesus

Lyrics: Jesus, the loving shepherd, Calleth thee now to come,<BON:nextLine/>Into the fold of safety, Where there is rest and room;<BON:nextLine/>Come in the strength of manhood,<BON:nextLine/>Come in the morn of youth, <BON:nextLine/>Enter the fold of safety, Enter the way of truth. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Lovingly, tenderly calling is he!<BON:nextLine/>Wanderer, wanderer, come unto me.<BON:nextLine/>Patiently standing there, waiting I see<BON:nextLine/>Jesus my Shepherd divine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the loving Shepherd,<BON:nextLine/>Gave His dear life for thee.<BON:nextLine/>Tenderly now He's calling,<BON:nextLine/>Wanderer, come to me; <BON:nextLine/>Haste for without is danger,<BON:nextLine/>Come, cries the Shepherd blest,<BON:nextLine/>Enter the fold of safety, <BON:nextLine/>Enter the place of rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lingering is but folly,<BON:nextLine/>Wolves are abroad today,<BON:nextLine/>Seeking the sheep now straying,<BON:nextLine/>Seeking the lambs to slay; <BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the loving Shepherd,<BON:nextLine/>Calleth thee now to come,<BON:nextLine/>Into the fold of safety, <BON:nextLine/>Where there is rest and room. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-108, AH-182, SDAH-//)
Title: Lovingly, Tenderly Calling

Lyrics: When the Judge shall weigh our motives,<BON:nextLine/>For eternal gain or loss,<BON:nextLine/>Shall we stand as gold before him,<BON:nextLine/>Or as vile and worthless dross. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Weighed in the balances of the Lord,<BON:nextLine/>Weighed, weighed and wanting;<BON:nextLine/>Weighed by the standard of his word<BON:nextLine/>Weighed, weighed and wanting. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we hear the glad words spoken,<BON:nextLine/>"Faithful servant," and "Well done,"<BON:nextLine/>Or the dread and awful sentence,<BON:nextLine/>"Thou art wanting," sinful one? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we heed the Spirit's pleading,<BON:nextLine/>While for mercy we may call,<BON:nextLine/>Or delay till God's handwriting, <BON:nextLine/>Seals the final doom of all. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-109, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Weighed And Wanting

Lyrics: Hear the words our Saviour hath spoken,<BON:nextLine/>Words of life, unfailing and true;<BON:nextLine/>Careless one, prayer-less one, hear and remember,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus says, "Blessed are they That do." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Blessed are they that do His commandments,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed are they, blessed are they;<BON:nextLine/>Blessed are they that do His commandments,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed, blessed, blessed are they. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All in vain we hear his commandments,<BON:nextLine/>All in vain his promises too; <BON:nextLine/>Hearing them, fearing them,<BON:nextLine/>never can save us, Blessed,<BON:nextLine/>O blessed are they that Do <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>They with joy may enter the city,<BON:nextLine/>Free from sin, from sorrow and strife,<BON:nextLine/>Sanctified, glorified, now and forever,<BON:nextLine/>They may have right to the tree of life. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-110, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Blessed Are They That Do

Lyrics: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one!<BON:nextLine/>None else could heal all our soul's diseases,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt>:<BON:nextLine/>Jesus knows all about our struggles,<BON:nextLine/>He will guide till the day is done,<BON:nextLine/>There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, <BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>No friend like him is so high and holy,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/>And yet no friend is so meek and lowly,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There's not an hour that he is not with us,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/>No night so dark but his love can cheer us,<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Did ever saint find this friend forsake him?<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one!<BON:nextLine/>Or sinner find that he would not take him? <BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Was e'er a gift like the Saviour given?<BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/>Will he refuse us a home in heaven? <BON:nextLine/>No, not one! No, not one! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-111, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: No, Not One

Lyrics: There's life in a look at the sacred cross,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus has said, "Look unto me;"<BON:nextLine/>Earth with its riches is only dross,<BON:nextLine/>Bright treasures beyond in the cross I see. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt>:<BON:nextLine/>In a look…. there's life for thee, <BON:nextLine/>In a look…… at Calvary, <BON:nextLine/>Blessed thought,…… salvation free,<BON:nextLine/>By a look…… at Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When first to the Saviour I raised my eyes,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet was the smile that fell on me;<BON:nextLine/>Oft as the clouds of temptation rise, <BON:nextLine/>A look at the cross still my strength shall be. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I'll look to the cross ev'ry day and hour,<BON:nextLine/>Trusting the promise God has given;<BON:nextLine/>None ever fall neath the tempter's power,<BON:nextLine/>Who trust and obey in the strength of Heaven. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-112, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Life In A Look

Lyrics: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling,<BON:nextLine/>Calling for you and for me;<BON:nextLine/>At the heart's portal He's waiting and watching,<BON:nextLine/>Watching for you and for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt>:<BON:nextLine/>Come home,…… come home,… <BON:nextLine/>(Come home, come home,) <BON:nextLine/>Ye who are weary come home <BON:nextLine/>Earnestly tenderly, Jesus is calling,<BON:nextLine/>Calling, O sinner, come home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading,<BON:nextLine/>Pleading for you and for me;<BON:nextLine/>Why should we linger and heed not His mercies,<BON:nextLine/>Mercies for you and for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing,<BON:nextLine/>Passing from you and from me;<BON:nextLine/>Shadows are gath'ring and death's night is coming,<BON:nextLine/>Coming for you and for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Think of the wonderful love He has promised, Promised for you and for me; Tho' we have sinned He has mercy and pardon, Pardon for you and for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-113, AH-//, SDAH-287)
Title: Calling

Lyrics: There is a gate that stands ajar,<BON:nextLine/>And through its portals gleaming,<BON:nextLine/>A radiance from the cross afar, <BON:nextLine/>The Saviour's love revealing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt>:<BON:nextLine/>O depth of mercy! Can it be,<BON:nextLine/>That gate was left ajar for me?<BON:nextLine/>For me….. for me…………,<BON:nextLine/>(For me,) (For me) <BON:nextLine/>Was left ajar for me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>That gate ajar stands free for all,<BON:nextLine/>Who seek through it salvation,<BON:nextLine/>The rich and poor, the great and small, <BON:nextLine/>Of every tribe and nation. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Press onward, then, though foes may frown;<BON:nextLine/>While mercy's gate is open,<BON:nextLine/>Accept the cross, and win the crown, <BON:nextLine/>Love's everlasting token. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Beyond the river's brink we'll lay,<BON:nextLine/>The cross that here is given,<BON:nextLine/>And bear the crown of life away, <BON:nextLine/>And love Him more in heaven. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-114, AH-177, SDAH-//)
Title: The Gate Ajar For Me

Lyrics: The Great Physician now is near,<BON:nextLine/>The sympathizing Jesus; <BON:nextLine/>He speaks, the drooping heart to cheer, <BON:nextLine/>O hear the voice of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt>:<BON:nextLine/>Sweetest note in seraph song,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetest name on mortal tongue, <BON:nextLine/>Sweetest carol ever sung ,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, blessed Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All glory to the dying Lamb!<BON:nextLine/>I now believe in Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>I love the blessed Saviour's name,<BON:nextLine/>I love the name of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>His name dispels my guilt and fear;<BON:nextLine/>No other name but Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>O how my soul delights to hear,<BON:nextLine/>The precious name of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And when He comes to bring the crown,<BON:nextLine/>The crown of life and glory;<BON:nextLine/>Then by His side we will sit down,<BON:nextLine/>And tell redemption's story. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-115, AH-118, SDAH-252)
Title: The Great Physician Now Is Near

Lyrics: Crowded is your heart with cares,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no room for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/>Captured by earth's gilded snares,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no room for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/>Lo! He's standing at your door, <BON:nextLine/>Knocking, knocking, o'er and o'er; <BON:nextLine/>Hear him pleading ever-more; <BON:nextLine/>Have you no room for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Wasting all your precious hours,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no work for Jesus?<BON:nextLine/>Spending those God-given powers,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no work for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/>Striving not to conquer sin, <BON:nextLine/>Seeking not a soul to win, <BON:nextLine/>Bringing not a wanderer in;<BON:nextLine/>Have you no work for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Seeking earth's possessions fair,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no time for Jesus?<BON:nextLine/>None for gracious deeds to spare,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no time for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/>Worldly pleasures, wealth, and ease,<BON:nextLine/>Seeking, grasping toys like these, <BON:nextLine/>Striving only self to please;<BON:nextLine/>Have you no time for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Bearing only worthless leaves, <BON:nextLine/>Have you no fruit for Jesus? <BON:nextLine/>In your hands no precious sheaves,<BON:nextLine/>Have you no fruit for Jesus?<BON:nextLine/>Not a grain to store away,<BON:nextLine/>Naught your labor to repay, <BON:nextLine/>Not a joy for that great day, <BON:nextLine/>When you shall meet with Jesus. <BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-116, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Nothing For Jesus

Lyrics: I hear thy welcome voice,<BON:nextLine/>That calls me, Lord, to thee;<BON:nextLine/>For cleansing in thy precious blood,<BON:nextLine/>That flowed on Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I am coming, Lord, Coming now to thee!<BON:nextLine/>Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood,<BON:nextLine/>That flowed on Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though coming weak and vile,<BON:nextLine/>Thou dost my strength assure;<BON:nextLine/>Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse, <BON:nextLine/>Till spot-less all, and pure. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis Jesus calls me on,<BON:nextLine/>To perfect faith and love; <BON:nextLine/>To perfect hope, and peace, and trust,<BON:nextLine/>For earth and heav'n above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All hail, atoning blood!<BON:nextLine/>All hail, redeeming grace! <BON:nextLine/>All hail! The gift of Christ, our Lord, <BON:nextLine/>Our Strength and Righteousness. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-117, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: I Am Coming, Lord

Lyrics: I hear the Saviour say,<BON:nextLine/>"Thy strength indeed is small; <BON:nextLine/>Child of weakness, watch and pray, <BON:nextLine/>Find in me thine all in all." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesus paid it all, All to him I owe;<BON:nextLine/>Sin had left a crimson stain;<BON:nextLine/>He washed it white as snow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord, now indeed I find,<BON:nextLine/>Thy power, and thine alone; <BON:nextLine/>Can change the leper's spots, <BON:nextLine/>And melt the heart of stone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Since nothing good have I,<BON:nextLine/>Whereby thy grace to claim;<BON:nextLine/>I'll wash my garments white,<BON:nextLine/>In the blood of Calvary's Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And when before the throne,<BON:nextLine/>I stand in him complete;<BON:nextLine/>I'll lay trophies down, <BON:nextLine/>All down at Jesus' feet. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-118, AH-411, SDAH-//)
Title: Jesus Paid It All

Lyrics: O now I see the cleansing wave,<BON:nextLine/>The fountain deep and wide;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save,<BON:nextLine/>Points to his wounded side, <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>The cleansing stream I see, I see, <BON:nextLine/>I plunge, and now it cleanseth me!<BON:nextLine/>O praise the Lord! It cleanseth me,<BON:nextLine/>It cleanseth me, yes, cleanseth me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I see the new creation rise,<BON:nextLine/>I hear the speaking blood;<BON:nextLine/>It speaks, polluted nature dies,<BON:nextLine/>Sinks ‘neath the cleansing flood <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I rise to walk in heaven's own light,<BON:nextLine/>Above the world and sin;<BON:nextLine/>With heart made pure and garments white,<BON:nextLine/>And Christ enthroned within. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Amazing grace! ‘tis heav'n below,<BON:nextLine/>To feel the blood applied; <BON:nextLine/>And Jesus, only Jesus, know,<BON:nextLine/>My Jesus crucified. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-119, AH-119, SDAH-184)
Title: The Cleansing Wave

Lyrics: Father, I stretch my hands to Thee;<BON:nextLine/>No other help I know; <BON:nextLine/>If Thou withdraw Thyself from me,<BON:nextLine/>Ah, whither shall I go? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I do believe, I now believe,<BON:nextLine/>That Jesus died for me, <BON:nextLine/>And that He shed His precious blood,<BON:nextLine/>From sin to set me free. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>On thy dear Son I now believe,<BON:nextLine/>O let me feel Thy power; <BON:nextLine/>And all my varied wants relieve, <BON:nextLine/>In this accepted hour. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Author of faith! To Thee I lift, <BON:nextLine/>My weary, longing eyes; <BON:nextLine/>O let me now receive that gift, <BON:nextLine/>My soul without it dies <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-120, AH-375, SDAH-332)
Title: I Do Believe

Lyrics: I will sing(I will sing)of Jesus' love,<BON:nextLine/>Sing of him(sing of him)who first loved me;<BON:nextLine/>For he left(for he left)bright worlds above,<BON:nextLine/>And died on Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I will sing(I will sing) of Jesus' love,<BON:nextLine/>Endless praise(endless praise)<BON:nextLine/>My heart shall give, <BON:nextLine/>He has died(he has died) <BON:nextLine/>that I might live;<BON:nextLine/>I will sing his love to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ere a tear(ere a tear)had dimed mine eyes,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus' tears(Jesus tears) for me did flow; <BON:nextLine/>Ere my first(ere my first) faint prayer could rise,<BON:nextLine/>He had prayed in tones of woe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O the depths(o the depths) of love divine!<BON:nextLine/>Earth or heav'n(earth or heav'n) can never know; <BON:nextLine/>How that sins(how that sins) as dark as mine,<BON:nextLine/>Can be made as white as know. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nothing good(nothing good) for him I've done;<BON:nextLine/>How could he(how could he) such love bestow?<BON:nextLine/>Lord I own(Lord I own) my heart is won,<BON:nextLine/>Help me now mylove to show. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-121, AH-202, SDAH-486)
Title: I Will Sing Of Jesus' Love

Lyrics: Nearer, still nearer, close to Thy heart,<BON:nextLine/>Draw me, my Saviour, so precious thou art <BON:nextLine/>Fold me, O fold me close to Thy breast,<BON:nextLine/>Shelter me safe in that "Heaven of Rest,"<BON:nextLine/>Shelter me safe in that "Heaven of Rest." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nearer, still nearer, nothing I bring,<BON:nextLine/>Naught as an offering to Jesus my King;<BON:nextLine/>Only my sinful now contrite heart,<BON:nextLine/>Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart;<BON:nextLine/>Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nearer, still nearer, Lord, to be Thine,<BON:nextLine/>Sin, with its follies, I gladly resign; <BON:nextLine/>All of its pleasures, pomp and its pride;<BON:nextLine/>Give me but Jesus, my Lord crucified;<BON:nextLine/>Give me but Jesus, my Lord crucified <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nearer, still nearer, while life shall last,<BON:nextLine/>Till safe in glory my anchor is cast; <BON:nextLine/>Thro' endless ages, ever to be, <BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my Saviour, still nearer to Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Nearer, my Saviour, still nearer to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-122, AH-313, SDAH-301)
Title: Nearer, Still Nearer

Lyrics: Dearest name in earth or heaven, <BON:nextLine/>Sweetest name my heart hath known; <BON:nextLine/>By the Father it was given,<BON:nextLine/>To his well beloved Son. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the holiest name,………. ‘Tis the holiest name<BON:nextLine/>(Blessed name!) (blessed name!)<BON:nextLine/>From the Father's lips to the earth it came.<BON:nextLine/>Brought by angels of light,……… <BON:nextLine/>In the stillness of night,<BON:nextLine/>Was the dear, dear name of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To my heart it brings a blessing,<BON:nextLine/>And my lips take up the strain;<BON:nextLine/>And his wond'rous name confessing, <BON:nextLine/>Tell its sweetness over again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Oh, my soul would swell the <tt>CHORUS</tt>, <BON:nextLine/>Singing his redeeming love; <BON:nextLine/>And ascribe eternal praises, <BON:nextLine/>To the name all names above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-123, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: The Holiest Name

Lyrics: Not I, but Christ, be honored, loved, exalted;<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, be seen, be known, be heard;<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, in every look and action,<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, in every thought and word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, to gently soothe in sorrow;<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, to wipe the falling tear;<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, to lift the weary burden,<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, to hush away all fear. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ! No idle words e're falling;<BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ, no needless busting sound;<BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ, no self important bearing, <BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ, no trace of "I" is found. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, my every need supplying;<BON:nextLine/>Not I, but Christ, my strength and health to be;<BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ, for body, soul, and spirit,<BON:nextLine/>Christ, only Christ, here and eternally. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-124, AH-231, SDAH-570)
Title: Not I, But Christ

Lyrics: There is sunlight on the hilltop,<BON:nextLine/>There is sunlight on the sea,<BON:nextLine/>And the golden beams are sleeping, <BON:nextLine/>On the soft and verdant lea;<BON:nextLine/>But a richer light is filling,<BON:nextLine/>All the chambers of my heart.<BON:nextLine/>For thou dwellest there my Saviour, <BON:nextLine/>And ‘tis sunlight where thou art. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>O the sunlight! Beautiful sunlight!<BON:nextLine/>O the sunlight in the heart!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus' smile can banish sadness;<BON:nextLine/>It is sunlight in the heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>In the dust I leave my sadness,<BON:nextLine/>As the garb of other days,<BON:nextLine/>For thou robest me with gladness, <BON:nextLine/>And thou fillest me with praise; <BON:nextLine/>And to that bright home of glory,<BON:nextLine/>Which thy love hath won for me,<BON:nextLine/>In my heart and mind ascending, <BON:nextLine/>My glad spirit follows thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Loving Saviour, thou hast bought me,<BON:nextLine/>And my life, my all, is thine,<BON:nextLine/>Let the lamp thy love hath lighted, <BON:nextLine/>To thy praise and glory shine;<BON:nextLine/>And to that bright home of glory, <BON:nextLine/>Which thy love hath won for me;<BON:nextLine/>In my heart and might ascending,<BON:nextLine/>My glad spirit follows thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-125, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Sunlight In The Heart

Lyrics: I have a song I love to sing,<BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed;<BON:nextLine/>Of my Redeemer, Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>King, Since I have been redeemed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Since I …………….have been redeemed,<BON:nextLine/>Since I …have been redeemed,<BON:nextLine/>I will glory in His name,<BON:nextLine/>Since I…….have been redeemed, <BON:nextLine/>I will glory in my Saviour's name. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I have a Christ that satisfies, <BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed;<BON:nextLine/>To do His will my highest prize,<BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I have a witness bright and clear,<BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed; <BON:nextLine/>Dispelling every doubt and fear,<BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I have a home prepared for me,<BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed;<BON:nextLine/>Where I shall dwell eternally, <BON:nextLine/>Since I have been redeemed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-126, AH-194, SDAH-//)
Title: Since I Have Been Redeemed

Lyrics: God sees the little sparrow fall,<BON:nextLine/>It meets his tender view, <BON:nextLine/>If God so loves the little birds,<BON:nextLine/>I know he loves me, too. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>He loves me, too, he loves me, too,<BON:nextLine/>I know he loves me too; <BON:nextLine/>Because he loves the little things, <BON:nextLine/>I know he loves me too. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He paints the lily of the field,<BON:nextLine/>Perfumes each lily bell; <BON:nextLine/>If he so loves the little flow'rs, <BON:nextLine/>I know he loves me too. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>God made the little birds and flow'rs,<BON:nextLine/>And all things large and small;<BON:nextLine/>He'll not forget his little ones;<BON:nextLine/>I know he loves me too. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-127, AH-456, SDAH-//)
Title: He Loves, Me Too

Lyrics: ‘Tis the blessed hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>when our hearts lowly bend,<BON:nextLine/>And we gather to Jesus, <BON:nextLine/>our Saviour and Friend! <BON:nextLine/>If we come to Him in faith, <BON:nextLine/>His protection to share,<BON:nextLine/>What a balm for the weary!<BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to be there! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Blessed hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>What a balm for the weary! <BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to be there! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the blessed hour of prayer, <BON:nextLine/>when the Saviour draws near,<BON:nextLine/>With a tender compassion <BON:nextLine/>His children to hear! <BON:nextLine/>When He tells us we may cast, <BON:nextLine/>at His feet ev'ry care,<BON:nextLine/>What a balm for the weary!<BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to be there! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the blessed hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>when the tempest and tried,<BON:nextLine/>To the Saviour who loves them <BON:nextLine/>their sorrows confide!<BON:nextLine/>With a sympathizing heart,<BON:nextLine/>He removes ev'ry care! <BON:nextLine/>What a balm for the weary! <BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to be there! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>At the blessed hour of prayer,<BON:nextLine/>trusting Him we believe,<BON:nextLine/>That the blessings we are needing<BON:nextLine/>we'll surely receive,<BON:nextLine/>In the fullness of this trust <BON:nextLine/>we shall lose ev'ry care;<BON:nextLine/>What a balm for the weary! <BON:nextLine/>O how sweet to be there! <BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-128, AH-//, SDAH-501)
Title: Blessed Hour Of Prayer

Lyrics: Jesus, Thou hast promised,<BON:nextLine/>That were two or three,<BON:nextLine/>In Thy name have gathered,<BON:nextLine/>Thou wilt present be;<BON:nextLine/>And Thy word believing,<BON:nextLine/>Now in prayer we kneel;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, come and bless us; <BON:nextLine/>Lord, Thyself reveal. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, come and bless us,<BON:nextLine/>While we linger here;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, come and bless us, <BON:nextLine/>Be Thou ever near. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, Thou hast met us,<BON:nextLine/>Oft in seasons past,<BON:nextLine/>But we need Thy presence, <BON:nextLine/>With us till the last;<BON:nextLine/>Come, O blessed Saviour, <BON:nextLine/>And Thy grace display; <BON:nextLine/>Hear us and accept us; <BON:nextLine/>Bless us while we pray. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, tune our voices,<BON:nextLine/>To Thy songs of praise,<BON:nextLine/>Be in each petition,<BON:nextLine/>That to Thee we raise;<BON:nextLine/>May our faith grow stronger,<BON:nextLine/>And our hope more bright <BON:nextLine/>May our love be purer,<BON:nextLine/>And our path more light. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-129, AH-272, SDAH-//)
Title: Jesus, Come And Bless Us

Lyrics: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice,<BON:nextLine/>And it told Thy love to me;<BON:nextLine/>But I long to rise in the arms of faith,<BON:nextLine/>And be closer drawn to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,<BON:nextLine/>To the cross where Thou hast died;<BON:nextLine/>Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,<BON:nextLine/>To Thy precious, bleeding side. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Consecrate me now to Thy service, Lord,<BON:nextLine/>By the power of grace divine; <BON:nextLine/>May my soul look up with a steadfast hope, <BON:nextLine/>And my will be lost in Thine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O the pure delight of a single hour,<BON:nextLine/>That before Thy throne I spend,<BON:nextLine/>When I kneel in prayer, and with Thee, my God,<BON:nextLine/>I commune as friend with friend. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There are depths of love that I cannot know,<BON:nextLine/>Till I cross the narrow sea;<BON:nextLine/>There are heights of joy that I may not reach,<BON:nextLine/>Till I rest in peace with Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-130, AH-235, SDAH-306)
Title: I Am Thine, O Lord

Lyrics: More like Jesus would I be;<BON:nextLine/>Let my Saviour dwell with me,<BON:nextLine/>Fill my soul with peace and love,<BON:nextLine/>Make me gentle as a dove;<BON:nextLine/>More like Jesus while I go,<BON:nextLine/>Pilgrim in this world below; <BON:nextLine/>Poor in Spirit would I be,<BON:nextLine/>Let My Saviour dwell in me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If he hears the raven's cry;<BON:nextLine/>If his ever watchful eye,<BON:nextLine/>Marks the sparrows when they fall, <BON:nextLine/>Surely he will hear my call; <BON:nextLine/>He will teach me how to live,<BON:nextLine/>All my simple thoughts forgive;<BON:nextLine/>Pure in heart I still would be,<BON:nextLine/>Let my Saviour dwell in me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>More like Jesus when I pray,<BON:nextLine/>More like Jesus day by day;<BON:nextLine/>May I rest me by his side,<BON:nextLine/>When the tranquil waters glide;<BON:nextLine/>Born of Him, through grace renewed,<BON:nextLine/>By his love my will subdued,<BON:nextLine/>Rich in faith I still would be,<BON:nextLine/>Let my Saviour dwell in me, <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-131, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: More Like Jesus

Lyrics: Jesus, keep near the cross,<BON:nextLine/>There a precious fountain;<BON:nextLine/>Free to all, a healing stream,<BON:nextLine/>Flows from Calvary's mountain <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>In the Cross, in the cross,<BON:nextLine/>Be my glory ever; <BON:nextLine/>Till my rapture'd soul shall find,<BON:nextLine/>Rest beyond the river. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Near the cross, a trembling soul,<BON:nextLine/>Love and mercy found me; <BON:nextLine/>There the bright and Morning Star,<BON:nextLine/>Sheds its beams around me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Near the cross! O Lamb of God,<BON:nextLine/>Bring its scenes before me;<BON:nextLine/>Help me walk from day to day, <BON:nextLine/>With its shadows o'er me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Near the cross I'll watch and wait,<BON:nextLine/>Hoping, trusting ever;<BON:nextLine/>Till I reach the golden strand,<BON:nextLine/>Just beyond the river. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-132, AH-240, SDAH-312)
Title: Near The Cross

Lyrics: O let me walk with thee, my God,<BON:nextLine/>As Enoch walked in days of old;<BON:nextLine/>Place thou my trembling hand in thine,<BON:nextLine/>And sweet communion with me hold;<BON:nextLine/>E'en tho' the path I may not see, <BON:nextLine/>Yet, Jesus, let me walk with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I can not, dare not walk alone;<BON:nextLine/>The tempest rages in the sky;<BON:nextLine/>A thousand snares beset my feet,<BON:nextLine/>A thousand foes are lurking nigh;<BON:nextLine/>Still thou the raging of the sea;<BON:nextLine/>O Master, let me walk with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If I may rest my hand in thine,<BON:nextLine/>I'll count the joys of earth but loss,<BON:nextLine/>And firmly, bravely journey on; <BON:nextLine/>I'll bear the banner of the cross, <BON:nextLine/>Till Zion's glorious gates I see;<BON:nextLine/>Yet, Saviour, let me walk with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-133, AH-284, SDAH-554)
Title: Walking With God

Lyrics: In joyful high and holy lays, <BON:nextLine/>My soul her grateful voice would raise; <BON:nextLine/>But who can sing the worthy praise, <BON:nextLine/>Of the wonderful love of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Wonderful love! Wonderful love!<BON:nextLine/>Wonderful love of Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>Wonderful love! Wonderful love! <BON:nextLine/>Wonderful love of Jesus! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A joy by day, a peace by night,<BON:nextLine/>In storms a calm, in darkness light. <BON:nextLine/>In pain and balm, in weakness might,<BON:nextLine/>Is the wonderful love of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My hope for pardon when I call,<BON:nextLine/>My trust for lifting when I fall;<BON:nextLine/>In life, in death, my all in all,<BON:nextLine/>Is the wonderful love of Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-134, AH-123, SDAH-//)
Title: Wonderful Love Of Jesus

Lyrics: I know I love thee better,<BON:nextLine/>Lord, Than any earthly joy;<BON:nextLine/>For thou hast given me the peace, <BON:nextLine/>Which nothing can destroy. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>The half has never yet been told, (never told)<BON:nextLine/>Of love so full and free;<BON:nextLine/>The half has never yet been told, ……… (never told) <BON:nextLine/>The blood it cleanseth me. (cleanseth me) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I know that thou art nearer still,<BON:nextLine/>Than any earthly throng;<BON:nextLine/>And sweeter is the thought of thee, <BON:nextLine/>Than any lovely song. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou hast put gladness in my heart,<BON:nextLine/>Then may I well be glad;<BON:nextLine/>Without the secret of thy love,<BON:nextLine/>I could not but be sad. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O Saviour, precious Saviour mine!<BON:nextLine/>What will thy presence be,<BON:nextLine/>If such a life of joy can crown, <BON:nextLine/>Our walk on earth with thee? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-135, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: I Love Thee Better, Lord

Lyrics: Where He may lead me I will go,<BON:nextLine/>For I have learned to trust Him so,<BON:nextLine/>And I remember ‘twas for me,<BON:nextLine/>That He was slain on Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesus shall lead me night and day,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus shall lead me all the way<BON:nextLine/>He is the truest friend to me,<BON:nextLine/>For I remember Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O I delight in His command,<BON:nextLine/>Love to be led by His dear hand, <BON:nextLine/>His divine will is sweet to me, <BON:nextLine/>Hallowed by blood-stained Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Onward I go, nor doubt, nor fear,<BON:nextLine/>Happy with Christ, my Saviour dear,<BON:nextLine/>Trusting that I some day shall see,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus my Friend, of Calvary. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-136, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: I Remember Calvary

Lyrics: Take the world, but give me Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>All its joys are but a name!<BON:nextLine/>But His love abideth ever,<BON:nextLine/>Through eternal years the same. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Oh, the heights and depth of mercy!<BON:nextLine/>Oh, the length and breath of love!<BON:nextLine/>Oh, the fullness of redemption,<BON:nextLine/>Pledge of endless life above! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take the world, but give me Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetest comfort of my soul;<BON:nextLine/>With my Saviour watching o'er me,<BON:nextLine/>I can sing though billows roll. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take the world, but give me Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Let me view His constant smile;<BON:nextLine/>Then throughout my pilgrim journey,<BON:nextLine/>Light will cheer me all the while. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take the world, but give me Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>In His cross my trust shall be;<BON:nextLine/>Till, with clearer, brighter vision,<BON:nextLine/>Face to face my Lord I see. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-137, AH-//, SDAH-329)
Title: Give Me Jesus

Lyrics: Take my life, and let it be,<BON:nextLine/>Consecrated, Lord, to Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Take my hands and let them move,<BON:nextLine/>At the impulse of thy love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Was me in the Saviour's precious blood<BON:nextLine/>(the precious blood) <BON:nextLine/>Cleanse me in its purifying flood <BON:nextLine/>(the healing flood)<BON:nextLine/>Lord, I give to Thee, my life and all, to be,<BON:nextLine/>Thine, henceforth eternally. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take my feet, and let them be,<BON:nextLine/>Swift and beautiful for Thee; <BON:nextLine/>Take my voice and let me sing,<BON:nextLine/>Always, only, for my King. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take my lips and let them be,<BON:nextLine/>Filled with messages for Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Take my silver and my gold,<BON:nextLine/>Not a smile would I withhold. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take my moments and my days,<BON:nextLine/>Let them flow in endless praise;<BON:nextLine/>Take my intellect, and my use,<BON:nextLine/>Every power as Thou shalt choose. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take my will, and make it Thine,<BON:nextLine/>It shall be no longer mine;<BON:nextLine/>Take my heart, it is Thine own, <BON:nextLine/>It shall be Thy royal throne. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Take my love, my Lord, I pour,<BON:nextLine/>At Thy feet its treasure-store;<BON:nextLine/>Take myself, and I will be,<BON:nextLine/>Ever, only, all for Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-138, AH-//, SDAH-330)
Title: Entire Consecration
