Lyrics: While Jesus whispers to you, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>While we are praying for you, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>Now is the time to own him, Come sinner come! <BON:nextLine/>Now is the time to know him, Come sinner come! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Are you too heavy laden? Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus will hear your burden, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus will not deceive you, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus can now redeem you, Come sinner come! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O hear his tender pleading, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>Come and receive the blessing, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>While Jesus whispers to you, Come sinner come!<BON:nextLine/>While we are praying for you, Come sinner come! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-205, AH-167, SDAH-//)
Title: While Jesus Whispers

Lyrics: I gave my life Thee, My precious blood I shed,<BON:nextLine/>That Thou might'st ransomed be, <BON:nextLine/>And quickenedfrom the dead,<BON:nextLine/>I gave, I gave my life for Thee,<BON:nextLine/>What hast thou given for me?<BON:nextLine/>I gave, I gave my life for Thee, <BON:nextLine/>What hast thou given for me? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My Father's house of light,<BON:nextLine/>My glory circled throne,<BON:nextLine/>I left for earthly night,<BON:nextLine/>For wand'rings sad and lone!<BON:nextLine/>I left, I left it all for Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Hast Thou left aught for me?<BON:nextLine/>I left, I left it all for Thee,<BON:nextLine/>Hast Thou left aught for me? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I suffered much for Thee, More thy tongue can tell,<BON:nextLine/>Of bitt'rest agony, To rescue Thee from hell,<BON:nextLine/>I've borne, I've borne it all for Thee,<BON:nextLine/>What hast Thou borne for me?<BON:nextLine/>I've borne, I've borne it all for Thee,<BON:nextLine/>What hast Thou borne for me? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-206, AH-178, SDAH-281)
Title: I Gave My Life For Thee

Lyrics: I saw One hanging on the tree,<BON:nextLine/>In agony and blood,<BON:nextLine/>Who fixed His languid eyes on me,<BON:nextLine/>As near His cross I stood. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, never till my latest breath, <BON:nextLine/>Can I forget that look;<BON:nextLine/>It seemed to charge me with His death,<BON:nextLine/>Tho' not a word He spoke. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A second look He gave, which said,<BON:nextLine/>"I freely all forgive;<BON:nextLine/>This blood is for thy ransom paid,<BON:nextLine/>I die that thou may'st live," <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thus while His death my sin displays,<BON:nextLine/>In all its blackest hue,<BON:nextLine/>Such is the mystery of grace,<BON:nextLine/>It seals my pardon too. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-207, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Seals My Pardon

Lyrics: Be silent, be silent,<BON:nextLine/>A whisper is heard,<BON:nextLine/>Be silent, and listen,<BON:nextLine/>Oh, treasure each word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Tread softly,(here) tread softly,(here)<BON:nextLine/>The Master is here;<BON:nextLine/>Tread softly,(here) tread softly, (here)<BON:nextLine/>He bids us draw near. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Be silent, be silent,<BON:nextLine/>For holy this place, <BON:nextLine/>This alter that echoes,<BON:nextLine/>The message of grace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Be silent, be silent, <BON:nextLine/>Breath humbly our prayer, <BON:nextLine/>A foretaste of Eden, <BON:nextLine/>This moment we share. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Be silent, be silent,<BON:nextLine/>His mercy record;<BON:nextLine/>Be silent, be silent,<BON:nextLine/>And wait on the Lord. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-208, AH-278, SDAH-479)
Title: Tread Softly

Lyrics: O, for a closer walk with God!<BON:nextLine/>A calm and heav,nly frame,<BON:nextLine/>A light to shine upon the road,<BON:nextLine/>That leads me to the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Return, O holy Dove! Return,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet Messenger of rest;<BON:nextLine/>I hate the sins that made thee mourn,<BON:nextLine/>And drove thee from my breast. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>What peaceful hours I once enjoyed!<BON:nextLine/>How sweet their memory still!<BON:nextLine/>But they have left an aching void,<BON:nextLine/>The world can never fill. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The dread idol I have known,<BON:nextLine/>Whate'er that idol be,<BON:nextLine/>Help me to tear it from thy throne,<BON:nextLine/>A worship only thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-209, AH-310, SDAH-315)
Title: A Closer Walk

Lyrics: Christ has for sin atonement made, what a wonderful Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>We are redeemed! The price is paid! What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour is Jesus, my Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour is Jesus, my Lord! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I praise Him for the cleansing blood,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>That reconciled my soul to God;<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He cleansed my heart from all its sin,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>And now He reigns and rules therein;<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He walks beside me all the way,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>And keeps me faithful day by day,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He gives me overcoming power,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/>And triumph in each trying hour; <BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To Him I've given all my heart,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour!<BON:nextLine/>The world shall never share a part,<BON:nextLine/>What a wonderful Saviour! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-210, AH-101, SDAH-335)
Title: What A Wonderful Saviour

Lyrics: "There shall be showers of blessing;"<BON:nextLine/>This is the promise of love;<BON:nextLine/>There shall be seasons refreshing,<BON:nextLine/>Sent from the Saviour above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Showers of blessing,<BON:nextLine/>Showers of blessing we need; <BON:nextLine/>Mercy drops around us are falling,<BON:nextLine/>But for the showers we plead. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"There shall be showers of blessing;"<BON:nextLine/>Precious reviving again; <BON:nextLine/>Over the hills and the valleys,<BON:nextLine/>Sound of abundance of rain. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"There shall be showers of blessing;"<BON:nextLine/>Send them upon us, O Lord;<BON:nextLine/>Grant to us now a refreshing,<BON:nextLine/>Come, and now honor Thy word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"There shall be showers of blessing;"<BON:nextLine/>Oh, that today they might fall, <BON:nextLine/>Now as to God we're confessing,<BON:nextLine/>Now as on Jesus we call! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-211, AH-153, SDAH-195)
Title: Showers Of Blessing

Lyrics: There comes to my heart one sweet strain<BON:nextLine/>(sweet strain) <BON:nextLine/>A glad and a joyous refrain (refrain), <BON:nextLine/>I sing it again and again,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet peace, the gift of God's love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Peace, peace, sweet, peace,<BON:nextLine/>Wonderful gift from above, (above) <BON:nextLine/>Oh, wonderful, wonderful peace,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet peace the gift of God's love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Through Christ on the cross peace was made,<BON:nextLine/>(was made) <BON:nextLine/>My debt by His death was all paid,<BON:nextLine/>No other foundation is laid,<BON:nextLine/>For peace, the gift of God's love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When Jesus as Lord I had crowned (had crowned),<BON:nextLine/>My heart with His peace did abound (abound)<BON:nextLine/>In Him the rich blessing I found,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet peace, the gift of God's love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>In Jesus for peace I abide, (abide)<BON:nextLine/>And as I keep close to His side (His side)<BON:nextLine/>There's nothing but peace doth betide,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet peace, the gift of God's love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-212, AH-253, SDAH-//)
Title: Sweet Peace

Lyrics: O Jesus my Redeemer, Thou art my joy and song,<BON:nextLine/>My Savouir and my solace,<BON:nextLine/>When griefs around me throng. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>O Jesus my Redeemer,<BON:nextLine/>My song shall be of Thee,<BON:nextLine/>No other friend so constant,<BON:nextLine/>No friend so dear to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou art my hope and comfort,<BON:nextLine/>Through all the weary years.<BON:nextLine/>When shadows dark surround me,<BON:nextLine/>When fall the bitter tears. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I trust in Thee, my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>My faithful friend and guide,<BON:nextLine/>For thou to me art dearer,<BON:nextLine/>Than all on earth beside. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thou art my soul's rejoicing,<BON:nextLine/>While in this world of sin,<BON:nextLine/>Thou shalt be my rejoicing,<BON:nextLine/>The heav'nly gates within. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-213, AH-257, SDAH-//)
Title: My Song

Lyrics: Does Jesus care when my heart is pained,<BON:nextLine/>Too deeply for mirth or song;<BON:nextLine/>As the burdens press, And the cares distress,<BON:nextLine/>And the way grows weary and long. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>O yes, He cares, I know He cares,<BON:nextLine/>His heart is touched with my grief;<BON:nextLine/>When the days are weary,<BON:nextLine/>The long nights dreary,<BON:nextLine/>I know my Saviour cares (He cares) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Does Jesus care when my way is dark,<BON:nextLine/>With a nameless dread and fear?<BON:nextLine/>As the daylight fades, Into deep night shades,<BON:nextLine/>Does He care enough to be near? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Does Jesus care when I've tried and failed,<BON:nextLine/>To resist some temptation strong?<BON:nextLine/>When in my deep grief I find no relief,<BON:nextLine/>Tho' my tears flow all the night long? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Does Jesus care when I've said "good-by"<BON:nextLine/>To the dearest on earth to me,<BON:nextLine/>And my sad heart aches, ‘Till it nearly breaks,<BON:nextLine/>Is this aught to Him? Does He see? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-214, AH-122, SDAH-181)
Title: Does Jesus Care?

Lyrics: The home where changes never come,<BON:nextLine/>Nor pain nor sorrow, toil nor care;<BON:nextLine/>Yes! ‘tis a bright and blessed home;<BON:nextLine/>Who would not fain be resting there? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>O, wait, (meekly wait)<BON:nextLine/>meekly wait and murmur not,<BON:nextLine/>O, wait, (meekly wait) <BON:nextLine/>meekly wait and murmur not,<BON:nextLine/>O, wait, (meekly wait) O, wait, (meekly wait)<BON:nextLine/>O, wait, and murmur not. (O murmur not) <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yet when bowed down beneath the load,<BON:nextLine/>By heaven allowed, thine earthly lot,<BON:nextLine/>Thou yearn'st to reach that blest abode,<BON:nextLine/>Wait, meekly wait, and murmur not. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If in thy path some thorns are found,<BON:nextLine/>O, think who bore them on His brow;<BON:nextLine/>If grief thy sorrowing heart has found,<BON:nextLine/>It reached a holier than thou. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Toil on, nor deem, though sore it be,<BON:nextLine/>One sigh unheard, one prayer forgot;<BON:nextLine/>The day of rest will dawn for thee,<BON:nextLine/>Wait, meekly wait, and murmur not. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-215, AH-258, SDAH-//)
Title: Wait, And Murmur Not

Lyrics: Lonely? No, not lonely,<BON:nextLine/>While Jesus standeth by;<BON:nextLine/>His presence always cheers me; <BON:nextLine/>I know that he is nigh,<BON:nextLine/>Friend-less? No, not friend-less, <BON:nextLine/>For Jesus is my Friend; <BON:nextLine/>I change, but he remaineth, <BON:nextLine/>The same unto the end. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>No, never alone, -- no, never alone;<BON:nextLine/>He has promised never to leave me,<BON:nextLine/>Never to leave me alone <BON:nextLine/>No, never alone, -- no, never alone;<BON:nextLine/>He has promised never to leave me,<BON:nextLine/>Never to leave me alone <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Weary? No, not weary,<BON:nextLine/>While leaning on his breast;<BON:nextLine/>My soul hath full enjoyment,<BON:nextLine/>In His eternal rest;<BON:nextLine/>Helpless? Yes, so helpless;<BON:nextLine/>But I am leaning hard;<BON:nextLine/>On the mighty arm of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>And he is keeping guard. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Waiting? Yes, I'm waiting; <BON:nextLine/>He bids me watch and wait, <BON:nextLine/>I only wonder often, <BON:nextLine/>What makes my Lord so late,<BON:nextLine/>Joyful? Yes, so joyful,<BON:nextLine/>With joy too deep for words;<BON:nextLine/>A precious, sure foundation, <BON:nextLine/>The joy that is my Lord's. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-216, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Never Alone

Lyrics: Saviour! Thy dying love, Thou gavest me,<BON:nextLine/>Nor shall I aught withhold, Dear lord, from Thee;<BON:nextLine/>In love my soul would bow, <BON:nextLine/>My heart fulfill its vow, <BON:nextLine/>Some offering bring Thee now, <BON:nextLine/>Something for Thee <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>At the blest mercy seat, Pleading for me,<BON:nextLine/>My feeble faith looks up, Jesus to Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Help me the cross to bear,<BON:nextLine/>Thy wondrous love declare, <BON:nextLine/>Some song to raise or prayer, <BON:nextLine/>Something for Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Give me a faithful heart, Likeness to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>That each departing day, henceforth may see;<BON:nextLine/>Some work of love begun,<BON:nextLine/>Some deed of kindness done,<BON:nextLine/>Some wand'rer sought and won,<BON:nextLine/>Something for Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All that I am and have, Thy gifts so free,<BON:nextLine/>In joy, in grief, through life, Dear Lord for Thee;<BON:nextLine/>And when Thy face I see,<BON:nextLine/>My ransomed and shall be,<BON:nextLine/>Through all eternity, Something for Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-217, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Something For Jesus

Lyrics: The Church has one foundation,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis Jesus Christ her Lord;<BON:nextLine/>She is His new creation,<BON:nextLine/>By water and by word,<BON:nextLine/>From heav'n He came and sought her,<BON:nextLine/>To be His holly bride,<BON:nextLine/>With His own blood He bought her,<BON:nextLine/>And for her life He died. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Elect from every nation,<BON:nextLine/>Yet one o'er all the earth,<BON:nextLine/>Her charter of salvation,<BON:nextLine/>One Lord, One faith, one birth;<BON:nextLine/>One holy name she blesses,<BON:nextLine/>Partakes one holy food,<BON:nextLine/>And to one hope she presses, <BON:nextLine/>With every grace endued. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though with a scornful wonder,<BON:nextLine/>Men see her sore opprest,<BON:nextLine/>Though foes would rend asunder,<BON:nextLine/>The Rock where she doth rest;<BON:nextLine/>Yet saints their faith are keeping,<BON:nextLine/>Their cry goes up "How long?"<BON:nextLine/>And soon the night of weeping, <BON:nextLine/>Shall be morn of song. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Mid toil and tribulation, <BON:nextLine/>And tumult of her war,<BON:nextLine/>She waits the consummation, <BON:nextLine/>Of peace for evermore; <BON:nextLine/>Till with the vision glorious,<BON:nextLine/>Her longing eyes are blest,<BON:nextLine/>And the great Church victorious, <BON:nextLine/>Shall be the Church at rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-218, AH-334, SDAH-348)
Title: One Foundation

Lyrics: Guide me, O Thou great Jehovah,<BON:nextLine/>Pilgrim through this barren land;<BON:nextLine/>I am weak, but thou art mighty,<BON:nextLine/>Hold me with Thy powerful hand;<BON:nextLine/>Bread of Heaven, Bread of Heaven,<BON:nextLine/>feed me till I want no more,<BON:nextLine/>Feed me till I want no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Open now the crystal fountain,<BON:nextLine/>Whence the healing streams do flow;<BON:nextLine/>Let the fiery cloud pillar,<BON:nextLine/>Lead me all my journey through;<BON:nextLine/>Strong Deliverer, Strong Deliverer.<BON:nextLine/>Be Thou still my strength and shield,<BON:nextLine/>Be Thou still my strength and shield. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When I tread the verge of Jordan,<BON:nextLine/>Bid my anxious fears subside;<BON:nextLine/>Bear me through the swelling current,<BON:nextLine/>Land me safe on Canaan's side;<BON:nextLine/>Songs of praises, Songs of praises,<BON:nextLine/>I will ever give to Thee,<BON:nextLine/>I will ever give to Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-219, AH-303, SDAH-538)
Title: Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah

Lyrics: The Homeland! O the Homeland!<BON:nextLine/>The land of the freeborn!<BON:nextLine/>There's no night in the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>But aye the fadeless morn;<BON:nextLine/>I'm sighing for the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>My heart is aching here;<BON:nextLine/>There is no pain in the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>To which I'm drawing near;<BON:nextLine/>There is no pain in the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>To which I'm drawing near. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My Lord is in the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>With angels bright and fair;<BON:nextLine/>There's no sin the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>And no temptation there;<BON:nextLine/>The music of the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>Is ringing in my ears;<BON:nextLine/>And when I think of the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>My eyes are filled with tears;<BON:nextLine/>And when I think of the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>My eyes are filled with tears. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The dwellers in the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>Are beck'ning me to come,<BON:nextLine/>Where neither death nor sorrow<BON:nextLine/>Invades their holy home;<BON:nextLine/>O dear, dear native country!<BON:nextLine/>O rest and peace above!<BON:nextLine/>Christ bring us all to the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>Of Thy redeeming love;<BON:nextLine/>Christ bring us all to the Homeland,<BON:nextLine/>Of Thy redeeming love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-220, AH-428, SDAH-436)
Title: The Homeland

Lyrics: Each cooing dove (each cooing dove)<BON:nextLine/>and sighing bough (and sighing bough),<BON:nextLine/>That makes the eve (that makes the eve)<BON:nextLine/>so blest to me (so blest to me)<BON:nextLine/>Has something far (has something far)<BON:nextLine/>diviner now (diviner now) <BON:nextLine/>It bears me back (it bears me back)<BON:nextLine/>to Galilee (to Galilee). <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Chrous<BON:nextLine/>O Galilee, sweet Galilee,<BON:nextLine/>Where Jesus loved so much to be;<BON:nextLine/>O Galilee, blue Galilee,<BON:nextLine/>Come sing again to me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Each flow'ry glen (each flow'ry glen)<BON:nextLine/>and mossy dwell (and mossy dwell),<BON:nextLine/>Where happy birds (where happy birds)<BON:nextLine/>in song agree (in song agree)<BON:nextLine/>Through sunny morn (through sunny morn)<BON:nextLine/>the praises tell (the praises tell)<BON:nextLine/>Of sights and sounds (of sights and sounds)<BON:nextLine/>in Galilee (in Galilee). <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And when I read (and when I read)<BON:nextLine/>the thrilling lore (the thrilling lore),<BON:nextLine/>Of him who walked (of him who walked)<BON:nextLine/>upon the sea (upon the sea),<BON:nextLine/>I long, oh, how (I long, oh, how)<BON:nextLine/>I long once more (I long once more),<BON:nextLine/>To follow him (to follow him)<BON:nextLine/>in Galilee (in Galilee). <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-221, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Memories Of Galilee

Lyrics: Safe in the arms of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Safe on gentle breast,<BON:nextLine/>Here by love o'er shaded,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetly my soul doth rest,<BON:nextLine/>Hark! ‘tis the voice of angels,<BON:nextLine/>Borne in a song to me,<BON:nextLine/>Over the fields of glory,<BON:nextLine/>Over the jasper sea. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Safe in the arms of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Safe on his gentle breast,<BON:nextLine/>Hear by his love o'er shaded,<BON:nextLine/>Sweetly my soul doth rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Safe in the arms of Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Safe from corroding care;<BON:nextLine/>Safe from the world's temptations,<BON:nextLine/>Sin cannot harm me there.<BON:nextLine/>Free from the blight of sorrow,<BON:nextLine/>Free from my doubts and fears;<BON:nextLine/>Only a few more trials,<BON:nextLine/>Only a few more tears. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, my heart's dear refuge,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, has died for me;<BON:nextLine/>Firm on the Rock of Ages,<BON:nextLine/>Ever my trust shall be.<BON:nextLine/>Here let me wait with patience,<BON:nextLine/>Wait till the night is o'er;<BON:nextLine/>Wait till I see the morning,<BON:nextLine/>Break on the golden shore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-222, AH-254, SDAH-//)
Title: Safe In The Arms Of Jesus

Lyrics: I can hear my Saviour calling,<BON:nextLine/>In the tend'rest accents calling;<BON:nextLine/>On my ear these words are falling,<BON:nextLine/>Come and follow, daily follow me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I will take my cross and follow,<BON:nextLine/>My dear Saviour I will follow;<BON:nextLine/>Where he leads I will follow,<BON:nextLine/>I'll go with him, with him all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though the way be dark and dreary,<BON:nextLine/>Though my feet be worn and weary;<BON:nextLine/>Yet my heart keeps bright and cheery,<BON:nextLine/>As I follow, follow all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus, ever go before me,<BON:nextLine/>Shining heaven's sunlight o'er me,<BON:nextLine/>And when weak, by grace restore me,<BON:nextLine/>As I follow, follow all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Through the valley safely lead me,<BON:nextLine/>Heav'nly manna daily feed me;<BON:nextLine/>Every hour, dear Lord, I need thee,<BON:nextLine/>As I follow, follow all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>In thy heart's affection hold me,<BON:nextLine/>In thy arms of love enfold me;<BON:nextLine/>And with thine own grace uphold me,<BON:nextLine/>As I follow, follow all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-223, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Follow All The Way

Lyrics: Brightly beams our Father's mercy,<BON:nextLine/>From His light-house ever more,<BON:nextLine/>But to us He gives the keeping,<BON:nextLine/>Of the lights along the shore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Let the lower lights be burning!<BON:nextLine/>Send a gleam across the wave!<BON:nextLine/>Some poor fainting, struggling seaman,<BON:nextLine/>You may rescue, you may save. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Dark the night of sin has settled,<BON:nextLine/>Loud the angry billows roar;<BON:nextLine/>Eager eyes are watching, longing,<BON:nextLine/>For the lights along the shore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Trim your feeble lamp, my brother;<BON:nextLine/>Some poor sailor tempest-tost;<BON:nextLine/>Trying now to make the harbor,<BON:nextLine/>In the darkness may be lost. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-224, AH-356, SDAH-//)
Title: Let The Lower Lights Be Burning

Lyrics: O Christian, awake! ‘tis the Master's command;<BON:nextLine/>With helmet and shield, and a sword in thy hand,<BON:nextLine/>To meet the bold tempter, go, fearlessly go,<BON:nextLine/>And stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Stand like the brave, stand like the brave,<BON:nextLine/>Stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Whatever thy danger, take heed and be-ware,<BON:nextLine/>And turn not thy back, for no armor is there;<BON:nextLine/>The legions of darkness, if thou wouldst o'er-throw,<BON:nextLine/>Then stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The cause of thy Master with vigor defend;<BON:nextLine/>Be watchful, be zealous, and fight to the end; <BON:nextLine/>Wherever he leads thee, go, valiantly go,<BON:nextLine/>And stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Press on, never doubting, thy Captain is near,<BON:nextLine/>With grace to supply, and with comfort to cheer;<BON:nextLine/>His love, like a stream in the desert will flow,<BON:nextLine/>Then stand like the brave, with thy face to the foe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-225, AH-367, SDAH-610)
Title: Stand Like The Brave

Lyrics: Almost persuaded now to believe,<BON:nextLine/>Almost persuaded Christ to receive;<BON:nextLine/>Seems now some soul to say,<BON:nextLine/>"Go, Spirit, go Thy way,<BON:nextLine/>Some more convenient day,<BON:nextLine/>On Thee I'll call." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Almost persuaded, come, come, today;<BON:nextLine/>Almost persuaded; turn not away,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus invites you here,<BON:nextLine/>Angels are lingering near,<BON:nextLine/>Prayers rise from hearts so dear;<BON:nextLine/>O wanderer come! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Almost persuaded; harvest is past!<BON:nextLine/>Almost persuaded; doom comes at last!<BON:nextLine/>"Almost" can not avail, "Almost" is but to fail!<BON:nextLine/>Sad, sad that bitter wail-"Almost, - but lost!" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-226, AH-183, SDAH-//)
Title: Almost Persuaded

Lyrics: Alas! And did my Saviour bleed,<BON:nextLine/>And did my Sovereign die?<BON:nextLine/>Would he devote that sacred head,<BON:nextLine/>For such a worm as I? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>At the cross, at the cross,<BON:nextLine/>where I first saw the light,<BON:nextLine/>And the burden of my heart <BON:nextLine/>rolled away (rolled away)<BON:nextLine/>It was there by faith I received my sight,<BON:nextLine/>And now I am happy all the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Was it for deeds that I have done,<BON:nextLine/>He groaned upon the tree?<BON:nextLine/>Amazing pity, grace unknown,<BON:nextLine/>And love beyond degree! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>But drops of grief can ne'er repay,<BON:nextLine/>The debt of love I owe;<BON:nextLine/>Here, Lord, I give myself away,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis all that I can do! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-227, AH-91, SDAH-163)
Title: At The Cross

Lyrics: Praise Him! Praise Him!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!<BON:nextLine/>Sing, O earth, His wonderful love proclaim!<BON:nextLine/>Hail Him! Hail Him!<BON:nextLine/>Highest arch-angels in glory;<BON:nextLine/>Strength and honor give to His holy name!<BON:nextLine/>Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard His children,<BON:nextLine/>In His arms He carries them all day long; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Praise Him! Praise Him!<BON:nextLine/>Tell of His excellent greatness;<BON:nextLine/>Praise Him! Praise Him ever in joyful song! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Praise Him! Praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!<BON:nextLine/>For our sins He suffered, and bled and died;<BON:nextLine/>He our Rock, our hope of eternal salvation,<BON:nextLine/>Hail Him! Hail Him! Jesus the crucified.<BON:nextLine/>Sound His praises! Jesus who bore our sorrows,<BON:nextLine/>Love unbounded, wonderful, deep and strong; <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Praise Him! Praise Him!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!<BON:nextLine/>Heav'nly portals, loud with hosannas ring!<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, Saviour, reigneth forever and ever;<BON:nextLine/>Crown Him! Crown Him!<BON:nextLine/>Prophet, and Priest, and King!<BON:nextLine/>Christ is coming, over the world victorious,<BON:nextLine/>Power and glory, unto the Lord belong! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-228, AH-140, SDAH-249)
Title: Praise Him! Praise Him!

Lyrics: Who is on the Lord's side? Always true;<BON:nextLine/>There's a right and wrong side,<BON:nextLine/>Where stand you? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Choose now,<BON:nextLine/>(Who is on the Lord's side)<BON:nextLine/>Choose now,<BON:nextLine/>(Who is on the Lord's side?)<BON:nextLine/>On the right or wrong side, <BON:nextLine/>False or true? <BON:nextLine/>Choose now Choose now,<BON:nextLine/>(Who is on the Lord's side? Who is on the Lord's side?)<BON:nextLine/>On the right or wrong side, Where stand you? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thousands on the wrong side, Choose to stand;<BON:nextLine/>Still ‘tis not the strong side, True and grand. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Come and join the Lord's side;<BON:nextLine/>Ask you why? ‘Tis the only safe side, By and By. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-229, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Who Is On The Lord's Side?

Lyrics: Like wandering sheep o'er mountains cold, Since all have gone astray; To "Life" and peace within the fold, How may I find the way? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I … am the way, … the truth, and the life; ………….<BON:nextLine/>(I am the way) I am the way)<BON:nextLine/>(I am the way, the truth and the life)<BON:nextLine/>No man cometh unto the Father but by Me;<BON:nextLine/>I …am the way, ……the truth, ……….and the life; ………<BON:nextLine/>(I am the way) (I am the way)<BON:nextLine/>(I am the way, the truth and the life)<BON:nextLine/>No man comes unto the Father but by me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Bewildered oft with doubt and care,<BON:nextLine/>To God I fain would go;<BON:nextLine/>While many cry "Lo here! Lo there!"<BON:nextLine/>The truth how may I know? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To Christ the Way, the Truth, the Life,<BON:nextLine/>I come, no more to roam;<BON:nextLine/>He'll guide me to my "Father's house"<BON:nextLine/>To my eternal home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-230, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: I Am The Way

Lyrics: If you are tired of the load of your sin,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart;<BON:nextLine/>If you desire a new life to begin,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Just now, your doubtings give o'er;<BON:nextLine/>Just now reject Him no more;<BON:nextLine/>Just now, throw open the door;<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If ‘tis for purity now that you sigh,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart;<BON:nextLine/>Fountains for cleansing are flowing near by,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If there's a tempest your voice cannot still,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart;<BON:nextLine/>If there's a void this world never can fill,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If friends, once trusted, have proven untrue,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart;<BON:nextLine/>Find what a Friend He will be unto you,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If you would join the songs of the blest,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart;<BON:nextLine/>If you would enter the mansions of rest,<BON:nextLine/>Let Jesus come into your heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> {last stanza}<BON:nextLine/>Just now, my doubtings are o'er;<BON:nextLine/>Just now, rejecting no more;<BON:nextLine/>I open the door,<BON:nextLine/>And Jesus comes into my heart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-231, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Let Jesus Come Into Your Heart

Lyrics: I will never, never leave thee,<BON:nextLine/>I will never thee forsake;<BON:nextLine/>I will guide, and save, and keep thee,<BON:nextLine/>For my name and mercy's sake;<BON:nextLine/>Fear no evil, Fear no evil, <BON:nextLine/>Only all my counsel take. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When the storm is raging round thee,<BON:nextLine/>Call on me in humble prayer;<BON:nextLine/>I will fold my arms around thee,<BON:nextLine/>Guard thee with the tend'rest care;<BON:nextLine/>In the trial, In the trial,<BON:nextLine/>I will make thy pathway clear. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When the storm is raging round thee,<BON:nextLine/>Call on me in humble prayer;<BON:nextLine/>I will fold my arms around thee,<BON:nextLine/>Guard thee with the tend'rest care;<BON:nextLine/>In the trial, In the trial,<BON:nextLine/>I will make thy pathway clear. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When thy soul is dark and clouded,<BON:nextLine/>Filled with doubt, and grief and care;<BON:nextLine/>Through the mists by which ‘tis shrouded,<BON:nextLine/>I will make the light appear,<BON:nextLine/>And the banner, and the banner,<BON:nextLine/>Of my love I will appear <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-232, AH-301, SDAH-//)
Title: I Will Never Leave Thee

Lyrics: Tell me the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Of unseen things above,<BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and His glory,<BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and His love.<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story simply,<BON:nextLine/>As to a little child,<BON:nextLine/>For I am weak and weary,<BON:nextLine/>And helpless and defiled. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Tell me the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Of Jesus and His love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story slowly,<BON:nextLine/>That I may take it in,<BON:nextLine/>That wonderful redemption,<BON:nextLine/>God's remedy for sin.<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the story often,<BON:nextLine/>For I forget so soon;<BON:nextLine/>The early dew of morning,<BON:nextLine/>Has passed away at noon. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Tell me the same old story,<BON:nextLine/>When you have cause to fear,<BON:nextLine/>That this world's empty glory,<BON:nextLine/>Is costing me too dear,<BON:nextLine/>Yes, and when that world's glory,<BON:nextLine/>Is dawning on my soul,<BON:nextLine/>Tell me the old, old story,<BON:nextLine/>Christ Jesus makes thee whole. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-233, AH-80, SDAH-196)
Title: Tell Me The Old, Old Story

Lyrics: Hark! The herald angels sing,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world;<BON:nextLine/>Glory to the new born King,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Come where the dewdrops of mercy are bright,<BON:nextLine/>Shine all around us by day and by night,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the light of the world. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Joyful, all ye nations rise,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world;<BON:nextLine/>Join the triumphs of the skies,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Christ by highest heav'n adored,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world;<BON:nextLine/>Christ, the everlasting Lord,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hail the heav'n born Prince of Peace<BON:nextLine/>Jesus, the Light of the world;<BON:nextLine/>Hail the sun of righteousness,<BON:nextLine/>Jesus the Light of the world. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-234, AH-//, SDAH-122)
Title: Jesus, The Light Of The World

Lyrics: Again the day returns of holy rest,<BON:nextLine/>Which, when he made the world, Jehovah blest;<BON:nextLine/>When, like his own, he bade our labor's case,<BON:nextLine/>And all be piety, and all be peace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let us devote this consecrated day,<BON:nextLine/>To learn his will, and all we learn obey;<BON:nextLine/>So shall he hear, when fervently we raise,<BON:nextLine/>Our supplications, and our songs of praise. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lord of all worlds, incline thy gracious ear;<BON:nextLine/>Thy children's voice in tender mercy hear;<BON:nextLine/>Bear thy blest promise, fixed as hills, in mind,<BON:nextLine/>And shed renewing grace on lost mankind. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Father in heaven in whom our hopes confide,<BON:nextLine/>Whose power defends us, and whose precepts guide;<BON:nextLine/>Through life our surest guardian, and friend,<BON:nextLine/>Glory supreme be thine till time shall end. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-235, AH-391, SDAH-//)
Title: Again The Day Returns

Lyrics: Awake, my soul, to joyful lays,<BON:nextLine/>And sing thy great Redeemer's praise;<BON:nextLine/>He justly claims a song from me,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness, O how free!<BON:nextLine/>Loving kindness, loving kindness,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how free! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He saw me ruined in the fall,<BON:nextLine/>Yet loved me notwithstanding all;<BON:nextLine/>He saved me from my lost estate,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how great!<BON:nextLine/>Loving kindness, loving kindness,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how great! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Though num'rous hosts of mighty foes,<BON:nextLine/>Though earth and hell my way oppose,<BON:nextLine/>He safely leads my soul along,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how strong!<BON:nextLine/>Loving kindness, loving kindness,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how strong! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When trouble, like a gloomy cloud,<BON:nextLine/>Has gathered thick and thundered loud,<BON:nextLine/>He near my soul has always stood,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness, O how good!<BON:nextLine/>Loving kindness, loving kindness,<BON:nextLine/>His loving kindness O how good! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-236, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: His Loving Kindness

Lyrics: Stand up! Stand up for Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>Ye soldiers of the cross;<BON:nextLine/>Lift high his royal banner,<BON:nextLine/>It must not suffer loss:<BON:nextLine/>From victory unto victory,<BON:nextLine/>His army shall he lead,<BON:nextLine/>Till every foe is vanquished,<BON:nextLine/>And Christ is Lord indeed. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Stand up! Stand up for Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>The trumpet call obey;<BON:nextLine/>Forth to the mighty conflict,<BON:nextLine/>In this his glorious day,<BON:nextLine/>Ye that are men now serve him,<BON:nextLine/>Against unnumbered foes;<BON:nextLine/>Let courage rise with danger,<BON:nextLine/>And strength to strength oppose. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Stand up! Stand up for Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>Stand in his strength alone;<BON:nextLine/>The arm of flesh will fail you;<BON:nextLine/>Ye dare not trust your own;<BON:nextLine/>Put on the gospel armor,<BON:nextLine/>And watching unto prayer,<BON:nextLine/>Where duty calls, or danger,<BON:nextLine/>Be never wanting there. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Stand up! Stand up for Jesus!<BON:nextLine/>The strife will not be long;<BON:nextLine/>This day the noise of battle,<BON:nextLine/>The next the victor's song;<BON:nextLine/>To him that overcometh,<BON:nextLine/>A crown of life shall be;<BON:nextLine/>He with the King of glory, <BON:nextLine/>Shall reign eternally. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-237, AH-368, SDAH-618)
Title: Stand Up For Jesus

Lyrics: Who, who are these beyond the chilly wave,<BON:nextLine/>Just past the borders of the silent grave,<BON:nextLine/>Shouting Jesus' power to save?<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Sweeping through the gates to the new Jerusalem,<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb;<BON:nextLine/>Sweeping through the gates to the New Jerusalem,<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>These, these are they who in their youthful days,<BON:nextLine/>Found Jesus early, and in wisdom's way,<BON:nextLine/>Proved the fullness of his grace,<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>These, these are they who in affliction's woes,<BON:nextLine/>Ever have found in Jesus calm repose,<BON:nextLine/>Peace which from a pure heart flows,<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>These, these are they who in the conflict dire,<BON:nextLine/>Boldly have stood amid the hottest fire;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus now says "Come up higher,"<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Safe, safe upon the ever-shining shore,<BON:nextLine/>Sin, pain, and death, and sorrow all are o'er;<BON:nextLine/>Happy now and ever more,<BON:nextLine/>Washed in the blood of the Lamb. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-238, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Who, Who Are These?

Lyrics: Art thou weary, art thou languid,<BON:nextLine/>Art thou sore distrest? <BON:nextLine/>"Come to Me," saith One, "and coming,<BON:nextLine/>Be at rest." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hath He marks to lead me to Him,<BON:nextLine/>If He be my guide?<BON:nextLine/>"In His feet and hands are wound-prints,<BON:nextLine/>His side." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Is there diadem, as monarch,<BON:nextLine/>That His brow adorns?<BON:nextLine/>"Yea, a crown, in very surety,<BON:nextLine/>But of thorns." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If I find Him, if I follow,<BON:nextLine/>What my portion here? <BON:nextLine/>"Many a sorrow, many a labor,<BON:nextLine/>Many a tear." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If I still hold closely to Him,<BON:nextLine/>What hath He at last?<BON:nextLine/>"Sorrow vanquished, labor ended,<BON:nextLine/>Jordan past." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If I ask Him to receive me,<BON:nextLine/>Will he say to me nay? <BON:nextLine/>"Not till earth and not till heave<BON:nextLine/>Pass away." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Finding, following, keeping, struggling,<BON:nextLine/>Is He sure to bless? <BON:nextLine/>"Saints, apostles, prophets, martyrs,<BON:nextLine/>Answer, Yes." Amen. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-239, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Art Thou Weary

Lyrics: Behold the Saviour at the door!<BON:nextLine/>He gently knocks, has knocked before,<BON:nextLine/>Has waited long, is waiting still,<BON:nextLine/>You treat no other friend so ill. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He counsels thee to buy of him,<BON:nextLine/>Gold tried by fire, and raiment clean;<BON:nextLine/>Anoint thine eyes, that thou may'st see,<BON:nextLine/>And put away thy stains from thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O, hear the faithful Witness' voice,<BON:nextLine/>He offers now a final choice;<BON:nextLine/>Thou art offensive, O lukewarm!<BON:nextLine/>Therefore be zealous and reform. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>His mission now is almost o'er,<BON:nextLine/>Before the throne he'll plead no more;<BON:nextLine/>The filthy must his filth retain,<BON:nextLine/>He that is holy, so remain <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>His locks with dews of night are wet,<BON:nextLine/>But at thy heart he ling'reth yet;<BON:nextLine/>Awake! And open wide the door;<BON:nextLine/>Bid thy Beloved wait no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yes, bring him in, a welcome guest;<BON:nextLine/>So shalt thou in his presence rest;<BON:nextLine/>And in communion sweet and free,<BON:nextLine/>Shalt sup with him and he with thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-240, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: At The Door

Lyrics: There is a land of corn and wine,<BON:nextLine/>And all its joys will soon be mine;<BON:nextLine/>There shines undimmed one blissful day,<BON:nextLine/>For earth's dark night has passed away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>O Beulah land! Sweet Beulah land!<BON:nextLine/>Upon thy heights I long to stand,<BON:nextLine/>And view the radiant, jasper sea,<BON:nextLine/>And mansions fair, prepared for me,<BON:nextLine/>And find on that eternal shore,<BON:nextLine/>My heaven, my home, for ever-more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>My Saviour then will walk with me;<BON:nextLine/>O sweet communion that will be!<BON:nextLine/>He'll gently lead me by the hand,<BON:nextLine/>In that celestial, happy land. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A sweet perfume upon the breeze,<BON:nextLine/>Will come from ever vernal trees,<BON:nextLine/>And flowers that never fading grow,<BON:nextLine/>Where streams of life forever flows. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The zephyrs then will laden be,<BON:nextLine/>With sounds of sweetest melody,<BON:nextLine/>As angels, with the ransomed throng,<BON:nextLine/>Join in the sweet redemption song. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-241, AH-433, SDAH-368)
Title: Beulah Land

Lyrics: Blest be the tie that binds,<BON:nextLine/>Our hearts in Christian love!<BON:nextLine/>The fellowship of kindred minds,<BON:nextLine/>Is like to that above. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Before our Father's throne,<BON:nextLine/>We pour our ardent prayers;<BON:nextLine/>Our fears, our hopes, our aims are one,<BON:nextLine/>Our comforts and our cares. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We share our mutual woes,<BON:nextLine/>Our mutual burdens bear;<BON:nextLine/>And often for each other flows,<BON:nextLine/>The sympathizing tear. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When we asunder part,<BON:nextLine/>It gives us inward pain;<BON:nextLine/>But we shall still be joined in heart,<BON:nextLine/>And never part again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-242, AH-481, SDAH-350)
Title: Blest Be The Tie

Lyrics: Arise, my soul, arise,<BON:nextLine/>Shake off thy guilty fears;<BON:nextLine/>The bleeding Sacrifice,<BON:nextLine/>In my behalf appears;<BON:nextLine/>Before the throne my Surety stands,<BON:nextLine/>Before the throne my Surety stands,<BON:nextLine/>My name is written on his hands <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He ever lives above,<BON:nextLine/>For me to intercede;<BON:nextLine/>His all redeeming love,<BON:nextLine/>His precious blood to plead;<BON:nextLine/>His blood was shed for all our race,<BON:nextLine/>His blood was shed for all our race,<BON:nextLine/>And sprinkles now the throne of grace. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Five bleeding wounds he bears,<BON:nextLine/>Received on Calvary;<BON:nextLine/>They pour effectual prayers,<BON:nextLine/>They strongly speak of me;<BON:nextLine/>"Forgive him, O, forgive!" they cry,<BON:nextLine/>"Forgive him, O, forgive!" they cry,<BON:nextLine/>"Nor let the contrite sinner die!" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>The Father hears him pray, His dear, anointed One;<BON:nextLine/>He would not turn away, The presence of his Son;<BON:nextLine/>His Spirit answers to the blood,<BON:nextLine/>His Spirit answers to the blood,<BON:nextLine/>And tells me I am born of God. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-243, AH-//, SDAH-38)
Title: Arise, My Soul, Arise!

Lyrics: Come to Jesus, Come to Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Come to Jesus just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now come to Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Come to Jesus just now <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He will save you , He will save you,<BON:nextLine/>He will save you just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now He will save you, He<BON:nextLine/>Will save you just now.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He is able, He is able,<BON:nextLine/>He is able just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now He is able,<BON:nextLine/>He is able, He is able just now.<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Call upon him, Call upon him,<BON:nextLine/>Call upon him just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now call upon him,<BON:nextLine/>Call upon him Just now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He is waiting He is waiting<BON:nextLine/>He is waiting just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now He is waiting,<BON:nextLine/>He is waiting just now <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Only trust him, Only trust him,<BON:nextLine/>Only trust just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now only trust him,<BON:nextLine/>Only trust him just Now <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He will bless you, He will bless you,<BON:nextLine/>He will bless you just now;<BON:nextLine/>Just now he will bless you,<BON:nextLine/>He will bless you just now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-244, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Come To Jesus

Lyrics: There's no other name like Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the dearest name we know<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the angels joy in heaven,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the Children's joy below. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Sweet name…… dear name,<BON:nextLine/>(Sweet name) (dear name)<BON:nextLine/>There's no other name like Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>Sweet name… dear name,<BON:nextLine/>(Sweet name) (dear name)<BON:nextLine/>There's no other name like Jesus. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There's no other name like Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>When the heart with grief is sad;<BON:nextLine/>There's no other name like Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>When the heart is free and glad. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the hope that I shall see Him,<BON:nextLine/>When in glory He appears,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the hope to hear His welcome,<BON:nextLine/>That my fainting spirit cheers. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If He wills that I should labor,<BON:nextLine/>In His vineyard day by day,<BON:nextLine/>Then ‘tis well if only Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Blesses all I do or say. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If He wills that death's could finger,<BON:nextLine/>Touch feeble, mortal clay,<BON:nextLine/>Then ‘tis well if only Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>Is my dying trust and stay. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-245, AH-98, SDAH-253)
Title: No Other Name

Lyrics: Now just a word for Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>Your dearest Friend so true;<BON:nextLine/>Come, cheer our hearts and tell us,<BON:nextLine/>What He has done for you. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Now just a word for Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>‘Twill help us on our way;<BON:nextLine/>One little word for Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>O speak, or sing, or pray. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now just a word for Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>You feel your sins forgiven,<BON:nextLine/>And by grace are striving,<BON:nextLine/>To reach a home in heaven. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now just a word for Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>A cross it can not be,<BON:nextLine/>To say "I love my Saviour,<BON:nextLine/>Who gave His life for me." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now just a word for Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>Let not the time be lost,<BON:nextLine/>The heart's neglected duty,<BON:nextLine/>Brings sorrow to its cost. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now just a word for Jesus;<BON:nextLine/>And if your faith be dim,<BON:nextLine/>Arise in all your weakness,<BON:nextLine/>And leave the rest to Him <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-246, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Now Just A Word

Lyrics: Ring the bells of heaven! There is joy today,<BON:nextLine/>For a soul returning from the wild;<BON:nextLine/>See! the Father meets him out upon the way,<BON:nextLine/>Welcoming His weary wand'ring child. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Glory! glory! how the angels sing;<BON:nextLine/>Glory! glory! how the loud harps ring;<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the ransomed army, like a mighty sea,<BON:nextLine/>Pealing forth the anthem of the free. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ring the bells of heaven! There is joy today,<BON:nextLine/>For the wanderer now is reconciled;<BON:nextLine/>Yes, a soul is rescued from his sinful way,<BON:nextLine/>And is born a new a ransomed child. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ring the bells of heaven! Spread the feast today,<BON:nextLine/>Angels swell the glad triumphant strain,<BON:nextLine/>Tell the joyful tidings! Bear it far away,<BON:nextLine/>For a precious soul is born again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-247, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Ring The Bells Of Heaven

Lyrics: What means this eager, anxious throng,<BON:nextLine/>Which moves with busy haste along,<BON:nextLine/>These wondrous gatherings day by day?<BON:nextLine/>What means this strange commotion, pray?<BON:nextLine/>In accents hushed the throng reply;<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by,"<BON:nextLine/>In accents hushed the throng reply,<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Who is this Jesus? Why should he,<BON:nextLine/>The city move so mightily?<BON:nextLine/>A passing stranger has he skill,<BON:nextLine/>To move the multitude at will? <BON:nextLine/>Again the stirring notes reply,<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by."<BON:nextLine/>Again the stirring notes reply,<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Jesus! ‘tis he who once below,<BON:nextLine/>Man's pathway trod, ‘mid pain and woe;<BON:nextLine/>And burdened ones where'er he came,<BON:nextLine/>Brought out their sick, and deaf, and lame,<BON:nextLine/>The blind rejoiced to hear the cry;<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by."<BON:nextLine/>The blind rejoiced to hear the cry;<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Today, as then, from place to place,<BON:nextLine/>His holy footprints we can trace;<BON:nextLine/>He pauseth at our threshold, may,<BON:nextLine/>He enters, condescends to stay.<BON:nextLine/>Shall we not gladly raise the cry:<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by."<BON:nextLine/>Shall we not gladly raise the cry:<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ho! All ye heavy laden, come!<BON:nextLine/>Here's pardon, comfort, rest, and home;<BON:nextLine/>Ye wanderers from the Father's face,<BON:nextLine/>Return, accept his proffered grace.<BON:nextLine/>Ye tempted ones, there's refuge nigh:<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by."<BON:nextLine/>Ye tempted ones, there's refuge nigh:<BON:nextLine/>"Jesus of Nazareth passeth by."<BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-248, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Jesus Of Nazareth Passeth By

Lyrics: There were ninety and nine that safely lay,<BON:nextLine/>In the shelter of the fold,<BON:nextLine/>But one was out on the hills away,<BON:nextLine/>Far off from the gates of gold;<BON:nextLine/>Away on the mountains wild and bare,<BON:nextLine/>Away from the tender Shepherd's care,<BON:nextLine/>Away from the tender Shepherd's care. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"Lord, thou hast here Thy ninety and nine;<BON:nextLine/>Are they not enough for Thee?"<BON:nextLine/>But the Shepherd made answer:<BON:nextLine/>"One of mine Has wandered away from me,<BON:nextLine/>And although the road be rough and steep,<BON:nextLine/>I go to the desert to find my sheep,<BON:nextLine/>I go to the desert to find my sheep." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>But one of the ransomed ever knew,<BON:nextLine/>How deep were the waters crossed;<BON:nextLine/>Nor how dark was the night<BON:nextLine/>that the Lord passed through,<BON:nextLine/>Ere He found His sheep that was lost,<BON:nextLine/>Out in the desert He heard its cry,<BON:nextLine/>Sick and helpless, and ready to die,<BON:nextLine/>Sick and helpless, and ready to die. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>"Lord, whence are these blood drops all the way,<BON:nextLine/>That mark out the mountain's track? <BON:nextLine/>"They were shed for one who had gone astray,<BON:nextLine/>Ere the Shepherd could bring him back."<BON:nextLine/>"Lord, why are thy hands so rent and torn?"<BON:nextLine/>They are pierced tonight by many a thorn,"<BON:nextLine/>"They are pierced tonight by many a thorn." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>But all through the mountains, thunder-riven,<BON:nextLine/>And up from the rocky sleep,<BON:nextLine/>There rose a cry from the gates of heaven,<BON:nextLine/>"Rejoice I have found my sheep."<BON:nextLine/>And the angels sang around the throne,<BON:nextLine/>"Rejoice for the Lord brings back His own!"<BON:nextLine/>"Rejoice for the Lord brings back His own!" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-249, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: The Ninety And Nine

Lyrics: Yield not to temptation, For yielding is sin,<BON:nextLine/>Each victory will help you, Some other to win.<BON:nextLine/>Fight manfully onward, Dark passions subdue,<BON:nextLine/>Look ever to Jesus, He'll carry you through. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Ask the Saviour to help you, Comfort, strengthen, and keep you;<BON:nextLine/>He is willing to aid you, He will carry you through. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shun evil companions, Bad language disdain,<BON:nextLine/>God's name hold in reverence, Nor take it in vain.<BON:nextLine/>Be thoughtful and earnest, Kind-hearted and true,<BON:nextLine/>Look ever to Jesus, He'll carry you through. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>To him that o'er cometh, God giveth a crown,<BON:nextLine/>Thro' faith we shall conquer, Tho' often cast down<BON:nextLine/>He who is our Saviour, Our strength will renew,<BON:nextLine/>Look ever to Jesus, He'll carry you through. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-250, AH-468, SDAH-//)
Title: Yield Not To Temptation

Lyrics: Weeping will not save me, Tho' my face were bathed in tears,<BON:nextLine/>That could not allay my fears, Could not wash the sins of years,<BON:nextLine/>Weeping will not save me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesus wept and died for me; Jesus suffered on the tree;<BON:nextLine/>Jesus waits to make me free: He alone can save me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Working will not save me, Purest deeds that I can do,<BON:nextLine/>Holiest thoughts and feelings, too, Can not form my soul anew,<BON:nextLine/>Working will not save me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Waiting will not save me, Helpless, guilty, lost I lie,<BON:nextLine/>In my ear is mercy's cry; If I wait I can but die,<BON:nextLine/>Waiting will not save me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Faith in Christ will save me, Let me trust thy weeping Son,<BON:nextLine/>Trust the work that he has done; To his arms, Lord, help me run,<BON:nextLine/>Faith in Christ will save me <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-251, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Weeping Will Not Save Me

Lyrics: Come, ev'ry soul by sin oppressed, There's mercy with the Lord,<BON:nextLine/>And he will surely give you rest, By trusting in his word. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Only trust him, only trust him, Only trust him now;<BON:nextLine/>He will save you, he will save you,<BON:nextLine/>He will save you now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>For Jesus shed his precious blood, Rich blessings to bestow;<BON:nextLine/>Plunge now into the crimson flood, That washes white as snow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yes, Jesus is the Truth, the Way, That leads you into rest;<BON:nextLine/>Believe in him without delay, And you are fully blest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Come, then, and join this holy band, And on to glory go,<BON:nextLine/>To dwell in that celestial land, Where joys immortal flow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-252, AH-//, SDAH-279)
Title: Only Trust Him

Lyrics: See, Israel's gentle shepherd stands, With all engaging charms; Hark, how He calls the tender lambs, 9And folds them in His arms! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>‘Permit them to approach," He cries "Nor scorn their humble name;<BON:nextLine/>For ‘twas to bless such souls as these, The Lord of angels came." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>We bring them, Lord, in thankful hands, And yield them up to Thee;<BON:nextLine/>Joyful we ourselves are Thine, Thine let our off spring be. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-253, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: See, Israel's Gentle Shepherd

Lyrics: Praise ye Jehovah's name, Praise through His courts proclaim,<BON:nextLine/>Rise and adore, High o'er the heav'ns above,<BON:nextLine/>Sounds His great acts of love, While His rich grace we prove,<BON:nextLine/>Vast as His power. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Now let the trumpet raise, Sounds of triumphant praise,<BON:nextLine/>Wide as His fame, There let the harp be found;<BON:nextLine/>Organs of solemn sound, Roll your deep notes around,<BON:nextLine/>Filled with His name. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>While His high praise you sing, Shake ev'ry sounding string;<BON:nextLine/>Sweet the accord! He vital breath bestows; <BON:nextLine/>Let ev'ry breath that flows, His noble fame disclose,<BON:nextLine/>Praise ye the Lord. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-254, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Praise Ye Jehovah's Name

Lyrics: I need Thee, precious Jesus, For I am very poor;<BON:nextLine/>A stranger and a pilgrim, I have no earthly store.<BON:nextLine/>I need the love of Jesus, To cheer me on my way,<BON:nextLine/>To guide my doubting footsteps, To be my strength and stay. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need the heart of Jesus, To feel each anxious care;<BON:nextLine/>To tell my ev'ry trial, And all my sorrows share,<BON:nextLine/>I need the Holy Spirit, To teach me what I am<BON:nextLine/>To show me more of Jesus, To point me to the Lamb <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>I need Thee, precious Jesus, I hope to see Thee soon<BON:nextLine/>Encircled with the rainbow, And seated on thy throne.<BON:nextLine/>There, with Thy blood-bought children, My joy shall ever be,<BON:nextLine/>To sing Thy ceaseless praises, To gaze my Lord, on Thee! Amen. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-255, AH-320, SDAH-484)
Title: I Need Thee, Precious Jesus

Lyrics: O, God our help in ages past, Our hope for years to come;<BON:nextLine/>Our shelter from the stormy blast, And our eternal home! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Under the shadow of Thy throne, Thy saints have dwelt secure;<BON:nextLine/>Sufficient is Thine arm alone, And our defence is sure. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Before the hills in order stood, Or each received her frame;<BON:nextLine/>From everlasting Thou art God, To endless years the same. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A thousand ages in Thy sight, Are like an ev'ning gone;<BON:nextLine/>Short as the watch that ends the night, Before the rising sun. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-256, AH-58, SDAH-103)
Title: O, God Our Help

Lyrics: Unshaken as the sacred hills, And fixed as mountains stand;<BON:nextLine/>Firm as the rock the soul shall rest, That trusts the Almighty hand. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not walls nor hills could guard so well, Fair Salem's happy ground,<BON:nextLine/>As those eternal arms of love, That every saint surround. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Do good, O Lord, do good to those, Who cleave to Thee in heart,<BON:nextLine/>Who on thy truth alone repose, Nor from Thy law depart. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-257, AH-160, SDAH-//)
Title: Unshaken As The Sacred Hills

Lyrics: God's law demands one living faith,<BON:nextLine/>And not a crowd of lifeless creeds;<BON:nextLine/>Its warrant is a firm "God saith"<BON:nextLine/>Its claim not words but living deeds. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>O Lord, forgive thy holy law,<BON:nextLine/>Grows tarnished in our earthly clasp;<BON:nextLine/>Pure in itself, without a flaw,<BON:nextLine/>It dims in our too worldly grasp. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Forgive the sacrilege, and take,<BON:nextLine/>From every soul the unholy stain;<BON:nextLine/>And help us for thy Son's dear sake,<BON:nextLine/>To keep thy perfect law again. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-258, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: One Living Faith

Lyrics: Shall we meet beyond the river,<BON:nextLine/>When the surges cease to roll?<BON:nextLine/>Where, in all the bright forever,<BON:nextLine/>Sorrow ne'er shall press the soul? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet, shall we meet,<BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet beyond the river?<BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet beyond the river,<BON:nextLine/>Where the surges cease to roll. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet in that blest harbor,<BON:nextLine/>When our stormy voyage is o'er?<BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet and cast the anchor,<BON:nextLine/>By the far, celestial shore? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet in yonder city,<BON:nextLine/>Where the tow'rs of crystal shine?<BON:nextLine/>Where the walls are all of jasper,<BON:nextLine/>Built for us by hands divine? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall we meet with Christ, our Saviuor,<BON:nextLine/>When he comes to claim his own?<BON:nextLine/>Shall we know his blessed favor,<BON:nextLine/>And sit down upon his throne? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-259, AH-431, SDAH-//)
Title: Shall We Meet

Lyrics: I am passing down the valley that they say is so lone.<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis to me the vale of Beulah,‘tis a beautiful way,<BON:nextLine/>But I find that all the pathway is with flowers o'er grown,<BON:nextLine/>For the Saviour walks beside me, my companion all day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Vale of Beulah, Vale of Beulah, Thou art precious to me;<BON:nextLine/>For the lovely of the promise, In the distance I see. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not a shadow, not a shadow ever darkens the way,<BON:nextLine/>And the music, sweetly chanted by the heavenly throng,<BON:nextLine/>For a radiance of rare glory shines upon it all day,<BON:nextLine/>Floats in cadence down the valley, and it cheers me along. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>So I journey with rejoicing toward the city of light,<BON:nextLine/>And I near the open portals of the kingdom above,<BON:nextLine/>While each day my joy is deeper, and the path grows more bright,<BON:nextLine/>For this highway leads to heaven, to the kingdom of love. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-260, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Vale Of Beulah

Lyrics: Beautiful valley of Eden,<BON:nextLine/>Sweet is thy noon-tide calm;<BON:nextLine/>Over the hearts of the weary,<BON:nextLine/>Breathing thy waves of balm. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Beautiful valley of Eden,<BON:nextLine/>Home of the pure and blest<BON:nextLine/>(the pure and blest)<BON:nextLine/>How often amid the wild billows;<BON:nextLine/>I dream of thy rest, sweet rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Over the heart of the mourner,<BON:nextLine/>Shineth the golden day,<BON:nextLine/>Waiting the songs of the angels,<BON:nextLine/>Down from the far away. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>There is the home of my Saviour;<BON:nextLine/>There with the blood washed throng;<BON:nextLine/>Over the highlands of glory,<BON:nextLine/>Rolleth the great new song. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-261, AH-429, SDAH-//)
Title: Beautiful Valley Of Eden

Lyrics: What shall do with Jesus?<BON:nextLine/>He stands before me now,<BON:nextLine/>Wearing the robe of purple,<BON:nextLine/>And thorns upon His brow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>This is the question now;<BON:nextLine/>What shall the answer be?<BON:nextLine/>Shall I crucify King Jesus,<BON:nextLine/>And set Barabbas free?<BON:nextLine/>(final) I will crucify Barabbas,<BON:nextLine/>And set King Jesus free. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Shall I release the robber,<BON:nextLine/>The carnal man of pride?<BON:nextLine/>Sin or a sinless Saviour? <BON:nextLine/>O which shall be denied? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Solemn and awful question!<BON:nextLine/>How still the balance stands!<BON:nextLine/>Mercy a moment lingers,<BON:nextLine/>It trembles in her hands. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Self on the seat of judgment,<BON:nextLine/>Dare you the world deny?<BON:nextLine/>Louder and louder calling,<BON:nextLine/>"Away!" and "Crucify!" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Not to the sinner only,<BON:nextLine/>The question comes with power,<BON:nextLine/>Hear it, ye halting Christians,<BON:nextLine/>In every trial hour. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-262, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Christ Or Barabbas

Lyrics: Hear the words of Scripture from the ages past,<BON:nextLine/>"Bring ye all the tithes into the store-house,"<BON:nextLine/>Make a consecration that will ever last,<BON:nextLine/>Trusting for the promised blessing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>"Bring ye all the tithes into the store-house,<BON:nextLine/>And prove me now," saith the Lord of hosts;<BON:nextLine/>And I will pour out a blessing,<BON:nextLine/>There shall not be room enough to receive it." <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Do you seek to know the Holy Spirit's power?<BON:nextLine/>"Bring ye all the tithes into the store-house,"<BON:nextLine/>Live in sweet communion with Him hour by hour,<BON:nextLine/>While He give the promised blessing <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Is there aught that stands between you and your Lord?<BON:nextLine/>"Bring ye all the tithes into the store-house,<BON:nextLine/>Bring them on conditions promised in His word,<BON:nextLine/>And He'll pour you out a blessing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Lift your heart this moment, claim Him Lord and King,<BON:nextLine/>As ye bring the tithes into the store-house;<BON:nextLine/>Trust the blessed promise, and your praise shall ring,<BON:nextLine/>From the heart He is possessing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Let the anthems roll in grandeur thro' the skies,<BON:nextLine/>Having brought the tithes into the store-house;<BON:nextLine/>Joyous hallelujahs from our hearts arise,<BON:nextLine/>For we have the promised blessing. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-263, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: "Bring Ye All The Tithes"

Lyrics: Holy day, Jehovah's rest,<BON:nextLine/>Of creation's week the best;<BON:nextLine/>Last of all the chosen seven,<BON:nextLine/>Blessed of God, to man ‘twas given. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Welcome, welcome,<BON:nextLine/>(Welcome, welcome, ever welcome,)<BON:nextLine/>Welcome welcome;<BON:nextLine/>(welcome, welcome, ever welcome;)<BON:nextLine/>Glad we hail its presence blest,<BON:nextLine/>‘Tis the great Jehovah's rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>First His six days' work was done,<BON:nextLine/>Then the Sabbath was begun;<BON:nextLine/>Thus He blessed the seventh day,<BON:nextLine/>Thus in resting we obey. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thousands have His plan reversed,<BON:nextLine/>Resting now upon the first;<BON:nextLine/>Search the book and you shall know,<BON:nextLine/>There's no scripture tells them so. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>All who speak the truth must say,<BON:nextLine/>It was man who changed the day;<BON:nextLine/>In God's word no change appears,<BON:nextLine/>Through the whole six thousand years. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Thus I searched; and when I saw,<BON:nextLine/>Only one great Sabbath law,<BON:nextLine/>Then I Hasten to obey,<BON:nextLine/>Plainly, ‘twas the only way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-264, AH-381, SDAH-//)
Title: Holy Day, Jehovah's Rest

Lyrics: Peace, perfect peace, in this dark world of sin?<BON:nextLine/>The blood of Jesus whispers peace within. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Peace, perfect peace, by thronging duties pressed? <BON:nextLine/>To do the will of Jesus: this is rest <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Peace, perfect peace, with sorrows surging round?<BON:nextLine/>On Jesus' bosom nought but calm is found. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Peace, perfect peace, with loved far away?<BON:nextLine/>The blood of Jesus whispers peace within.<BON:nextLine/>In Jesus' keeping we are safe, and they. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Peace, perfect peace, our future all unknown?<BON:nextLine/>Jesus we know, and He is on the throne. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-265, AH-263, SDAH-463)
Title: Peace, Perfect Peace

Lyrics: Jesus, I will follow Thee,<BON:nextLine/>For I hear Thee calling me;<BON:nextLine/>Loving, trusting, glad I come,<BON:nextLine/>To let Thee lead me home. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>I will follow Thee, I will follow Thee,<BON:nextLine/>I will follow Thee, Wherever Thou dost lead. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Little eyes might lose the way,<BON:nextLine/>Little feet might go astray;<BON:nextLine/>I might weak and weary be,<BON:nextLine/>But Thou art strong for me. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Grief and want may be my foes;<BON:nextLine/>Foolish sins my way oppose;<BON:nextLine/>Full of courage I will be,<BON:nextLine/>Whene'er I follow Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-266, AH-444, SDAH-//)
Title: Jesus, I Will Follow Thee

Lyrics: Let us gather up the sunbeams,<BON:nextLine/>Lying all around our path;<BON:nextLine/>Let us keep the wheat and roses,<BON:nextLine/>Casting out the thorns and chaff;<BON:nextLine/>Let us find our sweetest comfort,<BON:nextLine/>In the blessings of the today,<BON:nextLine/>With a patient hand removing,<BON:nextLine/>All the briers from the way. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Then scatter seeds of kindness,<BON:nextLine/>Then scatter seeds of kindness,<BON:nextLine/>Then scatter seeds of kindness,<BON:nextLine/>For our reaping by and by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Strange we never prize the music,<BON:nextLine/>Till the sweet-voiced bird is flown!<BON:nextLine/>Strange that we should slight the violets,<BON:nextLine/>Till the lovely flowers are gone!<BON:nextLine/>Strange that summer skies and sunshine,<BON:nextLine/>Never seem one half so fair,<BON:nextLine/>As when winter's snowy pinions,<BON:nextLine/>Shake the white down in the air. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>If we knew the baby fingers,<BON:nextLine/>Pressed against the window pane,<BON:nextLine/>Would be cold and stiff tomorrow,<BON:nextLine/>Never trouble us again,<BON:nextLine/>Would the bright eyes of our darling,<BON:nextLine/>Catch the frown upon our brow?<BON:nextLine/>Would the prints of rosy fingers,<BON:nextLine/>Vex us then as they do now. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ah! Those little ice-cold fingers,<BON:nextLine/>How they point our mem'ries back,<BON:nextLine/>To the hasty words and actions,<BON:nextLine/>Strewn along our backward track!<BON:nextLine/>How those little hands remind us,<BON:nextLine/>As in snowy grace they lie,<BON:nextLine/>Not to scatter thorns but roses,<BON:nextLine/>For our reaping by and by. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-267, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Scatter Seeds Of Kindness

Lyrics: Master the tempest is raging!<BON:nextLine/>The billows are tossing high!<BON:nextLine/>The sky is o'er shadowed with blackness;<BON:nextLine/>No shelter or help is nigh;<BON:nextLine/>Carest Thou not that we perish? <BON:nextLine/>How canst Thou lie asleep,<BON:nextLine/>When each moment so madly is threatening,<BON:nextLine/>A grave in the angry deep. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>"The winds and the waves shall obey My will,<BON:nextLine/>Peace be still!<BON:nextLine/>Whether the wrath of the storm-tossed sea,<BON:nextLine/>Or demons, or men, or whatever it be,<BON:nextLine/>No water can swallow the ship where lies,<BON:nextLine/>The Master of ocean and earth and skies;<BON:nextLine/>They all shall sweetly obey my will,<BON:nextLine/>Peace, be still! Peace be still!<BON:nextLine/>They all shall sweetly obey My will,<BON:nextLine/>Peace, peace be still!" <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Master with anguish of spirit,<BON:nextLine/>I bow in my grief today;<BON:nextLine/>The depths of sad hearts are troubled;<BON:nextLine/>O, waken and save I pray!<BON:nextLine/>Torrents of sin and of anguish,<BON:nextLine/>Sweep o'er my sinking soul;<BON:nextLine/>And I perish! I perish dear Master;<BON:nextLine/>O hasten, and take control. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Master, the terror is over,<BON:nextLine/>The element sweetly rest;<BON:nextLine/>Earth's sun is in the calm lake is mirrored,<BON:nextLine/>And heaven's within my breast;<BON:nextLine/>Linger O blessed Redeemer,<BON:nextLine/>Leave me alone no more;<BON:nextLine/>And with joy I shall make the blest harbor,<BON:nextLine/>And rest on the blissful shore. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-268, AH-205, SDAH-//)
Title: Master, The Tempest Is Raging!

Lyrics: A wonderful Saviour is Jesus my Lord,<BON:nextLine/>A wonderful Saviour to me,<BON:nextLine/>He hiddeth my soul in the cleft of the Rock,<BON:nextLine/>Where rivers of pleasure I see. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,<BON:nextLine/>The shadows are dry, thirsty land;<BON:nextLine/>He hideth my soul in the depths of his love,<BON:nextLine/>And covers me there with His hand.<BON:nextLine/>And covers me there with His hand. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>A wonderful Saviour is Jesus my Lord,<BON:nextLine/>He taketh my burden away;<BON:nextLine/>He holdeth me up and I shall not be moved,<BON:nextLine/>He giveth me strength as my day. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>With numberless blessings each moment He crowns,<BON:nextLine/>And filled with His fullness divine,<BON:nextLine/>I sing in my rapture, Oh, glory to God,<BON:nextLine/>For such a Redeemer as mine. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>When clothed in His brightness, transported I rise,<BON:nextLine/>To meet Him in clouds of the sky;<BON:nextLine/>His perfect salvation, His wonderful love,<BON:nextLine/>I'll shout with the millions on high. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-269, AH-520, SDAH-102)
Title: A Wonderful Savior

Lyrics: Our blest Redeemer, ere, He breathed his tender last fare-well,<BON:nextLine/>A guide, a Comforter, bequeathed, With us to dwell <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He came sweet influence to impart, A gracious, willing guest,<BON:nextLine/>While He can find one humble heart, Where in to rest. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And His that gentle voice we hear, Soft as the breath of even,<BON:nextLine/>That checks the wrong, that calms the fear, And speaks of heaven. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>And every virtue we possess, And every victory won,<BON:nextLine/>And every thought of holiness, Are His alone. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Spirit of purity and grace, Our weakness, pitying, see;<BON:nextLine/>O make our hearts, Thy dwelling place, Till all like Thee. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-270, AH-156, SDAH-//)
Title: Our Blessed Redeemer

Lyrics: "Though your sins be as scarlet,<BON:nextLine/>They shall be as white as snow;<BON:nextLine/>"Though your sins be as scarlet,<BON:nextLine/>They shall be as white as snow.<BON:nextLine/>Though they be red like crimson,<BON:nextLine/>They shall be as wool."<BON:nextLine/>Though your sins be as scarlet,<BON:nextLine/>Though your sins be as scarlet,<BON:nextLine/>They shall be as white as snow,<BON:nextLine/>They shall be as white as snow. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Hear the voice that entreats you,<BON:nextLine/>O return ye unto God!<BON:nextLine/>Hear the voice that entreats you,<BON:nextLine/>O return ye unto God!<BON:nextLine/>He is of great compassion,<BON:nextLine/>And of wondrous love;<BON:nextLine/>Hear the voice that entreats you,<BON:nextLine/>Hear the voice that entreats you;<BON:nextLine/>O, return ye unto God! O return ye unto God! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>He'll forgive your transgression,<BON:nextLine/>And remember them no more;<BON:nextLine/>He'll forgive your transgression,<BON:nextLine/>And remember them no more;<BON:nextLine/>"Look unto me ye people,"<BON:nextLine/>Saith the Lord your God;<BON:nextLine/>He'll forgive your transgression,<BON:nextLine/>He'll forgive your transgression,<BON:nextLine/>And remember them no more,<BON:nextLine/>And remember them no more. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-271, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Tho' Your Sins Be As Scarlet

Lyrics: Throw out the lifeline across the dark wave,<BON:nextLine/>There is a brother whom someone should save;<BON:nextLine/>Somebody's brother! Oh, who then will dare,<BON:nextLine/>To throw out the lifeline, his peril to share? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Throw out the lifeline! Throw out the lifeline!<BON:nextLine/>Someone is drifting away! Throw out the lifeline!<BON:nextLine/>Throw out the lifeline! Someone is sinking today. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Throw out the lifeline with hand quick and strong;<BON:nextLine/>Why do you tarry, why linger so long?<BON:nextLine/>See! He is sinking; oh, hasten today,<BON:nextLine/>And out with the life boat!
